title: Save Lives And Defeat Corona Virus
description: The new virus in China is putting thousands of lives in danger. Many hospitals have run out of medical supplies especially masks which need to be changed every 4 hours. Time is running quickly. We need donations to decrease the chance of infection. A few students and I from Brookline High School wish to contribute a little something our ability allows for. Please help save patients and their families; help stop the virus from spreading and killing. Thank you! We will spend all the donations on medical supplies and delivering them to China.

title: Together - Support Wuhan Fight Through Coronavirus
description: Dear all  We urgently need your help and donation! YES We need help ASAP!  This Gofundme page is setup to help fundraising for purchasing medical supplies for Wuhan hospitals doctors nurses  healthcare workers  medical microbiologists volunteers in Wuhan China whose currently fighting to save all these innocent lives. Yes we know the virus spread too quickly for anyone to react. We know the cause of the virus and we know there are human responsibilities in this BUT not everyone deserves to be infected or die.   Wuhan was once my home when I was a child and I still have family there. Unfortunately 2 of my close family members including  a healthcare worker are currently isolated in hospital in Wuhan suffering from the coronavirus. We are lucky that they received treatment. We are lucky that we had these healthcare workers to save them! We are grateful and we are heart broken at the same time because we know how serious this is and we are still experiencing the possibilities of loosing close family members we want to help! And we need your help! We want every doctor nurse healthcare workers medical microbiologist volunteer and patient to go home safely! I am lucky I live in USA currently I am lucky that I did not get stuck in Wuhan city because I no longer live in Wuhan. I am lucky I have so much resources! But whose there to help them and the true heroes?  Currently my cousin who was a reporter in Wuhan is in direct contact with many hospitals bypassing government or other organizations. Yes we want to make sure that every pieces of supply gets delivered directly to the hospitals! We need to help and protect the frontline fighters whose risking everything to save our family and my home.   Due to Wuhan city and many other cities lockdowns shortage of supplies increased pricing on these supplies set lots of restrictions and limitation. In Wuhan China we raised about $10000 and purchased only 600 pieces of protected clothing delivered to assigned hospitals.  This is truly NOT ENOUGH...Therefore our family decided to connect together at this tough time to raise more fundings to help even if the prices are expensive...these medical supplies are life savers!   Right now flights no longer go to Wuhan and due to varies of other reasons even if we ship supplies to Wuhan it does not get distributed to the needed hospitals. So we have to purchase and gather the supplies in China! To make sure we get the required high quality supplies we need more funds to purchase them. We will guarantee to purchase the medical supplies and deliver them directly to each hospitals that we work with. We already completed round 1 so we know this works! Thats why we want to continue!          Many people are in lockdown in their community in Wuhan Hubei  other areas in China so we have to depend on these warm hearted volunteers to help us move and deliver these items to hospitals! We need to protect them too!!!!!        And IF you have resources or supplies in Wuhan and China please please contact me and I can link you up with my cousin. During this time please stop the discrimination to Wuhan people. We know human beings made mistakes other organizations did too but we should stop blaming and hating we should stick together to help! We need to have a kind heart and generous actions to support! Even if is just a little help even if you could just help me share the page we truly appreciated! And we are thankful for everyone whose helping and praying to get through this tough times!   We know theres lots of different voices political views fake supplies etc. BUT lets put that all aside and just focus on one purpose HELP and SUPPORT Wuhan and save innocent lives! Inside Wuhan City we  truly are still in urgent need of supplies!  Please find the news links to see more details about the coronavirus.   https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/01/asia/coronavirus-wuhan-discrimination-intl-hnk/index.html     https://www.wsj.com/articles/what-we-know-about-the-wuhan-virus-11579716128       https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/    Please contact me through Gofundme if you have resources or supplies in China!   I would like to thank everyone in advance!  Anna

title: Help Fight the Coronavirus!
description: Mission:   As the worldwide cases of the coronavirus surpassed the 2003 Sars outbreak the situation in China is getting grimmer. More and more requests for preventative emergency medical supplies are coming in from Hospitals Clinics Communities and individuals. The coronavirus being a global crisis demands international measures. We are asking you to donate money via Gofundme.  Money donated will be used to either buy requested medical supplies or used to fund the shipping of the goods to China.   We are building a mobile platform to match emergency needs and medical donations together with volunteer teams we work hard to distribute the requested supplies to the people in need. ** All money donated will be used to buy supplies or fund the transport to deliver the Goods.  Donate now so that medical supplies can be bought and shipped out to the communities in need.  Help them to help us!!  You can also contact us here: If you wish to have questions concerning our charity project.   Coronavirus Death Toll as of 19 Feb:    More Pics:

title: Help Fight Coronavirus in Wuhan
description: What we can do to help    The Greater China Club at the Wharton School (GCC) is organizing a fundraiser to help those in need in Wuhan to access critically important medical supplies including facial masks protective gloves suits and other protective garments.   We are fortunate to have received support and to be closely working with Wharton alumni in China including the founder of 1 Drugstore (111.com.cn NASDAQ:YI) which is one the largest direct online pharmacy networks in China.   Our current plan is to procure medical supplies through our network in China (and potentially internationally) and to directly deliver to the designated treatment hospitals in Wuhan where the most urgent needs are.  GCC commits to providing 100% transparency to the entire process including (1) providing prompt updates to donors on final destination of funds (2) providing a donor-by-donor list of donations at the end of the fundraising process and (3) engage in ongoing Q A and updates on progress of fundraise and supply procurement process within reason.   Given we are a student organization and have no official bank account we will be withdrawing money into the personal bank account of Eileen Gao one of the GCC board members. The funds will be converted from USD to RMB and sent to our supplier and logistics partner 1 Drugstores corporate account via international wire transfer. We will provide update on proof of receipt and transfer of funds when we have the details.   * Kind reminder: the platform may prompt you to enter a tip which is not related to our donation campaign. Please select Other if you do not wish to tip the platform in addition to your donation.    Current facts    The number of lab-confirmed cases stands at 14000 in 23 countries as of February 2. There have been over 300 deaths all but one in China.    To help dispel some prevailing myths around the coronavirus:    Myths: Corona is the most dangerous virus that exists Facts: The common flu kills 60 times more people annual than Corona   Myths: I will die if I am diagnosed with the coronavirus Facts: An estimated 2% of cases have reported deaths and most of these deaths were associated with weaker immune systems (e.g. old age)   Myths: I need to buy a hazmat suit and a N95 mask to stay protected Facts: Washing hands and sneezing into elbows are best practices to protect yourself   Myths: We all need to stay away from anyone from China Facts: Coronavirus has an incubation period of around 2-14 days. Therefore if a person of Chinese descent has been living outside of China for the last 14 days or more he/she is at no higher risk of transmitting the virus than anyone else in the broader community.   As the virus has spread in China and especially in Wuhan hospitals reportedly have been inundated with suspected cases and have rapidly run out of critical medical supplies most importantly protective facial masks and suits. Below are recent official statements released by some of the hardest hit hospitals in Wuhan appealing directly to the public for donation of medical goods.  At the same time many governments around the world have imposed strict travel restrictions to and from China and some have placed export restrictions on critically needed medical supplies by the abovementioned hospitals in Wuhan.  Whilst we appreciate and acknowledge the need for the efforts made by national governments to protect their own citizens we believe times like this are when true compassion and humanitarianism need to shine through the dark clouds.    Thank you.

title: Coronavirus Defends for Saving Suffering Lives
description: Flight with us! Pray with us! I’m such an ordinary person quiet on social I never thought I would be so desperate and devastated to draft a letter for help with face covering in tears! This January with the  outbreak of Coronavirus  at Wuhan my hometown? I realized and is experiencing such a life-threatening moment for my family who are infected with the virus and hundreds of thousands of people are suffering this novel virus with pneumonia and hard to breath problem (China’s number is less than what’s real). They are on the fringe of fighting the virus through their own Immune Systems and Antivirus/antibacterial medicines with the city under quarantine but the  sad thing is they lack medical supplies of masks goggles protection suits  to prevent the virus  from transmission to more people at the hospitals and communities at Wuhan  (even they also lack medicines since those are prescription drugs there is no way we can purchase). Even though lots of people are trying to help in this matter including myself and my husband there still lots of things we need to do and lots of supplies we need to send to China. As you may know Alibaba Taobao those big online stores in China is sold out of masks goggles we are purchasing  supplies here at US to send back to China . Since its two of us on our part we realized its wiser and better if we can collect help from the humanitarian society to help accelerate the process. If you are there and willing to help this effort any dollar or connection with those supplies is welcomed! I attached all those first-hand information and the real moments of my friends circle on Wechat (a Chinese chat tool) to show you what’s really going on. And with all the dollars raised I’ll  buy those supplies  and reply this crowdfunding with the  purchasing sheets and shipping information  to show how your money goes. Please also  send prayers  for Wuhan I believe God can hear us! It’s near the time to re-examine ourselves and the world around us. 1.       Who I am: Xinyu born at Wuhan have been living at US since 2012 Fall came here for Graduate degree  2.       Where I’m from: Wuchang District Wuhan City China  3.       Relationship with parties raising funds: Family friends community hospitals in Wuhan. My father is hospitalized at Wuhan University Renmin Hospital my grandpa is at Wuhan Tianyou Hospital. My mom and grandma currently don’t have any spots available at the Hospital.  4.       The Fund spent: will all be used for purchasing supplies like masks goggles protection suit and ship back to Wuhan.

title: To Combat Disease  Lets End Corona Virus
description: To date there are over 20500 confirmed cases of novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) that are affecting over 24 countries in the world.   Despite the hard work of medical staff there are still over 400 deaths reported around the world and the number is growing.   This virus is indifferent and it can affect me you and our loved ones. Please join me in this fundraising campaign to help the ones in need and end the coronavirus.  To help with this cause I will be giving away a free hand sanitizer from Bath and Body Works to people living in Calgary with the donation amount of $15.00 or more. Pick up will be available on Sunday March 1 with the time and location TBA.   Lets work together to raise money to combat this virus and spread awareness to the people around us so we stay safe and healthy. All donations raised will go towards the Canadian Red Cross and help make an impact on this virus. Thank you in advance for your contribution!

title: Kidd Corona and Lizz (Romero)
description: Our Very own Kidd Corona from 107.5 Outlaw Country and his beautiful wife Lizz just had a baby girl. She was premature born with congenital  heart  disease consisting of three holes in her tiny  heart. Mia will be in the neonatal care unit for  months.   The goal is to get her strong enough to  endure heart surgeries and post surgical recovery.   When it rains it pours Lizz is suffering from a  condition that has her off her feet. Now this shouldbe all a person could handle at once right? Well on  top of everything their son Timmy broke his leg in a  freak trampoline accident.    Which brings me to the ask. Kidd is the only one  able to work care for Lizz and carry Timmy aroundThey have to drive daily to Albuquerque for a  limited visit they are allowed with Mia. Kidd is  carrying a heavy load right now. Please help us  help him during this difficult time  Anything you  can do will be appreciated. We want to help cover all the unexpected costs for gas childcare meals hotels etc. Thank You all so much for everything   you can do.

title: Perkins Will Shanghai Coronavirus Relief Fund
description: PW Shanghai is significantly impacted by the current public health emergency. We create this campaign to raise money as an emergency fund to help PW Shanghai employees and others in need with essential medical supplies during this difficult time as the virus continues to spread globally.  The authority has required all local corporates to extend the Lunar New Year Holiday and we’re expected to work at home in the coming weeks. As the infected and suspected number continues to climb in the city the protective gears (N95 face masks or surgical masks safety goggles) that have been proven effective to halt the spread are running low. We’ve been collecting such supplies from various sources to ensure the safety of our PW employees and any help from you means a lot to us.  If you would like to donate PW Shanghai team have created this page to raise money and your donation will be used to purchase face masks and safety goggles as well as other essential medical supplies and ship to our PW Shanghai office ASAP helping PW shanghai employees their families and others in need in Wuhan as well as contributing to the efforts of stopping the virus from taking more lives.

title: Help Vietnam fight through Coronavirus
description: English version:     My name is Quang Pham a sophomore in high school who has recently moved to the USA to study.     As you are already aware of the whole world has been concerned about the newly rise yet dangerous virus called coronavirus (Covid-19) which creates lung problems. Originated in Wuhan China the virus has spread throughout every continent infecting more than 75000 people with 2009 killed as of February 19 2020. The World Health Organization has declared the virus “a global threat.” And we need to help those in need of basic medical supplies to prevent the spread of the virus.     I want to address this issue to my home country Vietnam which declared the novel coronavirus outbreak an epidemic on February 01 with 16 people infected so far. Here although many people are aware of the disease and try to take precautions there are some – especially THE POOR - who do not have the fair chance to access the most basic safety. Because of the virus the cost of face masks has risen dramatically; worse still they are out of stock in many areas due to different reasons. The situation creates a huge disadvantage for the needy. I am organizing this fund to buy masks from the U.S. and give them to the people in poor areas in Vietnam which are currently facing a huge shortage of masks.     My goal is to get $2500 for this fund; and we need to act quickly since the price of masks is changing constanly due to the shortage. The money will then be sent to a doctor that I have contact with to buy masks; then the masks will be sent back to some friends of mine in Vietnam who will help me distribute them to poor people. To start I will donate $200 and I hope you will act quickly as well. Thank you for your consideration. Every penny counts!Ti?ng Vi?t:     Tên con là Quang Ph?m con dang du h?c l?p 10 t?i m?t tru?ng trung h?c t?i M?.     Nhu m?i ngu?i dã bi?t c? th? gi?i dang quan tâm d?n d?ch cúm virus corona d?ch này tuy m?i nhung r?t nguy hi?m vì t?o nên b?nh viêm ph?i. Tên khoa h?c c?a lo?i virus này là Covid-19. B?t ngu?n t? Vu Hán Trung Qu?c 2019-nCoV dã lan truy?n d?n m?i châu l?c làm lây nhi?m hon 75 ngàn ngu?i và gi?t ch?t 2009 ngu?i tính d?n ngày 19 tháng Hai 2020. T? Ch?c Y T? Th? Gi?i dã tuyên b? dây là “m?i nguy toàn c?u”. Chúng ta c?n giúp d? nh?ng ngu?i trong vùng có d?ch ngan ch?n s? lây lan c?a virus này.     Con mu?n dóng góp s? giúp d? này cho ngu?i dân ? Vi?t Nam là noi dã tuyên b? tình tr?ng d?ch vào ngày 1 tháng Hai v?i 16 ngu?i b? nhi?m b?nh. M?c d?u ngu?i dân Vi?t Nam dã bi?t v? tình tr?ng b?nh d?ch và dã áp d?ng m?t s? bi?n pháp ngan ng?a nhung v?n có nh?ng nhóm ngu?i khác – nh?t là NGU?I NGHÈO -  không có co h?i công b?ng d? ti?p c?n s? an toàn can b?n nh?t. Do tình tr?ng b?nh d?ch giá kh?u trang che m?t tang dáng k?; nguy hi?m hon nhi?u noi t?i Vi?t Nam không còn kh?u trang d? bán. Tình hu?ng này t?o nên thi?t thòi cho nh?ng ai dang c?n kh?u trang. Con ti?n hành cu?c gây qu? này d? mua kh?u trang t? M? và g?i v? cho ngu?i dân ? nh?ng vùng nghèo t?i Vi?t Nam.     M?c tiêu c?a con là gây qu? du?c $2500; và chúng ta c?n hành d?ng nhanh vì giá kh?u trang dang tang liên t?c do tình tr?ng khan hi?m. S? ti?n này con s? dùng d? mua kh?u trang t? m?t v? bác si con bi?t; sau dó con s? g?i s? kh?u trang này cho vài ngu?i b?n c?a cô n? Vi?t Nam d? di phân phát cho ngu?i nghèo. Cá nhân con xin dóng góp $200 t? s? ti?n lì xì con du?c cho trong d?p nam m?i và con hy v?ng m?i ngu?i cùng hành d?ng nhanh. Con xin cám on m?i ngu?i. M?i s? ti?n dóng góp d?u có giá tr? nhu nhau!

title: Corona Virus - Help  doctors and nurses in China
description: Hello Everyone!  My name is Tina and I am a Chinese born Australian. I was born and raised by the very mothering land of China and as I feel the need to do something to help my motherland to overcome this terrifying Crisis!  As I work in the health care industry for the past 12 years I travel to Chinese hospitals often and I have a vast amount of channels to receive most up to date news. It is now WuHan hospitals that are most in demand of these medical equipments there are more than 30k confirmed diagnosis and much more infected. The hospitals in Wuhan are already OUT OF surgical masks and protective gowns unfortunately the government is also in shortage.  Your donations will be spent to purchasing N95 masks procedural masks that has 99% bacterial filtration rate and medical/surgical gowns which I have already sourced from. With the existing amount funded I have already purchased (out of my own pocket for now until gofundme allows for withdrawal) 1100 procedural masks 100 N95 masks and 50 surgical gowns. Note that there are still 350 gowns 900 N95 masks and 4900 procedural masks available for purchase before they get sold out (which will happen in less than a couple of days) I need your support to ensure that our Chinese front line fighters are protected while they serve their patients.   My friend will then bring back all these gears in person from Sydney to Beijing on 12th Feb and that is when the fundraising will stop.   Chinese Doctors and Nurses are currently treating tens of thousands of infected patients using recycled (washed in disinfectant solution) surgical masks and lab coat………. as there are NO MORE protective gear left for use!  So many of them are infected EVERYDAY and then they go home and infect their family members. Every time I read a story I am in tears……   Please chip in and help out to the first line Hero and Angels!  I thank you very much in advance! Tina  To update on the most recent progression of this activity (07Feb2020) - I have successfully sourced 1100 Procedural masks and 180 N95/P2 masks ready for shipping. - I am awaiting to receive 50 surgical gowns and am looking for more if anyone has resources for medical equipments please reach out to me on 0450225004.   UPDATE on 10Feb2020:   Thank you all so very much my dearest Chinese brothers and sister together we have made a total of almost 9000 over the past 5 days!! This is unreal!!  As many of you would have noticed that the donation was disabled as of last night. The reason for this is because we have saturated existing stocks that we could get hold of and the campaign needs to close prior to 11th Feb as all stocks will depart to Beijing on 13Feb.   Having said that I have obtained 2 more potential resources as of last night and with successful establishment of both connections and confirmed supply the Campaign maybe reopened again so please watch the space.  Wish me luck :)  All the very best to Chinese civilians...and hope that the outbreak will not be worsened with the end of the holiday period today. ..

title: Conquering Coronavirus- Rice Business School
description: Hi All- as you may have heard the China Coronavirus has reached over 31K cases as of today. This 2019-nCoV is easily transmitted via human-to-human interaction. As a Chinese I feel so devastated everytime when I hear that another family friend passed away or another friend got infected. My mom works in the hospital and has to put her life on the line to reuse expired face masks everyday. This is why so many health care workers got infected. The infected areas are urged to use medical supplies such as face masks and protective clothes. This is now the only way to slow down the virus spread. We would like to share this conquering 2019-nCOV campaign with you  https://www.gofundme.com/f/ConqueringCOV  Your donation will be collected and used to purchase protective gear to help those infected areas and stop the virus from spreading worldwide. Your support is well appreciated.  To tell you a bit more about our fund: We are student organization at Rice Business School in Houston TX. This Campaign has been approved and supported by Rice Jones Business School since Feb 5th 2020. We have contacted the alumni initiated group in South California that collects the fund from top universities in US to support the coronavirus in China. Attached the charity group information in the picture below. The fund will be directly transferred to the group mentioned above. The procurement team will purchase the healthcare supplies and ship back to China in the next few days once the money is received.

title: Help us escape Covid19 with our dogs
description: Hello everybody! Our names are Alan and Ceren. We have been living in China for almost 5 years as English teachers. Currently we are in Xiamen Fujian Province.  We have two adopted dogs:      This is Munchies. He is 4 years old. We found him as a 2-month-old puppy in Beijing Wudaokou area. He has been a part of our family since then.    And this one is our Girl aka Miss Paws. We found her starving on the street in September 2019 in Xiamen. We have been trying to find her a forever family but unfortunately we couldn`t find anybody.  (The picture above is a part of the poster we prepared before for the adoption.) So now she has become the newest addition to our family.  Until January 2020 everything was going nicely in our lives. But then   the Coronavirus outbreak has started and everything turned upside down.  We are living under a nationwide quarantine. Finding masks and supplies is difficult. People couldn`t go to work for almost a month.  Most companies resumed working on the 19th of February in most provinces but schools are still closed and there is no specific starting date.   Out training center has been hurt by this deeply and we still have not gotten our salaries for January and February. Our management keeps telling us the only thing we can do is to wait until schools reopen but even after that there is no guarantee that they will pay us.   Right now the only thing we are trying to do is get back to America yet with our current financial situation it is not possible. We need to buy plane tickets not only for us but for our pets which currently is more expensive given the situation.  Our options are limited by the lack of airlines flying to China.  Also the paperwork which is required for our  dogs to get on the planes is very expensive. We had considered staying longer yet with our rent and daily expenses we are not able to support ourselves. We already used all our savings and currently we are surviving by the money our families have lent us and need to find a solution as fast as possible.  This unexpected pandemic is hurting everybody in a different way. We  just want to go back home and be safe. Leaving our dogs behind is not an option.    Please help us get home we only have one month to finish everything and move our lives to America. We have lived here for five years and this has been one of the hardest things we have ever had to do. Our lives are here in China and to leave this all behind has been a challenge for us both mentally and physically.

title: Masks for China: Fight the coronavirus!
description: Good day to you   In order to help our families friends colleagues and Chinese population to fight against the ncoV2019 we are trying to gather everyone to help with their generosity to buy masks and protective gears.; they will be distributed and will allow to face the lack of stocks and slow down or even Stop the Virus spread.  Thank you in advance for your kind participation.  --------- Bonjour À tous   Afin daider nos familles amis collègues et la population Chinoise à faire face au ncoV2019 nous faisons appel à votre générosité pour leur prodiguer les masques et équipements de protections ; ces derniers seront distribués sur place et permettront de palier à la rupture de stock et de réduire voire endiguer cette pandémie. Merci par avance pour votre participation.

title: Medical supplies needed for Coronavirus in China
description: Dear family and friends:   Please save people who are suffering from the Wuhan Coronavirus. Patients are dying doctors   nurses keep getting infected and its getting worse every single day. Most hospitals in Wuhan and surrounding areas have run out of their surgical masks protecting clothings and gloves. As well as hospitals in surrounding cities and other provinces. Please please help us please save their live. Helping us is helping the whole world as well because this virus spreads super fast and widely. Cases have been detcted in almost all continents in the world.    Please Help Us Please Save People Who Are Suffering Helping Us Is Also Helping Yourself And The Whole World.    Since December 2019 the Wuhan Coronavirus has spread to all provinces in China more than 6095 people have been confirmed infected and 133 have died. So far China has restricted travel for several provinces which is approximetely 35 million people. The incubation period of Wuhan Coronavirus is very long (1~2weeks) which is why its spreading so fast all over China and globally. Japan South Korea the United States Thailand Singapore Vietnam the United Kindom and Austrilia all have cases detected.    People in Wuhan are all in danger. All hospitals are overcrowded public transportations are shut down N95 face masks are all sold out. All hospitals in Wuhan and surrounding areas ran out of medical resources including N95 face masks medical gloves medical protective clothing and surgical glasses. Due to the Chinese Lunar New Year lots of students and workers in Wuhan went back to their hometown which means they have possibly brought the virus to all their family and neighbors!    All money will be used for sending medical tools for hospitals in China mostly for small areas that have not gotten enough help yet. The donation process will be 100% public and transparent I will keep everyone updated of every single step Ive made. Thank you so much for your help.

title: Help Henan Fight through Coronavirus
description: Dear all  The Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) is now rapidly spreading throughout China. As of February 10th 2020  40265 persons were confirmed of being diagnosed with the 2019-nCoV with 909 deaths so far. As time goes the confirmed case dramatically emerged in Henan Province as of February 10th (Henan local time) 1073 cases were confirmed with 6 deaths and 187 cures. In the fight against the pneumonia epidemic of the new coronavirus infection the biggest challenge is the shortage of medical supplies/consumables which are the key to protect medical service providers including thousands of doctors and nurses who are doing their best to resuscitate patients in critical conditions and save the lives of infected patients some patients are their peer doctors/nurses who were unfortunately sickened by this disease. We witness that they were fighting relentlessly in dangerous situations to help cure Chinese patients and to control the spread of this contagious disease from infecting more people outside of China.   Henan University Alumni Association in the United States would like to unite our efforts to provide stronger help and charity support to the hospitals and patients in Henan Province with the hope to save more lives and prevent doctors/nurses being affected by the virus with more needed resources.  We are here to sincerely call on for any support and contribution in any format i.e. funds medical supplies/consumables medical resources and support and so forth. Our overseas fundraising channel is now open and all-out efforts are being made to open overseas materials transportation and fundraising channels we will ensure your support and funds are transferred to the people in need.  We appeal to all people with kindness and love. Please join us in making an impact and your help will be highly appreciated.   Plan on how to use funds: With the funds raised we are going to purchase medical consumables in urgent needs as the following: Surgical mask Medical N95 Mask safety goggles protective eyewear protective cap medical protective suit etc.   We will purchase medical consumables in USA then coordinate with major airlines to ship all materials/supplies to Henan Province in China. Charity funds and resources will be donated to the major hospitals in the cities of Xinyang Nanyang Zhumadian Zhengzhou and many more in Henan Province which are more in urgent needs.   Updates and photos on how the charity funds are used and where your donation goes will be updated on this website. Our alumni will announce the fundraising amount in real time and ensure that all the funds received be used properly and at donors wish to better prevent the epidemic from further spreading.   With your help we firmly believe that we will definitely succeed in this fight against 2019-CoronaVirus!   For any question or concern please contact us henanalumni.usa@gmail.com. title: Help Hubei Province Fight Coronavirus
description: Ivy International Group (IIG) in partnership with our international education community including all who support our students is facilitating a fundraiser for the  Hubei Charity Federation (HBCF).    HBCF works to support those impacted by the Novel Coronavirus in Hubei Province the center of the crisis and the most severely hit so far.   This is a matching gift campaign.  IIG will match -  dollar for dollar  - all donations received up to $15000. All donations received will go towards this effort.  To date February 12th the outbreak has affected hundreds of thousands of people. There have been over 43000 confirmed cases and 800 deaths worldwide. The World Health Organization (WHO) has declared it a  Public Health Emergency of International Concern  help and support is urgently needed.  The Hubei Charity Federation - a China-based humanitarian aid organization - is working tirelessly to contain this virus and protect the world. The donated funds will be used in the efforts to fight against the virus and treat patients in Hubei Province.    Coronavirus is the common enemy of every human being across the world. As an individual we can do so little - but together we can make a real impact. Our contributions will have real significance for those suffering and working to contain and fight the virus in Hubei Province.   Remember Ivy International Group will match - dollar for dollar - all donations received up to $15000!   Thank you for your contribution and please share this page!   All the best The Ivy International Group Family   More information on the Hubei Charity Foundation can be found on   http://www.hbcf.org.cn/  .   ???????(IIG)???????????????????????????????(HBCF)??? title: (COVID-19) crisis: basic supplies needed!
description: As you may know the grave situation in Wuhan and China continue to worsen by the day. Currently the government is mass quarantining people who have been infected in poor conditions and in places that were not designed to house large amounts of people for long periods of times (i.e sports stadiums exhibits etc). There is a growing shortage of basic medical supplies such as masks and medical kits for proper diagnoses—this is expected to only be exacerbated with the continued lock down and eventually include food water etc. In most parts of China there is a significant shortage of masks and other protective wear making the prevention and protection of civilians increasingly challenging.   We can not afford to allow basic protection/resources be the reason this mass spreads kills more on a global scale and further impact the global economy.  In 2003 SARS cost the global economy  $40B.  At that time Chinas GDP was  25%  of what it is today.   Did you know?  Masks should be changed out every four hours in order to prevent virus from contaminating/penetrating the mask.   Due to shortages of medical kits the numbers are currently very underreported (31k diagnosed 600+ deaths as of 2/6) and hospitals are forced to turn people away due to these shortages and hospital overcrowding.For those who don’t know me my name is Alice and I am from the greater Philadelphia area. I currently reside in San Francisco. 100% of the money raised will go towards the procuring and shipping supplies from the US to less urban areas of China where they are most challenged with basic resources to keep themselves safe.  My mom is currently in a small town (Jiangxi province) and has a group of volunteers that are willing to travel to neighboring towns to deliver and donate masks and other supplies to local hospitals.   This plan is set to evolve depending on how much we are able to raise. The more ambitious goal is to air ship supplies directly there (multiple times). Cost estimates and potential impact below (based on amazon prices--will also be researching wholesalers to improve quantities):  - $8000  can buy ~ 2200   N95 masks  that can be distributed to hospitals and quarantine facilities (to be used to protect nurses and doctors) - $8000  can buy  40000 flu masks  that will be distributed for civilian protection - $30000  can buy  7200 8 oz.  hand sanitizers -air ship cost: TBD. Placeholder for $5k for now.  Anything helps!! Thank you in advance!!Update Feb 13th: purchased and shipped 10 boxes of N95 masks via amazon ($1450)Update March 6th: first two boxes have arrived!!Upcoming plans: sending hand sanitizers to Wuhan directly to my cousins address for donations to local hospitals and schools.

title: Coronavirus Medical Equipment Donation Fund
description: We are a group of Juniors from Blair Academy NJ and are trying to raise funds to fight 2019-nCoV commonly known as the coronavirus.  These funds will be dedicated solely to purchasing medical supplies including N95/Surgical facemasks protective clothing and other required things. These supplies will go to not only Wuhan but also other hospitals within China that lack funds.  This is a global health emergency as stated by WHO and as such your donation will directly benefit not only China but other countries affected by this virus. Please consider donating.

title: Help corona virus evacuees get home!
description: My name is Lisa Peecher from Perris California and I am creating this campaign to raise money on behalf of my son Tyler Shepherd. This campaign donations will be spent by Tyler shepherd to provide food water diapers and traveling expenses for him and his family. I intend on making him the beneficiary where he will be able to withdraw the funds on his own behalf  Tyler Shepherd his wife and 1 year old son have been on lockdown for 16 days in Wuhan Hubei Province China despite having no symptoms related to the coronavirus.   The American embassy finally allowed them to travel back to America on a cargo aircraft to be with their family but they will be billed $1000 each for this flight to the US. Which is why we have raised our goal from $2000 to $3500. They are being flown to Omaha Nebraska where they will be quarantined for 14 days to ensure they are negative for the coronavirus.  They have to pay for this with no financial help from the government which is why we are seeking help for them.  After being quarantined they will have to travel to California to be reunited with their family. This money will help them buy food diapers water and necessities after their quarantine is over and they can return to their jobs. When they finally arrive I will give them the donations and they will be very happy for all the support  Any donations would mean the world to us. Thank you and god bless!

title: Impact Youth Club  for Wuhan - Fight Coronavirus
description: As you may have already seen on the news a recent outbreak of the coronavirus has already hospitalized at least 31211 people and has caused at least 637 deaths — with the vast majority of these cases identified in Hubei China where the first case of the virus was discovered.  These numbers are still growing everyday.  Healthcare workers are desperately trying to keep citizens healthy but supplies are needed to help contain the outbreak treat patients and protect front line workers.  This gofundme page is set up by IYC and Zongfan Liu from Princeton New Jersey with the goal of raising money for healthcare workers in my hometown  Wuhan China who is currently in urgent need of safety protective equipment due to the aforementioned reasons.  We will be sending the funds received to my affiliated Wuhan University Alumni Assocation of Greater New Work who will then purchase and ship coveralls (Tyvek suits) respirator masks goggles and face shields to hospitals in the Hubei province of China.  All proceeds will be withdrawn and be deposited to Zongfan Lius personal account first.   As soon as Zonfan Liu receive the fund she will send a check payable to Wuhan University Alumni Association of Great New York within 2 days.     To  learn more about the coronavirus outbreak visit   https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019    To learn more about Impact Youth club visit   https://www.impactyouthclub.com/

title: Help during the CoronaVirus outbreak.
description: As most of you know I recently moved to Vietnam to start a new chapter of my life.  Once my father passed away I knew even more-so that this change was needed in my life.  It’s something I was so desperate to do not only to change my life for the better  but to make myself and my family proud. Each day I wake up thankful tobe here thankful that I went through with this dream and continue to make my dad proud.   Since the CoronaVirus decided to appear not only has the world come to a stop still but also my mind and mental health as abruptly come crashing down. So much so I’ve contemplating giving up this dream completely so much so that Im sleep depriving myself so much so that anxiety and panic attacks have become second nature. Then I think about leaving again something I know will make me feel like an even bigger failure. During this outbreak it has left me uncertain of how I might continue to not only have a roof over my head  but cover basic needs such as food and water. The virus has stopped all schools from opening which in turn means us teachers are left with nothing. As it stands the schools are not due to open any time soon which does mean basic living necessities will be something I no longer have access to. Food and water will no longer be a viable option let alone having somewhere to live.    All I’m asking for is help in any way shape or form. Every penny counts and I will use whatever funds are raised to cover living expenses as well as manage to feed and water myself. Any further funds that I manage to raise will goto a charity that helps individuals in crisis situations. I don’t expect anyone to donate however if you choose to just know that i am beyond grateful. I will forever be truly thankful ??

title: Raising Money to Combat the Wuhan Corona Virus
description: Novel Coronavirus(2019-nCoV) is a new respiratory virus first identified in Wuhan a big transportation hub in China. The virus is highly contagious and its appearance during the peak of Chinese New Year has allowed it to spread to other cities. It has now passed SARS in deaths and is several times more infectious in its spread.  As of February 9 2020 according to the governments report in China 40710 people have been diagnosed with coronavirus 23589 people are suspected of being infected and 910 people have died.   These numbers increase every day and there have been no signs of slowing down. It is threatening the lives of hundreds of millions not only in China but around the world. China estimates that the peak of the infection rate will be around mid-February the most difficult time has yet to come. In all Chinese cities schools are delayed and all public facilities are shut down.  Due to the unexpected outbreak hundreds of millions of Chinese peoples lives are at stake.  Items such as: masks goggles and protective suits which are used to combat the spread of this disease are high in demand but low in supply. We need your help to fight against this devastating illness.  Were working with Chicago NW suburban Chinese Christian Church which is in connection with a Wuhan Church to organize the purchase and shipment to the hospitals in need. All money raised is going to be used to purchase those medical supplies for doctors in Wuhan. With your help we will make sure that doctors will have access to needed supplies in order to prevent the spread of the disease and save more lives.

title: Coronavirus Masks Appeal for Hong Kong
description: https://youtu.be/Ym6rxgYXJcs    Im a British medic who is here to plead for your support in my fight against coronavirus in Hong Kong.   Coronavirus is a clear and deadly threat to life in Hong Kong following the Hong Kong governments failure to adequately close the border with China.  Please help me in my quest to send surgical masks PPE to HongKongers so they can defend themselves against this Chinese plague.  HongKongers have suffered violent communism and life under treacherous rule for many months and now they face the prospect of death by this virus from Wuhan China.   All money raised will go towards buying surgical masks PPE and posting them to fellow medics in Hong Kong. Every £5 you donate can buy 50 surgical masks. Every £15 can buy 100 pieces of eye shield covers.  Questions you may ask:  1. How do you know the intended recipients of your campaign’s donations and whether you are in direct contact with them?  2. Do you have a clear plan for how you will ensure the donations are delivered directly to their intended recipient?   I am in direct contact with medical personnel in Hong Kong (who happen to be family) and I will be buying the masks here in the UK  which are already difficult to source ( only available to medics) and posting them to contacts there such as the Hong Kong Medical Association (HKMA) Singjai internet platform and Oxfam in Hong Kong . I have already successfully posted hundreds of masks via FedEx and they have arrived safely within a few days. It goes without saying that this is a not-for-profit operation this is pure charity. All relevant receipts will be kept and will be available to view on request. For direct contact: email: ycliu9367@gmail.com  Please help in my effort to save lives. Fight the virus Stand With Hong Kong.

title: Sending Medical Supplies to Defeat COVID-19
description: Coronavirus (COVID-19) is a growing global threat.  [Photo above shows the latest global picture of the spread of the COVID-19 (coronavirus) as of February 10 2020 ]   Many hospitals in regions of China are experiencing a shortage of medical protective supplies putting medical workers at risk and possibly contributing to the spread of the infection.  The students of the International Public Policy and Management (IPPAM) Program at the USC Price School of Public Policy seek to galvanize public support to assist medical workers in China who are on the frontlines in caring for patients.  Quick action now can have an impact on assisting hospitals and medical providers in China.  We have been in contact with the Shanghai and Jiangsu Center of Disease Control who have provided a list of medical supplies (surgical masks N95 and protective suits) needed by hospitals in their jurisdictions and who have agreed to distribute supplies sent to them.  We have also contacted manufacturers of supplies such as surgical masks in a number of countries who can ramp up production to increase the shipment of supplies to China.  We have contacted international and local logistics companies to help in the transport of the supplies.  We are launching a fundraising campaign on Go Fund Me.  The funds will be used to facilitate the purchase and transport of medical protective supplies that will be distributed to hospitals in China.   As global citizens we recognize that epidemics natural disasters and strife can strike anywhere. We believe that those outside of the crisis zone should come to the aid of those in need. We are part of an educational program that has many students and alumni from China. This is a time when we can let them know that we stand with them as they work to contain the epidemic. We hope that you will join us. Time is of the essence.  Please give what you can.  You will be able to track our efforts on the Go Fund Me page and on our social media sites.   We are in discussion with an NGO to jointly launch this campaign in order to have tax dedectible for every donor which will take some time. As soon as we add this NGO in we will let everyone know this good new.

title: Fundings to buy masks for hospitals in Wuhan
description: Hello everyone! We are a group of students of Wuhan! Some of us are back to their countries for quarantine but we want to help our city win this battle with the #coronavirus!! We decided to make this gofundme project to help with the little we can and buy some masks for hospitals in #Wuhan.      Chinese health officials reported on 2/29/2020 that there had been 2838 deaths from the outbreak and 79394 cases of the coronavirus.    Tons of medical workers are still struggling on the front line  the day and night battling with the virus and trying to save as many people as possible but they need to protect themselves first to do so!! We achieved our first goal and helped the first hospital but we are not going to stop and we want to continue helping with the help of our friends around the world.     With the money we already raised we sent an order for masks gloves and suits by the doctors of a hospital that arrived this 02/23/2020                    From February 29 to March 1 the Mercadito ON in Arica Chile together with volunteers from China invite you to be part of donations to help Jingxia District Red Cross Hospital to face the CoVid19 virus. Address: Anzuelo y Carbones Restaurant Camino Azapan n 4040 Arica Chile        Wuhan and China gave us a lot a home a job a place to study this is the moment to give back!! If you want to contribute for this cause share the link and thank you a thousand times!    Let’s fight together! Wuhan jiayou ????!           ¡Hola a todos! Somos un grupo de estudiantes de Wuhan! ¡Algunos de nosotros ya regresaron a sus países para la cuarentena pero queremos ayudar a nuestra ciudad a ganar esta batalla contra el #coronavirus! Decidimos hacer este proyecto de gofundme para ayudar con lo poco que podemos y comprar  materiales médicos para hospitales en #Wuhan.   Funcionarios de salud chinos informaron el 29/02/2020 que hubo 2838 muertes por el brote y 79394 casos de coronavirus.   Muchos doctores y enfermeros todavía están en la línea del frente el día y la noche luchando contra el virus y tratando de salvar a la mayor cantidad de personas posible ¡pero necesitan protegerse primero para hacerlo! Logramos nuestro primer objetivo y ayudamos al primer hospital pero no nos vamos a parar y queremos seguir ayudando con la ayuda de nuestros amigos en todo el mundo.   Con el dinero que ya recaudamos enviamos un pedido de mascarillas guantes y trajes por los doctores de un hospital que llegaron este 23/02/2020              Desde el 29 de Febrero hasta el 1 de Marzo el Mercadito ON de Arica Chile juntos con los voluntarios de China os invitan a ser parte de las donaciones en ayuda de Jingxia District Red Cross Hospital para enfrentar al virus CoVid19. Dirección: Restaurante Anzuelo y Carbones  Camino Azapan  n 4040 Arica Chile       Wuhan y China nos dieron mucho una casa un trabajo un lugar para estudiar ¡este es el momento de retribuir! Si quieres contribuir por esta causa comparte el enlace y ¡mil gracias! ¡Luchemos juntos! Wuhan jiayou ?? ??!

title: Yesenia Corona (Jackie)
description: Hello family and friends   On Saturday February 8 2020 at approximately 10:30 pm in Las Vegas NV my niece Jackie was involved in a hit and run accident. Her vehicle overturned and is now a complete loss. She was in the vehicle with her youngest son Jovanni Miraculously my nephew was not physically hurt as of now but we worry about psychological well being but Jackie was not quite so lucky. She suffered a dislocated shoulder broken collarbone shattered elbow broken ribs and extensive damage to her hand and fingers. She has undergone several hours of surgery to save her fingers which at one point they thought they would have to amputate. She will undergo more surgeries this coming week and will also require physical therapy. She currently remains in the ICU unit. Her husband is the only one employed at this time but Jackie would like him by her side which is understandable. I created this Go Fund Me account to raise funds to help with her family with medical bills expenses and child care. We are unsure at this time when she will return to work. Please help us by donating or sharing this post with friends and family members. We thank you very much for your support during these hard times.

title: Support Chinese Doctors Fighting Against COVID-19
Coronavirus Dancing Victims
description: The recent Coronavirus crisis has touched on every aspect of our lives and livelihoods.  And this epidemic has severely affected our beloved dance world.  From the cancellation of three major Asian Open competitions to the lockdown of an entire city and to the many travel restrictions in and out of Asia that has been set in place our world and especially our dance world has been severely impacted.  In the meantime one can only imagine how difficult it must be for some dancers in the Far East to dance find work and even continue to survive in the current conditions.  Some of them have lost all their work and income completely.  Studios are being closed down.  They are struggling to not only earn enough money but to even just stay healthy as some are even fighting the deadly virus.  These people these dancers are our colleagues students and friends.  They are suffering and struggling to survive!  We at the WDC Competitors Commission as well as the WDC and WDCAL would like to ensure that we do everything we can to help our fellow colleagues and dancers in the Far East.  We would have set up this GoFundMe page to help our fellow dancers in the Far East and we want to encourage our friends patrons vendors suppliers and colleagues from around the world to pull together and help one another in overcoming this crisis.  We are asking everyone to extend your hand and support for our fellow dancers.  Your donation will be a great help for the dancers that have been affected the most by this deadly virus in the epidemic city of Wuhan and other neighboring affected cities in the Hubei Province.    Your donations will be greatly appreciated and all donations will go to the NDC of China a member organization of the World Dance Council for distribution to those dancers that need it the most.  Any donation will go a long way for those greatly affected by this terrible virus! We at the WDC CC would like to thank you for your time consideration and support for your fellow dancer!  The Management Committee of the WDC Competitors Commission

title: Coronavirus Medical Supplies In Need
description: My hometown Wuhan is deeply affected by the coronavirus outbreak and my family members as healthcare professionals are working in Tongji hospital one of the major hospitals in the province helping with the infected patients. As of now the death toll from the coronavirus rose to roughly 1360 and the total confirmed cases worldwide surpassed 60000.  Tongji hospital is currently in great need of medical supplies including n95 masks surgical masks safety goggles surgical gloves etc. All medical personnel will start working full-time in the following weeks and all masks need to be changed every 4 hours to ensure their effectiveness. Therefore your donation of a small amount could prevent people from being endangered by the virus.   As the supplies have run out in stores we are fortunate to collaborate with Tzu Chi Medical Foundation located in Alhambra CA to get the medical supplies and donate them directly to the Tongji hospital in Wuhan.  Again your contribution is greatly greatly appreciated!

title: Help Save Lives from Coronavirus in Wuhan
description: The 2019 novel coronavirus (COVID-19) has infected 71334 people worldwide. 1775 people are now known to have died from the virus. Six health workers have died and 1716 have been infected since the outbreak. In Wuhan where the virus was first detected 242 people died on the 13th February alone.    As a group of academics at  Cardiff University  we are in solidarity with our fellow collaborators in  Hubei Cancer Hospital in Wuhan  who are working against the clock in fighting the coronavirus and saving lives. We particularly wish to support our Chinese colleagues by funding protective equipment for frontline medical staff due to their critical shortage of medical resources. These individuals are working tirelessly to protect us so it is vital that we protect them.     Before the outbreak Hubei Cancer Hospital was supporting us on various projects including early cancer diagnostics using circulating biomarkers and evaluation of cancer immunotherapy effectiveness. We had two PhD students working in Wuhan since November 2019 on these collaborative projects.    In view of the increasing number of coronavirus infected patients in Wuhan after the initial outbreak Hubei Cancer Hospital started to provide healthcare service to severely infected cases and reported their critical shortage of protective equipment.    All the donations will go solely to purchase NIOSH-certified N95 respirators and other protective equipment for medical staff in Hubei Cancer Hospital.  We hope more patients can receive effective treatment when adequate protective equipment is in place for medical staff. The control of the coronavirus in Wuhan is important to stop further transmission to the other countries.       The fundraising team of academics in Cardiff University aim to acquire the medical equipment using the fund and send it to Hubei Cancer Hospital by March 2020.  At the end of the fundraising we will circulate a report of the use of the fund to all contributors.   We are grateful for your support.   Lets battle the coronavirus together!    The fundraising team (click individual names to open profile pages):  Dr Xin Yang School of Engineering Cardiff University   Dr Xuan Wang School of Modern
