This fund is aimed at helping those in the Kansas City area who have had ONE gig cancelled due to COVID-19. The scheduled performance would have been in either Kansas or Missouri within the bounds of what is considered The Greater Kansas City Metropolitan area. Funds will be collected through April 30 and distributed equally to each musician who informs us of a legitimate gig that was cancelled in this area.  If you are an musician in need of funds  Click Here   to take our survey and apply for relief. Recipients names will not be published without his/her express permission yet will be verified by team members.   We can get through this together.  #kcmusicrelief

title: Australian Music Industry COVID-19 Relief Fund
description: Australian Music Industry COVID-19 Relief Fund (via SUPPORT ACT)    In times of crisis it is imperative that we stick together and help each other out in whatever ways we can. At present there are countless people across Australia that have fallen on hard times due to the COVID-19 Global Pandemic and the immense loss of income that has ensued is rising every day.   One industry that in the best interests of the country has essentially been shut down for the forseeable future is our Australian Music Industry. And whilst this is absolutely necessary the financial devastation caused to your average musician or crew member cannot be overstated.   For every concert   event that weve seen cancelled in recent days there are countless people losing work. Its not just the musicians up on stage but the sound   lighting engineers artist   tour managers crew members venue bookers concert promoters   many more who all of a sudden have no way to pay their bills or provide for their families.   These people need our help. And they need our help right now.     Thats why were partnering with ‘Support Act to raise funds so that financial grants can be delivered to those in need.    So for every person that had a concert ticket refunded. For every person that planned to attend a gig in the upcoming weeks   months. To all Australian music lovers (wherever you may be in the world!)   We call on you today to take a few of those dollars that you would have spent and DONATE TODAY to the Australian Music Industry COVID-19 Relief Fund.   Thank you to everyone for your incredible support of those in need through this difficult time.      HOW WILL THE MONEY BE DISTRIBUTED?:   * A special COVID-19 relief fund has been set up by Support Act to support people that work in the Australian Music Industry via grants to help them through this time of crisis. * Australian Music Industry workers can apply for financial grants from the wonderful Australian charitable organisation  Support Act  * Additional information on how to make a grant submission is available at: www.supportact.org.au     WHO IS THE MONEY GOING TO?:   * People that work in the Australian music industry that have fallen on hard times due to the loss of income/gigs/work caused by the complete shutdown of large sections of the music industry due to the COVID-19 Global Pandemic.    Examples of some of the people eligible (but not limited to) receive these grants include:   * Musicians (Bands and/or individual musicians) * Artist Managers * Sound   Lighting Engineers * Tour Managers * Merch Sellers * Roadies Drum/Guitar Techs   other crew members * Tour/Event Promoters  * Venue Bookers/Promoters * Publicists *   more     ABOUT SUPPORT ACT   Support Act is Australias only charity delivering crisis relief services to artists crew and music workers as a result of ill health injury a mental health problem or some other crisis that impacts on their ability to work in music.  Established in 1997 their goal is to provide breathing space to help members of the music industry to get back on track when they have hit a tough patch.  Their assistance can take the form of paying the rent or the mortgage buying a bed or wheel chair paying for car repairs medical / dental / phone / electricity bills or a credit card debt. We provide referrals to other support services; funding for funerals; and we support friends and family seeking to raise funds for an artist or music worker in crisis through our Help a Mate program.  For more information:  https://supportact.org.au/about-support-act/who-we-are/

title: Help the Circus Survive the Corona Virus
description: Unfortunately we are not in a good position to weather this unexpected global event. We are going to have to cut back on programming significantly and will loose almost all our income but we still have rent and bills to pay and Annie and Katherine are both entirely dependent on circus academy to live. Any help you can give is greatly appreciated. I am forever grateful to everyone who has supported us in our journey so far we never would have gotten where we are without you and I really hope that we can make it through this and have many more years of circus and community. $8000 is about one month of expenses for the circus academy. We are cutting back everything we can but some things we cannot.

title: Food for FL Children! (COVID-19 School Closings)
description: Please join us in raising money   awareness during these chaotic times to support the hungry children of South Florida!  In these moments of self-quarantining and self-reflection we decided to put our time and efforts towards a greater cause - supporting children with limited access and resources.   With over 46000 school closings in the United States due to COVID-19 many children run the risk of going hungry. Over 14.7 million public school children depend on the School Breakfast Program and over 30 million children depend on the National School Lunch Program as their sources of nutrition.   Most of us are fortunate enough to not have to worry about our next meal. Many others are not. Feeding South Florida (FSF) is currently serving over 700000 individuals in need of food assistance and during these difficult times FSF needs your financial support more than ever.   Any donation makes a difference! For as little as $1 Feeding South Florida can provide 6 meals.   Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your generosity - together we can make a difference.   Best  Salvador Juncadella   Michael Fernandez

title: COVID-19 Emergency Supplies for the Unhoused
description: In a time of crisis we can come together to support our most vulnerable community members. The unhoused population of Eugene/Springfield will be disproportionately affected by COVID-19 as thousands are currently living without shelter ability to quarantine or access to sufficient sanitation products and medical supplies. When basic public health advice is to stay home and you dont have one where do you turn?  Many of our unhoused neighbors are living with compromised immune systems and will be at higher risk for respiratory complications and dangerous symptoms. They are also facing the closures of many life saving services as agencies begin to close their doors.  Stop Death in the Streets in allegiance with the Lane County Mutual Aid Network are fundraising to get emergency shelters and sanitation supplies to our neighbors living on the streets.   The supplies we will be purchasing with the money raised are: - TENTS! (this is a top priority as unhoused folks need emergency shelter to quarantine and recover) - Hand sanitizer - Nitrile gloves - Sanitation wipes - Personal tissue packs - Masks for those with symptoms  Please donate! If you have any of these items on hand and would rather donate that way any of these items can be dropped off at White Bird Main Clinic on 341 E 12th St. (Drops can happen from 8am-10pm any day of the week)  Thank you for your donation!  ********************************* Lane County Mutual Aid Network is an open grassroots and all volunteer effort operating on stolen Kalapuya land in the South Willamette Valley. They can be found on Facebook (Lane County Mutual Aid Network) or Instagram (@lanecountymutualaid). Get involved if you have needs or resources to share during this time. A crisis is not a time to isolate and hoard resources and there are many ways to show care and support while still practicing social distancing.

title: COVID-19 WOC Artists Relief Fund
description: Dear Givers   This fund is specifically for women of color working artists or creatives that have been directly impacted financially in light of COVID-19.   Whether it be performances teaching artist gigs freelancing or any other creative income many artists have had an unexpected loss of revenue without a definitive date for resuming consistent compensation. Taking into consideration race and gender women of color have been disproportionately affected by the economic disparities that the pandemic continues to highlight. What this fund aims to do is relieve immediate needs of women of color through financial support: whether that be rent groceries technical device bills medical needs etc.   As we are in what feels like the height of an era -- women of color artists/creatives continue to do the unimaginable work of telling the story resisting oppression and using art to liberate our society. It is important to protect the voices that are our worlds pillars and yet the most vulnerable in regards to  systemic oppression.    We are asking you to contribute what you are able to to help meet the needs of WOC artists. If you are in the position to give please know that any offering will provide both practical and drastic help for people. No amount is too small and every penny counts towards the survival and sustenance for women of color creatives. It is because of your giving that we can continue to carry on into our next breath.   With sincerity and urgency we thank you for your support during this time of need. Your contribution shifts worlds and lives that you may or may not be able to witness. We offer you much gratitude wish you good health and hope for you protected health.   Thank you thank you and thank you.  Sincere regards Ramya Ramana

title: Io non resto a guardare STOP COVID-19
description: Cè bisogno di qualcosa di più forte un imponente messaggio  a tutte le persone che stanno lottando contro il nuovo coronavirus un  gesto solidale  verso i malati e tutti i medici che stanno combattendo giorno e notte questa guerra.  Trasformiamo lo slogan  #iorestoacasa  in un messaggio proattivo...  E allora  #IONONRESTOAGUARDARE.   Stiamo vivendo un momento drammatico dove ogni giorno i numeri ci raccontano una situazione che continua a peggiorare. In questo delicato contesto di emergenza nazionale vogliamo lanciare un grido di speranza con un caloroso appello dalla nostra piccola Regione... dalle Marche lItalia chiamò!  Non rimaniamo a casa a guardare la tv ma rimaniamo a casa a dare una mano.    Un piccolo gesto per un grande obiettivo!   Con i  fondi raccolti  saremo in grado di: • rinforzare i  10 reparti di terapia intensiva  degli ospedali marchigiani • attivare  10 ventilatori  per la Protezione Civile • fornire  100.000   mascherine certificate   • distribuire il  nuovo test rapido Covid-19  • assistere gli  anziani  con la consegna di pasti e medicine a domicilio   100.000 euro per 1.5 milioni di vite!    *******************************************  Lets transform the slogan  #Istayathome  into something stronger a  massive message  to all the people who are fighting the new coronavirus a  gesture of solidarity  towards the sick and all the doctors who are fighting this war day and night.  So the slogan becomes  #dontstandbyandwatch .  We are experiencing a dramatic situation where every day the numbers tell us about a situation that continues to get worse. In this delicate moment of national emergency we want to launch a cry of hope with a warm appeal from our small  Marche Region .  We dont stay at home to watch TV but we stay at home to help out.   A small gesture for a big goal!   With the  funds raised  we will be able to: • reinforce the  10 intensive care units  of the Marche hospital • activate  10 respiratory ventilator  to the Civil Protection • supply  millions of certified masks  • distribute the  new Covid-19 rapid test  • assist the  elderly  with the delivery of meals and medicines at home   100.000 euros for 1.5 million lives!    ***************************************  Transformamos el eslogan  #mequedoencasa  en algo más fuerte un  mensaje imponente  para todas las personas que luchan contra el nuevo coronavirus un  gesto de solidaridad  hacia los enfermos y todos los médicos que luchan esta guerra día y noche.  Entonces el eslogan se convierte en  #notequedesmirando .  Estamos experimentando una situación dramática donde cada día los números nos informan sobre una situación que continúa empeorando. En este delicado momento de emergencia nacional queremos lanzar un grito de esperanza con un cálido llamamiento de nuestra pequeña  Región Marche .  No nos quedamos en casa para ver televisión pero nos quedamos en casa para ayudar.   Un pequeño gesto para un gran gol!   Con los fondos recaudados podremos: • reforzar las  10 unidades de cuidados intensivos hospitalarios de Marche • activar 10 fanáticos de la Protección Civil  • suministrar  100.000 máscaras certificadas  • distribuir la  nueva prueba rápida Covid-19  • ayudar a los  ancianos  con la entrega de comidas y medicinas en el hogar   ¡100.000 euros por 15 millones de vidas!

title: Covid-19 - Combatti il Nemico della tua Gente
description: La pandemia da coronavirus Covid-19 (Sars-Cov2) sta mettendo in ginocchio la nostra nazione.Il sistema sanitario è prossimo al collasso.Aiutiamo i nostri ospedali affinché tutti abbiamo il diritto di essere curati.TUTTI DEVONO AVERE LA POSSIBILITÀ DI POTER DIRE CE LA FAREMO.L’Italia è una grande nazione: DIMOSTRIAMOLO.Il gruppo TI PRESENTO L’AMSTAFF presenta questa raccolta fondi affinché tutti possano sperare di rivedere i propri cari quando tutto sarà finito.

title: COVID-19 aiutiamo lINRCA e gli anziani fragili!
description: Noi ricercatori INRCA vogliamo sostenere il nostro Istituto non solo con le competenze che mettiamo in campo ogni giorno ma anche attraverso questa raccolta fondi per  acquistare velocemente beni di consumo e attrezzature .  In ospedale tali materiali a causa della pandemia di Coronavirus non bastano mai.  Per fronteggiare la  drammatica emergenza  di questi giorni  che colpisce in modo più profondo gli anziani fragili  mandiamo il nostro  messaggio di speranza con un aiuto concreto  che possa supportare le sedi marchigiane quella in Lombardia (Casatenovo) e in Calabria (Cosenza).  I fondi raccolti verranno trasferiti direttamente sul conto corrente dellINRCA senza alcun intermediario.  Ogni donazione anche piccola può fare la differenza.   AIUTIAMOLI AD AIUTARE   Grazie    We are the INRCA researchers and we want to support our Institute not only with the expertise we put in place every day but also through this fundraising  to quickly buy consumer goods and equipment .  In hospitals such materials due to the Coronavirus pandemic are never enough.  In order to face the  dramatic emergency  of these days that  affects the frail elderly in a deeper way  we send our  message of hope with concrete help  that can support the hospital facilities of INRCA in the Marche region the one in Lombardy (Casatenovo) and Calabria (Cosenza).  The funds collected will be transferred directly to the INRCA bank account without any intermediary.  Every donation even a small one can make a difference.   LETS HELP THEM   Thanks

title: COVID 19 and then some.
description: It has taken a big cut in my personal pride to post this at all.  So many people in my industry are affected right now with everything shutting down. But my troubles start well before COVID 19 showed up and I feel like I have little choice.   2020 has been rough for a lot of us. For me it started several weeks early. I moved back to Oregon at the beginning of the year with the plan to find a job and a home for my wife and I. The job market was a bigger challenge than I had ever expected. Portland was shutting down more bars and restaurants than there were positions to apply for.   Right as I was done signing a lease for an apartment my wife called me to let me know that she had decided to stay in Indiana and was filing for divorce. That was hard enough news but she was also taking the majority of our savings with her.   Staying diligent I kept applying and picked up shifts here and there to cover my new bills albeit barely I made it work for a short time.  Then the moving company arrived - and conned me out of thousands of dollars of hidden fees and even lost 7 boxes that still haven’t been found (mostly kitchen things) and damaged almost everything else.  That brings us to this week.  I got a job! Yesterday was my last day of training at Retro Game Bar in Portland.  The next part you know COVID 19. Affecting our entire industry. My new place of work it’s bars sales hit the floor hard and has now decided to run a skeleton crew. Pending a probable closure for the foreseeable future I haven’t even worked a shift with tips yet and now the owner says he can only promise me 2 shifts per week if we’re open. (Governed Brown is expected to announce closers to bars and restaurants on 03/16 indefinitely)  I am frightened of paying April rent in the next 2 weeks let alone Mays rent if there is significant lost work in April and my cupboards are strikingly bare.  The goal number I chose is enough to pay April’s rent various utilities/insurance bills and groceries.   If your are in a position to help thank you. I don’t know 100% how to repay those who can but if anyone sends more than $20 I will in return donate myself to host a private party as your bartender at any time in 2020. Providing myself tools and ice (and when possible a bottle of something nice to cheers you with)

title: Corona Income Supplement
description: So many people are being caught between a rock and a hard place in this pandemic. Many have had their share of hardships this past year. Living overseas only further complicates matters. That being the case we aim to help make sure the social distancing/lack of childcare does not put one family Leah and Randal in any dire straights. The challenge of being a single parent only multiply when school or daycare is canceled. Please consider giving to help make sure this family can meet their base expenses during these uncertain times.

title: Ayudemos al personal sanitario del COVID-19
description: ¿Dónde duermen los héroes después de salvar vidas?   Ayúdanos a ayudar al personal de nuestras UCIS a descansar de forma  segura para ellos y para sus familiares  evitando poner en riesgo de contagio a las personas con las que comparten domicilio.   A estas alturas ya sabemos que los grandes héroes de la lucha contra el COVID-19 están siendo los  trabajadores de nuestro sistema sanitario.   El personal de las UCIS (enfermeros celadores médicos auxiliares técnicos limpiadores…) está trabajando al pie del cañón día y noche con muy pocos recursos y sin descanso para cuidarnos y ayudar a salir adelante a nuestros enfermos. Sin embargo cuando los largos turnos terminan y toca descansar se enfrentan al  miedo de poner en peligro de contagio  a sus hijos padres hermanos parejas o compañeros de piso.   El miedo por contagiar a un familiar al llegar a casa es tal que algunos incluso han tomado la iniciativa de  pagar un piso de alquiler  con su propio sueldo para evitar poner en riesgo a sus seres queridos.  Por esa razón creemos que ahora más que nunca es nuestra responsabilidad ayudar a quienes nos están cuidando. Hemos creado este fondo donativo para poder ofrecerles:      -  Una habitación donde descansar de forma segura y sin miedo durante al menos 20 días en un hotel aparta-hotel u hostal      -  Comida para todos los turnos de trabajo    TODOS los fondos recaudados serán donados directamente para estos fines.    Esta iniciativa tiene como objetivo ayudar en un primer paso al personal sanitario de UCIS de la Comunidad de Madrid. No obstante con la ayuda de todos trabajaremos para ampliarla al resto de comunidades afectadas.    Estamos negociando con  distintas cadenas hoteleras  y de alojamiento de todo Madrid con el objetivo de beneficiar al  mayor número de personas . Si tienes algún c argo en el sector hotelero  y puedes ayudarnos por favor contacta con nosotros.   Hoy como todos los días aplaude fuerte y  colabora con tu donativo para demostrar que estás con nuestros héroes.   Es momento de agradecer a nuestros sanitarios y mostrar todo el cariño y apoyo que merecen por su labor. Es momento de estar más unidos que nunca.   Cualquier donativo por muy pequeño que sea marcará la diferencia.    DONA Y COMPARTE   **  Mantente informado sobre nuestra campaña en: Instagram:  @losheroestienenmiedo   Facebook:  @losheroestienenmiedo   Twitter:  @heroesconmiedo    Si quieres ayudar con ideas o propuestas por favor contacta con nosotros en el correo losheroestienenmiedo@gmail.com

title: COVID19 sostieni lOspedale di Città di Castello
description: Data lemergenza attuale causata dal Corona virus crediamo sia importante unire le nostre forze per raggiungere un obiettivo comune.  LAzienda Tartufi Jimmy Srl ha organizzato questa raccolta fondi al fine di supportare lospedale di Città di Castello in particolare il reparto di terapia intensiva e rianimazione.  Ognuno di noi può contribuire con una piccola donazione facendo la differenza.   Aiutateci condividendo il link sui tuoi social.  Quello che facciamo è solo una goccia nelloceano ma loceano senza quella goccia sarebbe più piccolo.   - Maria Teresa di Calcutta

title: Raccolta fondi - Ospedale di Chivasso - COVID19
description: OSPEDALE DI CHIVASSO- RACCOLTA FONDI PER REPARTO TERAPIA COVID19 La Farmacia San Mauro di Settimo Torinese ha lanciato una raccolta fondi con lobiettivo di raggiungere e superare 20.000€ entro il 25 Marzo da devolvere interamente al Reparto di Terapia dellOspedale di Chivasso per fronteggiare lattuale emergenza Covid19.  Cerchiamo di dare tutti il nostro contributo.

title: EMERGENZA COVID-19 AIUTACI A PROTEGGERTI
description: LAssociazione Volontari del Soccorso Croce Bianca Torri del Benaco onlus è impegnata h 24 in questa emergenza Covid -19.  Come ormai a conoscenza di tutti il personale sanitario ha il maggior rischio di contagio ciò significherebbe che autisti volontari ed infermieri potrebbero contrarre il virus essendo in primis a rischio per lincolumità personale e conseguentemente non riuscire ad offrire lassistenza necessaria ed  obbligatoria in questo momento di emergenza. Lunico sistema per prevenire e ridurre questo rischio è lutilizzo del D.P.I.  il costo notevole per lacquisto ci fa promuovere questa richiesta di solidarietà. VI CHIEDIAMO DI CONTRIBUIRE A SALVARE  LE VOSTRE VITE E DEI VOSTRI CARI

title: Ella Covid-19 Italy
description: This is not an easy step for me to take but I need help.    Im Irish living in Italy. Corona virus has rocked my world.  Im  not entitled to any assistance. My work have said that they cant honour my contract and from next month I have no idea how Im going to pay the bills. Or realistically return to Ireland and start all over again.  I fundraised for different organisations over the years...I have always said if everyone gave a euro its not about the big bucks!   So... Im  asking.... for a euro. 1€  Not to put too fine a point on it... but i have no income. I dont want to spell out all that that entails. This is a very difficult decision for me. Embarrassing.  And Im  sure for my family... but needs must. I have no alternative.  On a positive note... if EVERYONE i knew gave me a euro I could help other people out who are in the same situation as me. Pay it forward so to speak.  I never thought I would be in this situation... but I know Im not the only one.  So... I leave it to you. Xxx

title: Café Tango  Corona Hilfe
description: Liebe Freunde des Café Tango  Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation bleibt das Café Tango geschlossen. Wie lange das so sein wird weiss niemand. Schaut regelmässig auf unsere Seite oder bei Facebook rein. Ich hoffe sehr dass wir bald wieder arbeiten können.  Einige von Euch sind im laufe der Woche auf mich zugekommen mit der Frage wie wo man uns finanziell unterstützen kann damit das Café Tango erhalten bleiben kann. Aus einigen wurden einige mehr was mich sehr berührt hat. Hier könnt Ihr das tun. Ein riesen grosses von Herzen kommendes „ Muchas Gracias „ !!!  Bleibt mir gesund und seid mir alle umarmt Luis Rodriguez

title: Hoe kun je Sense helpen in tijden van Corona..
description: Sense Restaurant al 12 jaar bieden wij onze gasten met heel veel liefde en plezier een culinair welkom en zijn we door Michelin in 2020 wederom en voor de negende maal bekroond met een ster!  Zonder onze gasten kunnen wij als onderneming simpelweg niet bestaan. De reden dat Chef Dennis Middeldorp dag in dag uit samen met zijn team de sterren van de hemel kookt is voor jullie onze gasten.  De realiteit is dat we de komende 3 weken geen van onze gasten mogen verwelkomen de impact daarvan is direct voelbaar salarissen   leveranciers zullen niet kunnen worden betaald. Niet omdat we geen solide bedrijf zijn wel omdat het gat wat nu valt te groot is om even op te vangen.   We roepen jullie hulp in voor de continuiteit van Sense Restaurant help onze dit gat op te vangen; salarissen en leveranciers zullen met jullie hulp betaald kunnen worden en dat is essentieel om deze klap op te kunnen vangen.   Wat krijgen jullie terug voor jullie steun? Naast intense dankbaarheid een tegoedbon t.w.v. hetzelfde bedrag wat geïnvesteerd is én een glas champagne wanneer we samen vieren dat we er nog zijn. En zullen blijven. De eerste van de maand april zullen we starten met het uitgeven van de cadeaubonnen en nemen we contact met je op!   Wil je een gift geven? Doneer dan anoniem :-)  In tijden van nood hebben we elkaar nodig laten we er zijn voor elkaar. Voor nu blijf veilig en zorg goed voor je naasten!  Dank  inmense dank en hopelijk tot snel.  Warme groet  Dennis Middeldorp   team Sense   www.senserestaurant.nl

title: Covid19 Alloggi Gratis per Operatori Sanitari Roma
description: *ENGLISH VERSION BELOW*Ciao a tutti!! Siamo Simone e Sara due giovani ragazzi di 27 anni e gestiamo insieme 3 locazioni turistiche a Roma. Siamo genitori di due bambini: Mattia di 7 anni e Davide di 2 che non vediamo lora di far tornare a correre nei prati. Inutile dirlo siamo preoccupati in primis per la nostra salute e poi per il nostro futuro. Abbiamo tante spese e attualmente zero entrate.A causa dellavanzare del Coronavirus tutte le nostre strutture sono naturalmente chiuse al turismo e così abbiamo pensato di trovare un lato positivo nellavere gli appartamenti sfitti: renderli disponibili a medici e infermieri che stanno lavorando ininterrottamente negli ospedali per noi. Siamo vicinissimi allOspedale Bambin Gesù ma anche allospedale Santo Spirito e Fatebenefratelli. Chiediamo il vostro aiuto perchè vogliamo offrire GRATUITAMENTE i nostri appartamenti ai medici ma abbiamo dei costi da coprire (affitti utenze e finanziamenti) poichè non siamo proprietari delle mura. Gli appartamenti sono disponibili da subito fino a fine emergenza e hanno tutti una cucina completa una camera da letto matrimoniale e un bagno. Siamo aperti a consigli e suggerimenti.Se conoscete associazioni o operatori sanitari che si occupano di questa problematica o che hanno bisogno di alloggio vicino a gli ospedali contattateci!! Se siete invece proprietari o gestori di altre strutture ricettive a Roma e volete partecipare alliniziativa scriveteci!!Vi terremo aggiornati.ANCHE UNA PICCOLA DONAZIONE PUO FARE LA DIFFERENZA!!!AIUTATECI ad AIUTARE. SARA   SIMONE Hello to all!! We are Simone and Sara two young boys of 27 years old and we manage 3 tourist locations in Rome together. We are parents of 2 children 7 years old Mattia and Davide 2 who we cant wait to get back to running in the meadows. Needless to say we are primarily concerned about our health and then about our future. We have a lot of expenses and currently zero income.Due to the advancement of the Coronavirus all our structures are naturally closed to tourism and so we thought of finding a positive side in having vacant apartments: making them available to doctors and nurses who are working continuously in hospitals for us. We are very close to the Bambin Gesù Hospital but also to the Santo Spirito and Fatebenefratelli hospital. We ask for your help because we want to offer our apartments for FREE to doctors but we have costs to cover (rents utilities and financing) as we do not own the walls. The apartments are available immediately until the end of the emergency. The apartments all have a full kitchen a double bedroom and a bathroom. We are open to advice and suggestions if you know associations or doctors and nurses who deal with this problem or who need accommodation near hospitals contact us !! If on the other hand you are the owners or managers of other accommodation facilities in Rome and you want to participate in the initiative write us !!We will keep you posted EVEN A SMALL DONATION CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE !!!HELP US TO HELP. SARA   SIMONE

title: COVID19 sosteniamo lospedale di Scafati
description: Raccolta fondi per acquisto dispositivi protezione individuale a favore degli operatori dellospedale di Scafati

title: United against COVID19 - San Paolo Hospital Milan
description: Hi everyone  As you all know my homeland of Italy is currently going through an incredibly tough moment due to the rapid rise in the rate of COVID-19 infections. Especially the northern region of  Lombardys overstretched healthcare system  is nearing a breaking point under the weight of the severely ill people.   My sister and her husband work in the  Intensive Care Unit at the San Paolo Hospital in Milan assisting COVID-19 patients where there is a critical shortage of medical equipment and suppli es.   Every day and night there the medical staff work tirelessly and put their own life and health at great risk to assist those in need even though they often lack the tools to give their patients a chance at recovery. Despite all these efforts  the numbers of affected people keep rising and the need for more intensive care beds respirators and ventilators continues to rise as well.    I would like to ask all of you for a little contribution to help the San Paolo Hospital and their medical staff  to enlarge their intensive care capacity.  Your contributions will go directly to the official fundraising account of the hospital and all proceeds will be used towards the  purchase of ventilators beds and other critical care equipment for the San Paolo Hospital Intensive Care Unit.    The cost of a new ventilator is around €17000 Euros. I hope to raise €1700.000 which would allow the hospital to purchase 100 machines. Based on an average 3 week hospital length of stay  this number of ventilators could help save over 1700 lives over a course of a year.    Please remember that in this  extraordinary moment of need even a small donation makes a huge difference and affords someone severely ill a chance to live . So please donate as little or as much as you can.  Thank you so much for your solidarity and your generosity.   Keep safe Francesca

title: Single Mothers in South Africa affected by COVID19
description: South Africa is starting emergency procedures to respond to COVID19.  Domestic workers in South Africa often single mothers will be on the frontline of many dramatic social changes that need to take place to prevent escalation of the virus.    What do we know already?     1      Cleaning your hands regularly is of utmost importance.    2      Social distancing is key - that means keeping a 6 foot distance from           the nearest person wherever possible.  Thousands of domestic workers in South Africa travel by public transport in cramped minibuses to get to work.   They are not covered by medical aid and paid leave planned for such extraordinary times unlikely.     This go fund me initiative is to raise money that will help alleviate the burden of COVID19 on domestic workers who are single mothers.    The minimum wage for a domestic worker is R15 per hour (around $1).  Minimum wage per month for a 40 hour work week will be R2500 (around $160).    It is envisaged that a $250 care package per single mother would enable them to take a month of paid leave and buy sufficient sanitary equipment (soap hand sanitiser etc) to take care of themselves and their extended families in terms of handwashing and cleaning surfaces that may have been contaminated by the virus.     What will your money help to do?     Your money will help 500 single mothers buy the necessary supplies to keep their hands clean and sanitise their surrounds and family as best they can; and take leave to remain at home for four weeks and encourage as much social distancing as possible.    These mothers will also be able to participate in free online sessions offered by the host of this go fund me platform to learn about hand washing and offer a more general support basis during COVID19 crises

title: Fueling a Dope Black Bartender During COVID-19
description: This is my sister Ashley. She is an incredible and dope human living in Washington D.C. working her way through life and college at Howard University. She’s an artist bartender and kinesiology scholar studying the connection between physical health and wellness in the Black Community.   For the past few years my sister has worked 50+ hours a week in the food service industry and gone to school full time in order to finish her degree at Howard. She is resilient and brilliant in all of the ways possible.   In January rising school bills forced Ashley to take a semester off from her studies to focus on work. With her break from studies she lost her health insurance and other student benefits. With social distancing my sister will lose her main source of income with no relief promised. She’s a bartender/server at a really awesome restaurant but with social distancing / restaurants closing she’s worried about paying essential bills and buying necessities.  I’m hoping this fund can provide her some relief and cushion while she is forced to “rest” for the first time in years.

title: Aiutiamo la Campania contro il Covid19
description: Ciao a tutti ! Sono Daniela Nuzzo  una ragazza di Salerno . Ho creato questa raccolta fondi per lemergenza che tutti noi oggi ci troviamo ad affrontare per il CORONAVIRUS e per sostenere nel nostro piccolo con un contributo anche di 5€ la regione campania! In occasione del mio compleanno  il 24 marzo  il regalo più grande da ricevere da voi amici  persone che mi vogliono bene o chiunque voglia è quello di donare !  Come singoli possiamo fare tanto  ma tutti insieme ancor di più . Lintero ammontare delle donazioni verrà versato sulliban della regione campania. Grazie di cuore a tutti! Vi abbraccio!  #andràtuttobene Daniela

title: Support Quill While Closed For COVID-19 Pandemic
description: Dear friends  Allison and Matthew here co-owners of Quill Books   Beverage a coffeeshop bookstore bar community space and LGBTQIA safer space in Westbrook Maine.  We had to make a hard decision to close due to the COVID-19 pandemic today and how rapidly it is spreading in Maine. What should have been an easy decision was difficult because as a small business with tight margins we want to continue being a community space for a long time to come. Ultimately we had to make the right decision for the safety of our community even if we aren’t sure how we will get through the next month. Our overhead is high. We depend on every day’s sales and our weekly events.    Our goal amount covers paying our employees through Friday April 3rd paying April rent and utilities and our April 5th payment of our small business loan.  We know there are a lot of people in need right now. But if you feel like chipping in the $5 you would have spent on a latte this week or the $10 you would have spent on lunch we will be forever grateful. Additionally you can email us to purchase gift cards (we can mail them!) or a $20 three book deal based on books you’ve enjoyed delivered to your home (within ~25 min of Westbrook we’re still working out the radius).      We will continue to focus on how we can promote community while we are all isolated and try our best to offer virtual events (details to come). We will use our social media platforms to keep the Quill community connected. If you can’t donated now but benefit from these things later feel free to come back and leave a donation if you can. Stay tuned on our social media pages to keep updated.   Stay safe everyone we can’t wait to see you when we’re back. So much love to you all.   Allison   Matthew

title: Croce Rossa Italiana Com. BassoLario - Covid-19
description: Prendiamoci cura di chi ci cura! Il Comitato Basso Lario della Croce Rossa Italiana ha attivato questa raccolta fondi per lacquisto di materiale sanitario indispensabile per continuare a garantire i servizi sul territorio (Cernobbio Maslianico e comuni limitrofi) in risposta all’emergenza Covid-19 (Coronavirus).  Difendi chi ci difende! Contribuisci allacquisto di  mascherine monouso   guanti monouso   camici monouso    tute protettive monouso   sanificanti per mezzi e ambienti  e  gel disinfettanti  a base alcolica.  Aiutaci ad aiutare! I Volontari lo fanno gratis da anni 24 ore su 24 7 giorni su 7. Per Cernobbio Maslianico Moltrasio Carate Urio Laglio Brienno Argegno ma anche Sagnino e Ponte Chiasso.  Chi sono Sono volontario della Croce Rossa Italiana e socio volontario del Comitato CRI Basso Lario. Tutti i fondi raccolti vengono donati ed inviati automaticamente al Comitato CRI Basso Lario unico beneficiario di questa iniziativa. Tutti i fondi raccolti saranno destinati allacquisto di materiale sanitario di consumo necessari a garantire ai Volontari Soccorritori la massima sicurezza nellespletamento del loro servizio.

title: COVID-19 Quirks Animals Need Your Support
description: Quirks Animal Roadshows needs help through the business loss caused by COVID -19.   Quirks Animal Roadshows are a family run business that provides enriching education through providing fun and informative animals handling sessions to groups such as schools nursing homes parties libraries and at public events. We have many animals including: Snakes lizards amphibians tortoises guinea pigs chickens tenrec and invertebrates. Find more info about us at  www.QuirksAnimalRoadshows.co.uk   or through Facebook.  W e have started to have cancellations of bookings due to the threat of the Corona virus.  If the schools and public events are cancelled  we will be faced with very little income coming in through our business but we will still have to pay out the £36 A DAY that it costs us to look after the animals.   We are asking our friends family and community to support us through this difficult time to help us to feed and maintain our animals. We do not want to have to be faced with making the decision to close our business. Closing the business would result in the animals being rehomed to already struggling rescue facilities or being euthanised in the event of those facilities being full. We love our animals as family members and we love seeing the joy and education they bring to our community.   If you donate to us the funds will be used to pay for animal feed electricity bill for keeping them warm and lighting replacing UV and heating bulbs as needed animal bedding supplements and vet care etc.   £36 a day equates to approximately £1000 a month in running costs. We are hoping that this fundraiser will help us keep the animals happy and cared for through the next 3 months of uncertainty. This does not include the cost of our human family expenses.   We are very grateful for every single donation no matter the size.   Thank you   Luke Kayleigh Lily Noah Bluebell Nehemiah and all of our wonderful animals who are as yet blissfully unaware of the Corona virus. xxx

title: The Bodega - 1 Year Anniversary (Surviving Corona)
description: In March 2019 we flung open the doors of the Bodega.  It was a leap of faith and an exercise in complete trust as we followed what we believe to be a call to create a space.  It was our biggest hope that people would find a place they could feel at home that peace would be present here while people took a pause to connect and that community would be built around things that matter.   This there will be miracles sign has been placed somewhere in plain view since the beginning.  It became both our prayer and our statement of faith about this space.  There would be miracles.    And the miracles have certainly come provision from unlikely places a pay it forward wall that went viral but most of them in the form of people who have graced us with their presence shared with us their stories and changed us by being a part of our life.    I could and will attempt to tell you stories of some of those people on our facebook page in the upcoming days ... and will attach a copy here of the words we write as we revisit a years worth of goodness.    We had big plans of celebrating our FIRST birthday this weekend with balloons and cupcakes and all of our favorite peeps our new tribe that we love so much!  But as you know our world has taken a bit of a sideways turn for a minute and we are dealing with things we couldnt have possibly seen coming.    The COVID-19 virus has presented this very young business with some pretty significant challenges to overcome on our first birthday.    In good conscience we cannot ask people to come buy coffee and treats right now and gather in the space that we created for people to gather.  So as you can imagine for a business that thrives on and was completely built around people connecting and gathering - our business model is certainly walking with a limp for a minute.    And in the spirit of honestly and transparency - all of my eggs are in this basket - I am fully invested with every dime Ive got - and it wont take very many days to feel the effects of that deeply.    So - we had already planned on putting up a Go Fund Me for our one year anniversary to ask the folks who have become part of our tribe and anyone else who might be willing to support the dream and the goodness that it is extending to our community and to the world - to come alongside Phase 2 and help us expand and grow.    And I contemplated not sharing it with you -- especially during this time or completely reworking the whole thing -- but I talked to my baristas and we decided that this can be hope and faith in action and reminds us all that we are gonna survive this and be here to move forward with Phase 2 and big dreams and helping even more people.    So we have dreams - lots of them including an expanded bakery that helps employ folks who are in transition from recovery or foster care a mobile coffee truck that serves the vulnerable as well as pops up around town serving those who are doing good work a coffee cart for events and fundraisers more events and projects that we collectively participate in to help our community and much more.  The dreams are plentiful for sure - and they WILL continue.   But while our dreams are plentiful - and we have done our best to create transparent and authentic community - we need to be honest with you and tell you that we also certainly have some needs at this point.   What we know to be true is that just a little bit from a lot of folks goes such a long way - so we are doing what is more than a lot uncomfortable to do - and we are asking for our tribe to come alongside us for year 2.    Lets do this tribe.  I believe in us.  On to year 2 of drinking good coffee and doing good work.

title: Urban Standard lost wages due to Covid-19
description: We are doing our best to keep our Birmingham community safe by closing our shop for two weeks to hopefully slow down the transmission of Covid-19 throughout our community.  Our small staff is taking a large financial hit. We love serving our community and giving everyone great coffee but we think that right now the better thing to do for everyone is to close for the time being. We understand that so many people are taking large sacrifices during this time and we are so grateful. If you have any money to donate or are fortunate enough to work from home we would be very appreciative of your donation. If not and youre in this scary time with us we will do everything to be here for you all as well!   Thank you all for your support over the years and we hope to be back up and running soon. We love our Birmingham community and feel free to reach out if any other small businesses need help in any way!   Thanks   Urban Standard Family

title: Croce Rossa Castiglione della Pescaia vs Covid-19
description: * * * EMERGENZA CORONA VIRUS * * *   AIUTACI AD AIUTARE!  La Croce Rossa Italiana è attiva su tutto il territorio nazionale per rispondere allemergenza Covid-19 fin dai primissimi momenti dellemergenza.   In questi giorni di piena emergenza il Comitato di Castiglione della Pescaia è impegnato con:  - soccorso emergenza/urgenza (attraverso il servizio 118) sul territorio e circondario  - supporto alla Sala Operativa Regionale  - servizio di consegna farmaci e generi di prima necessità in collaborazione col Comune.    I nostri volontari possono fare tutto questo solo se adeguatamente protetti e rispettando i protocolli di emergenza.   Per questo ti chiediamo un aiuto per acquistare MASCHERINE CAMICI MONOUSO GUANTI E ALTRO MATERIALE SANITARIO per gli operatori dotazione indispensabile in questa situazione di emergenza.   Se si preferisce fare donazione tramite Iban direttamente queste le coordinate bancarie:  Iban: IT40I0306972214100000003673  causale: Emergenza Covid-2019       Se vuoi maggiori informazioni contattaci!  Croce Rossa Italiana - Comitato di Castiglione della Pescaia  Piazza Orsino Orsini 11 - Castiglione della Pescaia (GR)  0564933050   #stiamoacasa  #andràtuttobene  #iltempodellagentilezza

title: Help Feed and Support Those Impacted by COVID19
description: Hi everyone!  A few days ago I posted on two local COVID19 community response facebook groups in addition to my own account offering to provide free meal prep to people who are unable to leave the house for safety reasons or are in dire need of food during the pandemic.   For more information please see the original post that I shared on my personal account here:   Original Post    Since posting many people have offered to help me out financially with the service. This is an offer I greatly appreciate as I am a PhD student who is on a fixed income. I thus decided to start a GoFund me to help increase the reach of the program.   **I was not sure how high to set the goal so this is a moving target.  Given the growing importance of avoiding face-to-face interaction - and the fact that I have neither the resources nor the training to ensure absolute sanitization* I am now  also offering grocery store pick up and direct etransfers for hish risk populations such as the elderly people with comprised immune systems etc.  However many of the people I have been in contact with/providing meals for have been economically harmed by the shut downs/unnecessary food hording and are thus struggling to feed their families. I will continue to provide meal prep for these people for as long as I remain healthy and symptom free.   Through providing the food prep service I have been able to connect with a wide range of people who have been either physically and/or financially hurt by the pandemic. I would like to continue to help these people in any way I can/in any way they need - whether this is by giving them food or direct donations.   All the money I receive will either go to supporting or feeding people who are in need of care during this difficult time or to funding the expenses that I will incur as a result of helping them out.  In particular I am seeking financial aid with the following items:  1. To buy food or groceries for people who are either economically impacted by COVID19 or are unable to leave the house because of it  2.  To directly support those who have been economically impacted by the virus (via etransfer)  3. To buy containers hair nets and protective gloves for the meal prep option  4. To help cover my gas (I am mostly driving from Burlington to various parts of Hamilton)  COVID19 effects our most vulnerable populations not just physically but also economically and I hope that those of us with good health and more resources can ban together to help these folx through this crisis.   For more information on the services that I provide please check out my original post (shared above) direct message me on facebook or contact me through GoFund me.  A little about me: My name is Jade (They/her) and  I am a PhD Sociology candidate and teacher’s assistant at York University who does academic and community work in Black Indigenous and People of colour activisms. I am a gender non-conforming queer woman of colour who is deeply committed to social justice. I have founded or participated in many projects for my department and have experience in organizing/managing funds. If you want to find out more about me/my background you may check out my personal website at jadecrimson.com. You may also direct message me :)

title: COVID-19: PURESPORT IN PISTA PER IL SAN GERARDO
description: COVID-19: PURESPORT IN PISTA PER IL SAN GERARDO     Essere in prima linea negli ospedali non è mai solo la conseguenza di preparazione o strategie perfettamente riuscite ma anche il risultato di anni di formazione e sacrifici spinti da passione ed umiltà. Per essere in prima linea negli ospedali però non servono solo dedizione e talento non ci si può affidare alla fortuna o al caso. Serve che arrivi il miglior aiuto possibile e concreto da tutti noi che abbiamo un’unica possibilità di essere utili.    Per questa ragione e’ importante METTERSI TUTTI AL FIANCO di coloro che lottano ogni giorno per garantirci le cure necessarie a superare momenti come questi. IL MOMENTO E’ ORA HANNO BISOGNO DI NOI!     In questi giorni fragili dal punto di vista sociale e sanitario anche PURESPORT ha deciso di agire e contribuire attivamente. Siamo una società Monzese molto attiva e legata a questo territorio drammaticamente colpito da un male che solo insieme possiamo combattere.    Operiamo da anni sul suolo brianzolo e vogliamo sostenere IL NOSTRO OSPEDALE con l’obiettivo di dotare il personale che affrontano quotidianamente in prima linea l’emergenza e i pazienti ricoverati di tutte le misure protettive necessarie per far fronte al pericolo legato al Coronavirus. Per questo chiediamo l’aiuto di tutti per fare la differenza in questo periodo doloroso con l’auspicio che il nostro aiuto possa dar loro una ulteriore spinta per vincere la battaglia.    I fondi raccolti saranno direttamente devoluti all’ospedale San Gerardo di Monza.  Copia dei bonifici che verranno fatti all’ospedale San Gerardo saranno messi on Line sui nostri canali social e sul sito.    FAI LA TUA DONAZIONE E AIUTACI AD ACCELERARE VERSO IL TRAGUARDO CHE TUTTI ASPETTIAMO: IL RITORNO ALLA NORMALITA’!    Grazie di cuore Il Team Puresport srl     NOTA BENE:  da ogni donazione effettuata viene trattenuta una percentuale preimpostata pari al 15% per offrire un contributo NON OBBLIGATORIO per la gestione della piattaforma.  Questo contributo può essere ridotto fino a 0€  (se lo si ritiene giusto)  permettendo così di donare il 100% allassociazione che si sta cercando di aiutare (in questo caso allOspedale San Gerardo) .  Basta inserire limporto che si vuole donare nellapposito spazio e successivamente cliccare sul riquadro in basso dove vi è la percentuale 15% e cliccando su ALTRO si potrà immettere qualsiasi importo si voglia far recapitare alla piattaforma per la gestione del sito (quindi può essere inserito anche 0% in base alla propria decisione personale) . Crediamo sia corretto ed importante informarvi al meglio così da poter scegliere come donare e come farlo nel modo che più ritenete giusto!  Per aiutarci a diffondere il messaggio condividi il link sulla tua pagina Facebook!     COVID-19: PURESPORT on track for San Gerardo Hospital    To be in frontline in hospitals is never just a consequence of readiness or successful strategies but also the result of years of training and sacrifices driven by passion and humility.  To be in frontline in hospitals however isn’t just a matter of commitment and talent it isn’t just about luck or chance.  It is necessary that each and everyone of us gives the best help possible we who have one only chance to be helpful.    For this reason it is important to be AT THE SIDE OF those who are fighting everyday in order to ensure that we have the needed healthcare for such moments.  THE TIME IS NOW THEY NEED US!   In these vulnerable days from the sanitary and social point of view PURESPORT has decided to take action and actively contribute.  We are a company from Monza very active and closely tied to this territory which is drammatically affected by a disease that only together we can fight.    We’ve been operating on Monza and Brianza’s soil for years and we want to support OUR HOSPITAL with the goal of providing the personnel facing everyday the emergency and the hospitalised patients with all the necessary protective equipment in order to deal with the danger of Coronavirus. Therefore we ask for everyone’s help to make a difference in this word difficult moment hoping our contribution can give them an extra boost to win this battle.    The raised funds will be directly donated to San Gerardo Hospital of Monza.  A copy of bank transfers sent to San Gerardo Hospital will be published online on our social channels and on our website.    MAKE YOUR DONATION AND HELP US SPEED UP TOWARDS THE FINISH LINE WE’RE ALL WAITING FOR: GOING BACK TO NORMALITY!   Heartfelt thanks Puresport srl Team   To help us spread the message share the link on you Facebook profile!

title: Ospedale Loreto Mare Covid 19 Hospital Napoli
description: Sono Rossella Erra e sono un’ITALIANA come voi ed ho sentito il bisogno di aprire questa raccolta fondi perché il contagio da Coronavirus è in continuo aumento ed in Campania si stanno ricostituendo e potenziando strutture ospedaliere che possano accogliere chi è affetto da questo virus. Ho appreso che tornerà in corsia il professore Franco Faella a guidare l’Ospedale « Loreto Mare » reso Covid Hospital di Napoli al fine di consolidare una rete infettivologica per scongiurare il collasso. Il Professore Faella era in pensione e dopo avere concluso la sua carriera come primario emerito di Infettivologia dell’Ospedale Cotugno ritorna In trincea per salvare vite umane.  Al Loreto Mare sono già pronti 10 posti letto in terapia intensiva e se ne possono creare altri 20. Tuttavia mancano ancora tute guanti e mascherine per i sanitari oltre ai ventilatori automatici. E tutti sperano che possano arrivare prima del picco di contagi previsto per metà aprile.  Aiutiamo questa struttura ad avere quanto necessario per consentire a quanti ci lavorano di assistere e curare i pazienti Covid-19.  Siamo ITALIANI  ed insieme si può.   Un piccolo gesto per ridare una grande speranza.

title: EMERGENZA COVID - 19: AIUTA CROCE DORO MILANO!
description: EMERGENZA COVID – 19    AIUTA I SOCCORRITORI DELLA CROCE D’ORO MILANO!      Dal 1957 la Croce d’Oro Milano - associazione di volontariato - è in prima linea nel servizio di Emergenza Urgenza nella città di Milano.  Nemmeno il Covid - 19 ci ha fermato  ma in questo momento di criticità abbiamo bisogno del tuo sostegno.       Anche la più piccola donazione può fare la differenza!       Nello specifico ci servono:    -    Dispositivi di Protezione Individuale per i soccorritori che entrano quotidianamente in Pronto Soccorso e hanno contatti diretti con i pazienti infetti  -    Materiali per la sanificazione di ambulanze e spazi comuni della nostra sede  -    Fondi da destinare all’assunzione di nuovo personale in modo da poter mettere in strada una o due ambulanze in più ogni giorno      Se non riesci a donare anche la semplice condivisione è fondamentale.       Aiutaci a raggiungere l’obiettivo e ricorda che #noicisiamo voi #restateacasa!    Scopri di più su chi siamo e cosa facciamo

title: NYC Corona: Feed Hungry Kids + Support Restaurants
description: Donate to purchase food delivery credits (via Seamless DoorDash Grubhub etc.) for vulnerable NYC school children and their families AND in turn support NYC restaurants.  ------------------  COVID-19 (coronavirus) is rapidly spreading around the world and governments are taking action to help stop the spread.  NYC schools closed on Monday March 16.  NYC restaurants are closing on Tuesday March 17.  There are 1.1 million students in NYC. 70% of these students qualify for free or reduced school lunches. NYC will continue providing food but these students and their families are suffering during this crisis.  Hundreds of thousands in the restaurant industry will be affected by the closure. Many will close permanently.  Lets support both -- lets raise money to purchase food delivery credits (via Seamless DoorDash Grubhub etc.). Hungry families can then use these credits to purchase takeout in their local communities.   ------------------   FAQ:    How will these credits be purchased and delivered?   Im choosing Catholic Charities Community Services in New York to receive all donations and distribute these credits. The Alianza Youth Services division works with the most vulnerable NYC school children providing after-school programs career readiness community engagement and more.   Im also the Director of Operations at Alianza but Im doing this fundraiser as a private NYC citizen just trying to help. I know we can work together to help these kids and the food services industry.  **If any food delivery companies are interested in working together to accomplish that goal please let me know. Thanks!

title: Help Cooking For Freedom buy food during Covid19
description: Cooking For Freedom is a group made up of people seeking asylum in Ireland who decided to organise to cook for ourselves and our families. We are parents and people living in a Direct Provision centre in Dublin. Due to the Corona Virus pandemic we are trying to keep oursleves our families and each other safe with all the advice from medical experts. Social distancing is incredibly hard for us when we are forced to live in centres where we have to eat in canteens and share communal spaces. There are lots of kids and people with medical conditions and its difficult for all of us to stay in our rooms without enough supplies.  We need help and support from others to do our best to prevent the spread of Covid19.   We want to raise some money so that we can buy groceries and supplies that will allow us to cook healthy nutritious and eat in our own rooms.  If you can please donate some money to support us to do this and if you cant donate please share with others who could.  In these difficult times its more important than ever that we continue to support and look after each other.    Together we will get through this.    Stay safe and thanks  3   About us:   http://cookingforfreedom.ie/about-us.php    https://www.rte.ie/amp/1014346/

title: Feeding the encampment unhoused/ corona virus
description: ENCAMPMENT UNHOUSED NEED TO EAT PLEASE SHARE  I need help...so with the corona virus COV19 everything is being shut down in sacramento. Stores restaurant liquor stores things are becoming drive through only.  The unhoused depend on Access of churches starbucks ect for food AND places where they can utilize change and ebt. It is all closing down  Im asking for help as I have used quite a bit of my own money to try and keep people going.  What im asking for is money to make food to take out to the camps. We are feeding people in their camps as it is safer then congregating multiple people in one big area. We are also educating them on the virus and any government updates. I will provide receipts with purchases and updates on any donations not on the go fund me im working on for transparency   An alternative to money is the actual food. Looking for any items that can go into soup . Whether it is frozen  canned  dry i dont care we can make it work.  Also help with propane refills so we can keep serving people. If any food bank friends want to hook me up with the connection or any non profit please reach out to me.  We all need to eat  we all need to isolate we need to help others who cant do this with out assistance.  -Crystal Sanchez President of the Sacramento Homeless Union a Chapter of the National Union of the Homeless  Pay pal: paypal.me/crystalsanchez1  Venmo: @Crystal-Sanchez-190

title: Misericordia di Cerenzia emergenza Covid19
description: In questa fase davvero delicata dal punto di vista sociale e sanitario possiamo anche noi fare qualcosa. Medici e scienziati stanno facendo un lavoro importantissimo e vorremmo supportarli concretamente.  Sono giorni molto difficili. Aiutiamo la Misericordia  in prima linea in questi giorni  ad avere le risorse per acquistare mascherine ed altri prodotti essenziali per il contenimento del coronavirus il nostro supporto è concreto nellattrezzare centri di assistenza e supporto a tutta la popolazione  Anche una piccola donazione può fare la differenza.

title: Keep Earwig Studio Open! COVID-19 Fundraiser
description: Dear Earwig Artists   Community  I have made the difficult decision to close Earwig Studio for at least one month if not longer.   Over the last ten years I have worked very hard to not only build this studio but also a community of artists and art supporters around it. I am proud to say we HAVE become that vibrant community that makes music together in the studio at Earwig Sessions at annual Earwigfest and in so many other ways.  I value all of you deeply and do not want to put anyone at risk in this critical moment. King County is the epicenter of the US outbreak and COVID-19 is spreading quickly in our region. There are just too many question marks around keeping Earwig Studio disinfected while trying to stay healthy myself. I take my role as a community leader seriously and staying open to serve myself and my family at the risk of other people and their families is unacceptable to me. Closure is the necessary responsible choice (and will likely be forced very soon anyway).  Unfortunately running a recording studio in a very expensive city has always been a tight-rope walk and Earwig has no financial buffer. I will not be able to keep the studio open through and beyond this time of pandemic without support. So I am asking for your help to keep Earwig Studio open and our community vibrant by contributing anything you can towards Earwig’s monthly operating expenses. According to 2019-2020 reports which include a sudden hike in commercial rent this year the studio’s monthly expenses total $6400 ($213/day). Most of that is rent. Closing the studio now means that I do not have enough to pay rent in April or May.   If you have the means and you value me Earwig studio and our artist community please consider donating what you can to this relief fund. Every little bit helps. I am so grateful for any and all support you can give. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.    In gratitude Don Farwell Owner Earwig Studio L.L.C.

title: Beagle Bed & Breakfast COVID-19 support
description: As if the furlough didnt take enough of a toll several months ago we now have Coronavirus impacting those in our communities. We have kids out of school that rely on school meal programs small businesses that rely on customers etc. This is a hard time for many of us and our families.   Beagle Bed   Breakfast is an amazing kennel-free overnight boarding and dog daycare in Emmitsburg Maryland. They were recently a winner of the 2019 Frederick News-Post Best of the Best in pet care. Just through the last week they have lost approximately $8000 in revenue from cancellations. Thats about a months worth of payroll for the staff who help care for all the dogs. Many of our favorite businesses are going to suffer greatly through no fault of their own or their customers.   My name is Laura Hudson and Im from Silver Spring MD. Im raising money for Megan Purtell who is the owner of Beagle Bed   Breakfast. I know Megan because we are both active participants and fosters through City Dogs Rescue   City Kitties based in Washington DC. I run a dog-sitting business of my own as a side-job but Megan has my dream job. She does such an amazing job of caring for dogs so this business is near and dear to my heart.  The funds will be spent to pay her staff for the work they are unable to perform as a result of the COVID-19 impact on their business. The fundraising goal is set to $8000 to make up for the $8000 in lost wages for her and her staff but may be raised if Im made aware of additional financial impact.  The Beagle Bed   Breakfast website can be found at:  https://beaglebedandbreakfast.com/   Please consider donating in any way that you can to this cause or to others. Community is important and we cant make it without each other.

title: ALONE Supporting the elderly during COVID-19
description: During these difficult few weeks we all must remember those who are most in need. As a company we have decided to help raise funds for the amazing Irish charity ALONE. We are constantly reminded of how this vulnerable group in society will be most affected by the COVID-19 outbreak. We all have loved ones close to our hearts that we must reach out to and help. A small donation would be very much appreciated for this worthy cause.   In order to help this wonderful charity we are giving away €2000 worth of Mindy Brownes product to one of our kind donators. Any donation large or small is greatly appreciated. A minimum of €5 will qualify you for this charitable giveaway.   About the Charity:  ALONE works with people over the age of 60 who are socially isolated homeless living in poverty or crisis and support them during this tough time of COVID-19 .   They provide direct support to hundreds of older people every week through their four main services – Support Coordination Befriending Housing with Support and Campaigns for Change.  ALONE has announced the launch of a national support line and additional supports for older people who have concerns or are facing difficulties relating to the outbreak of COVID-19 (Coronavirus) in Ireland.  As a member organisation of the National Public Health Emergency COVID-19 Subgroup for Vulnerable People ALONE is working in collaboration with the Department of Health and the HSE on a coordinated national response to support older people who have concerns who may be at risk or who have contracted COVID-19.  As well as advice information and emotional supports they will ensure every older person will have access to food medication fuel daily contact and any other support that may be needed. These supports are free and available to all older people including those who have not previously used their services.  Should any older person need any advice or practical support we encourage them to call the ALONE Support Line on 0818 222 024.

title: Covid-19 -Diamo una mano al Miulli di Acquaviva
description: Ciao sono Giacomo Lenoci un imprenditore di  Acquaviva delle Fonti. Come tutti noi sono  fortemente preoccupato per linfezione da Coronavirus che sta devastando la nostra ITALIA.   Il nostro governatore  Michele Emiliano  in unintervista ha affermato:  Possiamo gestire 1.000 ricoveri ma senza altri 200 ventilatori non riusciremo a salvare tutti.   Per questo insieme al  nostro sindaco Davide Carlucci e Michele Tribuzio (Zio Mike)  che gestisce la  ZIO MIKE FOUNDATION ONLUS ci siamo subito attivati per dare un concreto contributo di fronte al dilagare impietoso dei numeri. Oggi abbiamo deciso di passare allazione per  dare una mano al nostro ospedale MIULLI in prima linea nella lotta allinfezione da COVID-19    Il MIULLI di Acquaviva delle Fonti sta allestendo 300 posti letto per i contagiati da Coronavirus Pugliesi e di altre regioni  ma solo 60 in regime di terapia intensiva.  Vogliamo rafforzare la terapia intensiva del MIULLI e donare a questo OSPEDALE 10 ulteriori posti letto per la terapia intensiva .  Attraverso il  nostro sindaco Davide Carlucci   siamo entrati immediatamente  in contatto con la direzione sanitaria ed amministrativa dellOspedale  Ogni posto letto “vale” circa 80Mila€. ed è composto dal letto con i servomeccanismi - 15Mila€. il ventilatore per la respirazione - 30Mila€. il monitor su cui compaiono i vari parametri vitali 15Mila€. e un pensile con una serie di attrezzature 20Mila€  Se è vero che solo restando uniti ce la faremo allora  dobbiamo essere uniti anche nel dare il nostro contributo alle nostre strutture ospedaliere in prima linea sul fronte CORONAVIRUS .  Rivolgo un accorato appello  ad amici colleghi clienti fornitori o semplici conoscenti   il sindaco i rappresentati delle istituzioni i cittadini di Acquaviva delle Fonti gli imprenditori i generosi i buoni di cuore la gente comune  supportiamo questa raccolta fondi  CONDIVIDIAMOLA SUI NOSTRI PROFILI SOCIAL FACEBOOK  MESSENGER TWITTER per EMAIL SU WHATHAPP   rendiamola virale  facciamolo per tutte le persone che in questo momento sono in prima linea  medici infermieri operatori sanitari operatori del 118  che hanno gettato il cuore oltre lostacolo e sono pronti a dare la loro vita per noi.   Abbiamo il dovere morale e sociale di dare il nostro  contributo  facciamo qualcosa per la nostra comunità e per noi stessi.  Apriamo il nostro cuore  chiedo a gran voce a tutti:  Rendiamoci utili  10 posti in più in terapia intensiva possono salvare 10 vite 20 o anche di più  e magari la vita di un nostro caro un figlio un parente un amico o anche uno sconosciuto diamo il nostro contributo i n un momento così difficile della nostra vita doniamo quello che possiamo con un piccolo gesto salviamo delle vite  quale migliore ricompensa per la nostra anima.  Cari Pugliesi tendiamoci la mano perché insieme  ce la facciamo doniamo senza esitazione rendiamoci utili.  Giacomo Lenoci  Michele Tribuzio   Davide Carlucci.  #insiemeperilnostropaese .

title: SHINNECOCK NATION COVID 19 RELIEF FUND
description: We are raising money for the Shinnecock Nation for COVID-19 emergency response. Any donations are appreciated during this emergency.  All money will be given to he Shinnecock Nation and distributed where it is needed most. Thank you!

title: HiFiT per il San Martino di Genova contro covid-19
description: In questa fase davvero delicata dal punto di vista sociale e sanitario possiamo anche noi fare qualcosa. Medici e scienziati stanno facendo un lavoro importantissimo e noi di HiFit insieme a voi vorremmo supportarli concretamente.  Per questo motivo abbiamo pensato di aiutare l’Ospedale Policlinico San Martino di Genova raccogliendo fondi da dedicare all’acquisto di materiale medico e/o sanitario necessario a fronteggiare l’emergenza COVID-19 quali attrezzature per l’UTI (unità di terapia intensiva) cpap dispositivi di protezione (tute mascherine e occhiali protettivi) e tutto ciò che occorre per dare una aiuto concreto.  Ci alleniamo ogni giorno per diventare più forti. Anche una piccola donazione può fare la differenza.

title: Meowtropolitan COVID19 Cat-astrophe relief fund
description: Weve been a part of this community for almost 5 years. It has been an absolute honor to provide this unique experience for human and cats alike and match families for more than 250 cats.   We recently took precaution and suspended our operations ahead of the Governors.   So right now we need your support more than ever.  This will be a long battle and Im raising money to help us weather through the hard times and keep our lights on.  Any donation will help make an impact. Your contribution to this cause that means so much to me to us and the cats.   We understand that times are difficult and not everyone may be able to contribute. However even sharing our message around will be of help.   Thanks in advance from the bottom of our hearts.   Last but not least we are in this together humanity will come out the other end stronger and more united. Stay healthy safe and calm everyone!   Sincere Meows  Ghost Cat + Cats of Meowtropolitan  ========================================================================   Some other ways you could also support us:    * Buy our Gift Cards Yoga With cats Pass Paint and Purr Membership for later use.  See:  www.seameow.com/store   * Purchase our perishables online( milk vegetarian milks  wines etc ) and pick it up at the store .  www.seameow.com/store   ========================================================================  Once we figure our a safe way and protocol for the public and our staff we will re-open for adoptions that are appointment only. Please follow our social media or mewsletter for our continued updates.  We will be working how to provide entertaining footage and photos to alleviate you from the quarantine/ social isolation boredom

title: Il mondo del basket maremmano contro il COVID-19
description: Pallacanestro Grosseto Biancorossa Grosseto e Gea Basketball Grosseto unite contro il Coronavirus.  Il mondo del basket maremmano ha deciso di contribuire cercando di aiutare chi è in prima linea in questo momento contro il COVID-19.  Questa raccolta fondi andrà a finanziare i Dispositivi di Protezione Individuale per gli infermieri della ASL SUDEST che lavorano sul territorio maremmano contro il COVID-19.  L intero importo raccolto verrà consegnato alla  Dr.ssa Letizia Rossi Infermiere Operation Manager Cure Intermedie Area Grossetana Est

title: PONTENURE unita per lemergenza COVID-19
description: AIUTIAMO LAUSL DI PIACENZA  Abbiamo deciso di avviare questa raccolta fondi per lospedale di Piacenza affinché anche la nostra comunità possa aiutare a rafforzare il lavoro che ogni giorno viene svolto per fronteggiare lemergenza del COVID-19. Partendo dal proprio piccolo insieme e uniti possiamo arrivare a fare grandi cose. Se non potete donare condividete la raccolta fondi in modo che tutti possano contribuire e fare la differenza.  Abbiamo messo a conoscenza lAzienda USL di Piacenza di tale iniziativa.  Grazie condividete e se riuscite donate!  OMI Academy - anspi Pontenure

title: Dunkle Solidarität - Gemeinsam für das DarkFlower
description: Ihr Lieben   natürlich ist auch unser DarkFlower von der Corona Krise nicht verschont geblieben. Ich denke wir wissen alle dass es quasi unmöglich ist einen Club problemlos aufrecht zu erhalten wenn wochenlange Einnahmen plötzlich wegbrechen. Ich weiß dass unsere Szene immer zusammenhält und wir uns gegenseitig unterstützen. Aus diesem Grund hab ich dieses Crowdfunding erstellt. Lasst uns ganz viel Liebe geben damit unser DarkFlower auch nach der schwierigen Zeit weiter Party machen kann   ______________________________   Hey guys  Our beloved DarkFlower has not been unaffected by the Corona crisis. I think we all know that it is probably impossible to keep a club alive when you have weeks of missing out on income. I know that in this scene we always help out each other and for this reason I have created this crowdfunding. Let is give some love to make sure that our beloved DarkFlower can still host parties after these difficult times.

title: COVID-19 AOK Crisis response fund - 1180072
description: AOK is a registered charity who concentrate on Crisis support in the local area.  Following the latest news regarding the Coronavirus we feel it is has been necessary to set up a Crisis support network and go fund me page to support those in the community that cannot get to the shops through underlying health issues and being in the at risk categories.   We will mobilise the community as much aswe can by protecting them with protective measures such as gloves masks and hand sanitizers but this has already started to come at a cost of £130 for the first amount to start with purchasing 800 gloves anti bac and 80 masks.  There are other contributory factors for us setting up this go fund me -    Funds for food if required for shopping if needed by elderly during the 12 week isolation period.     - Donations have been offered already and so this is a good way of people donating.   - We don’t want people taking money from the elderly in crisis - if we have the funds we can organise someone to do a shop rather than cash exchanging hands.   - Fuel for the van for deliveries  Any funds left over will go into AOK for thefuture support of the vulnerable in the community.  Thank you ever so much   Team AOK

title: COVID-19 Independent Band Relief Fund
description: Hello! My name is Matt Maggiacomo and Ive been writing and performing music for over 25 years. I was lucky enough to spend five years living my dream as a touring singer/songwriter and Im intimately familiar with how precarious that lifestyle can be. Many bands book and promote their own tours and they rely on every single dollar they make from door cuts and merch sales to pay for essentials like food rent and utilities.   COVID-19 is wreaking havoc on most communities and industries; when we think about the damage this outbreak has caused we may not immediately consider the impact its had on independent musicians. So thats what Im here for! Im thinking about the bands and songwriters whove had to cancel tours and give up weeks of income.  My goal is to develop a fund for these folks and hopefully replace some of their lost income so they dont have to consider giving up their dream.   I will be collecting funds for at least the next month or so. Im inviting bands and friends of bands to get in touch with me directly and share their needs and I will distribute funds accordingly.   If you know an independent band or musician whos had to cancel shows due to COVID-19 or if you are such a band or musician please feel free to contact me directly through this campaign and tell me your story.   Important Note : Im not a registered nonprofit and thus donations are not tax-deductible. Also the money I bring in through this campaign may be subject to taxes. I will be retaining a portion of the funds raised to cover any tax burden. Once that burden is fulfilled I will donate the remainder of the funds to a worthy music/arts charity.

title: Raccolta Fondi EMERGENZA COVID19
description: Il Comune di Cetara ha deciso di sposare questa iniziativa nel tentativo di raccogliere fondi per aiutare il presidio ospedaliero di Cava De Tirreni a fronte dell emergenza covid19

title: $10 SACHI.LA needs your help through COVID 19
description: Hi everyone-  As you know Coronavirus COVID 19 has affected everyones lives. On Saturday 3/14/20 we felt that the right decision was to close our coffee shop SACHI.LA to protect the community and help in stopping the spread of this virus.   Today 3/16/2020 LA restaurants are closed for dining as per LA Mayor Eric Garcettis request until 3/31/2020. As of now we are still allowed takeout/delivery but working to find the best way to do this.   So many of you have reached out with support and help. This has been overwhelming and makes these times easier knowing that we have such a strong community that now feels like family.   Weve crunched some numbers and looked at our options (including government aid) which has led us here. While most of our supplies are shelf stable our biggest concern is for our employees.
