Due to the nature of my business(s) lack of “proof” and past tax records - I have spent countless hours online and talking to government employees to be told I do not quality for EDD and/or any current financial assistance. I do not have parents and I do not have family members I can turn to for financial help I rely on myself 100% for income. Even with the rent and utilities freeze in California I wont be able to pay back almost 3 months of past due bills. Because I have no proof of income or anyone to co-sign me for things like apartments or loans and being on a month to month lease if I get evicted after the freeze I run the risk of losing everything I worked for these past years my dog baby and not being able to move into a new home if so. I have never asked for anyone for help like this in my life and it pains me to do it now but that is the humility of the human experience we have to grow and learn through and I am truly relying on the kindness of humans right now.     What this money would be used towards   Rent Medication Prescription Dog food/supplies Food/Water/Toiletries  Car Payment      Personal offering:  I am offering 30 minute angel/energy readings for anyone who donates $30+ please just send a screenshot to my email at  management@hayleyherms.com   3    Overall I appreciate any help I may receive whether its $1 or $100. I know there are a lot of freelancers and their families like myself out there in the same boat and we are all very deserving of help. Thank you and I am so grateful to anyone who donates and/or just reads my story in advanced. Sending so much love to everyone!

title: FAMILY BUSINESS IN DANGER OF GOING UNDER
description: Dear friends and soon-to-be friends:  Asking for help is not our style especially at a time when so many are hurting. But COVID-19 is threatening to shut down our business which also feeds and houses our family.  My name is Holly and along with my husband Jesse weve been offering reptile shows at schools and private events since 2005. We have a storefront but most of the business of Paramount Pet Entertainment involves getting into schools homes community centers and back yards to help demystify the exotic diminish fears and phobias promote respect for all animals and teach people the important roles reptiles play on this planet.   Thats impossible to do in this critical time of social distancing.  95 PERCENT OF OUR REVENUE COMES FROM SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITY EVENTS. And there is no sign that schools will re-open this year or that people will be able to gather any time soon. The only time our phone rings or email pings these days is for another cancellation.  So we are asking for help. Anything makes a difference as we need to cover nearly $11000 in monthly overhead to care for our snakes lizards toads and other creatures. That includes food heat cage cleaning —  and our lease on the shop and apartment. People are still asking us to take reptiles they cant handle and were going to have to turn them down.  I have no idea how we will overcome this crisis. Jesse and I are so sad and even our children our worried. We all love our reptiles and truly love sharing them. We are a hardworking family and care for these amazing creatures not only because they are our livelihood but because they are ours.   If we can raise $45000 that can keep us going through June when we hope warm weather will allow for parties to resume. We know that even when gatherings gear up again though people will be slow in booking extras which they consider us so if we can raise enough to get to the start of school that would be even better.  We know thats a huge goal. We know everyone is hurting. We hate asking but were out of options. Please give what you can and please share this with friends and on social media as much as you can. The more people we reach the more chance we have to keep our business alive and help young people learn to love these creatures as much as we do.  If you want to see what we do and who we are check us out on Instagram @paramountreptilez or at www.paramountreptiles.com    Thank you and stay safe!

title: Help Coyne & Luc with lost wages:COVID-19 Furlough
description: Hi everyone  My name is Luc (they/them) and I am fundraising on behalf of my partner Coyne (they/them). We are two nonbinary people that live in the DC area.   This afternoon after a weeklong period of reduced hours Coyne was informed that they have along with their coworkers been furloughed from their position at Dog Tag Bakery due to the coronavirus outbreak. The period of this furlough is indefinite but is apparently expected to be at least six weeks very likely more.  Given this situation we are raising funds to meet the  equivalent of 6-8 weeks of lost wages (including tips) as that is currently the shortest period of time we expect them to experience lost income. T he application for unemployment  benefits process is currently murky (because they have not been officially fired but instead have in the “furlough” been assigned 0 hours to their schedule indefinitely). We are in the process of soliciting legal advice and guidance on applying for unemployment benefits but are taking this time to reach out for help during this uncertain time.   Coyne is also interviewing for other positions that are community-minded in the DC area preferably with an LGBTQ+ activism and engagement component to them. :) For the moment during the DC Department of Health advisories of self-isolation most places are not hiring but Coyne has one interview set up already and we are looking for more. If you have any leads please feel free to reach out to us!   We love you all and thank you for your support   if youre not in a position to donate for your well wishes   spreading the word. Please be kind to each other and keep others in mind + consider supporting others who have also been affected if you have the means.   Love to all  Luc and Coyne

title: Restaurant Holmes COVID19 Staff Assistance!
description: Restaurant Holmes has been forced to furlough its entire hourly staff due to COVID19. We have started this fund to offer as much additional help as possible to our hourly employees. Restaurant Holmes will survive but hourly members of the service industry are among the most at risk to fall through the cracks in this time of uncertainty. Any support is appreciated and 100% of all funds raised will be dispersed among the hourly staff.  We are doing everything we possibly can to keep our community and staff fed and taken care of in this time of need. We appreciate your support here and in the restaurant through our take-out offerings of which 100% of the gratuity goes to the furloughed staff. We are also selling merchandise in the restaurant with proceeds going to the staff! Please follow us on instagram @restaurantholmes to keep up to date with what were doing to best serve our community and the Restaurant Holmes family.

title: Help Storico Teams through Covid-19 Crisis
description: Family and Friends   Your Storico family is set on pasta and vino but the income for staff  is simply not there due to global events. We are creating this page in efforts to help raise funds to take care of our staff during these financial hardships . We are still here for all your retail market needs but we all have taken serious pay cuts and more than half of our staff is out of jobs due to our dine in restaurant being closed. Please stay safe and practice social distancing during these times. We hope to still be here for you when this all blows over.   Sincerely your local pasta lovers (Storico Fresco + Forza Storico Team)

title: Prizefighter Staff Covid19 Relief Fund
description: Hello beautiful Prizefighter patrons! We miss you! Dylan Jon and Polly (aka the owners of the bar) are trying to raise some much needed funds for our staff who find themselves out of work due to the Covid-19 crisis. Having a drink at home with your roommate or partner? Or with friends via Skype/Zoom/Facetime? Consider chipping in a few bucks to the bartenders who would have made your drink for you if we were open! Every little bit helps. 100% of funds gathered from this campaign will go to our staff. Thats right! Were not taking a dime. The money will be distributed to the staff based on individual need and hours of work lost. Were hoping to make a payment at the end of the month when they would have received their paychecks.   For those who are able to share a little more we would like to offer some special experiences for you once we all get through this and are able to gather again. Anyone who donates more than $500 please email   info@prizefighterbar.com    for more information. Of course the timing of these experiences will be dictated by our ability to gather in groups moving forward. Each experience below is about 2 hours and for groups of up to 6 people. Well bring all the bottles/tools/ice etc. These experiences will be led by one or both of our founders Jon Santer and Dylan OBrien.   - Guided Mezcal Tasting: Rare bottles many of which are not available outside of Mexico will be poured and discussed. Methods of production regional differences odd flavors delicious spirits. This is our wheelhouse.  - Guided Bourbon/American Whiskey Tasting: Rare and allocated bottles will be shared. The colorful history of our national spirit will be laid out for you. We might even pour something that rhymes with Slappy Can Sprinkle?!?!  - Scotch. Scotchy Scotch Scotch. A guided tasting and lesson. Well cover the basics like regions production methods etc. Well also take a deeper dive into history contemporary Scotch politics and what to look for when tasting and collecting. Didnt know there were contemporary Scotch politics? Then this one is for you!  - Cocktail Making 101 and 102 - Learn how to make cocktails properly at your home just like your favorite bartenders at Prizefighter. Do you already know a little bit? How about an intermediate class to sharpen your skills and learn some different techniques? We can tailor this to whatever your interests are.  We are also well aware that many others are struggling and asking for help. Do what you can where you can. Thank you again. We cant wait to see you at the bar.

title: Organizing a Sayulita Food Bank during COVID19
description: Hola and Hello Amigos y Friends!This is a fundraiser for Emergency food water and basic necessities organized by MANY volunteers including Sayulita Cuida/Sayulita Cares.If you live in Sayulita full-time if you live in Sayulita part- time if you have visited Sayulita or if you love Mexico - its time to reach deep into your pockets and your hearts and help  provide BASIC necessities like food and water to Sayulita. ( and San Ignacio where many workers now live)All donations flow directly into Sayulita Cuidad/ Sayulita Cares bank account and will be distributed to groups organizing the effort.For more information see the Sayulita Cares Facebook page below. https://www.facebook.com/groups/sayulitacares

title: Mugshots covid-19 emergency staff fundraiser
description: Mugshots  will be closed until May 1 2020 or further notice due to COVID-19. This fund has been set up to support Joe Michael (Ashby) Noah Spencer and Josh. We all are experiencing a loss of revenue during this time and any donation would be greatly appreciated!   Mugshots loves each and everyone of youll sooooo much! Together we will get through these crazy times and will be able to raise some pints in celebration of the good times to come to hugs to prosperity and to our health!   We cant wait to squeeze you beautiful people again! Huggggggggsssss!!!  With all the love and appreciation  Mugshots staff

title: Support James Lick Families during Covid 19
description: Due to the sudden school closure essential supports for our youth and families are in peril.  We need your help!  Close to 80% of our families rely on meals provided to them at school daily free of charge and many of our families live below the federal poverty level.   Through School Nutrition Services and the Food Bank James Lick is one of 19 sites distributing meals to San Francisco children from 9-10am Monday through Friday but considering the need to shelter in place and limit exposure on public transportation in addition to the need for our students to care for younger siblings we are finding that many of our families are unable to utilize these resources. As a staff we have been reaching out to families to ascertain their needs.  During this time we would like to provide gift cards to grocery stores as a support to our most vulnerable families. While many families are impacted financially by the shelter in place policy some of our families are completely financially destabilized by their inability to work. A very significant number of our families have lost employment or significantly reduced hours due to this public health crisis. Many of the supports currently provided such as unemployment insurance have eligibility requirements which disqualify some families in our community.   We recognize this is a challenging time for everyone. We also recognize how strong and resilient our community is how important it is we reach out and support one another. If you can contribute in any way our families would really appreciate it! If you can share with your networks please do so!  Thank you for your kind donation! Stay healthy and safe!  Heidi Avelina Smith Teacher Osvaldo Ortiz Parent Liaison Erin Deis Vice-Principal _________________________________________________________________  Debido al cierre repentino de la escuela los apoyos esenciales para nuestros jóvenes y familias están en peligro. ¡Necesitamos su ayuda!  Cerca del 80% de nuestras familias dependen de las comidas que se les proporcionan diariamente en la escuela de forma gratuita y muchas de nuestras familias viven por debajo del nivel de pobreza federal.  A través de los Servicios de Nutrición Escolar y el Banco de Alimentos James Lick es uno de los 19 sitios que distribuye comidas a los niños de San Francisco de 9 a 10 a.m. de lunes a viernes pero considerando la necesidad de refugiarse en el lugar y limitar la exposición en el transporte público además de la necesidad para que nuestros estudiantes cuiden a sus hermanos menores estamos descubriendo que muchas de nuestras familias no pueden utilizar estos recursos. Como personal hemos estado contactando a las familias para determinar sus necesidades.  Durante este tiempo nos gustaría proporcionar tarjetas de regalo a las tiendas de comestibles como apoyo a nuestras familias más vulnerables. Mientras que muchas familias se ven afectadas financieramente por la política de refugio en el lugar algunas de nuestras familias están completamente desestabilizadas financieramente por su incapacidad para trabajar. Un número muy significativo de nuestras familias ha perdido empleo o ha reducido significativamente las horas debido a esta crisis de salud pública. Muchos de los apoyos que se brindan actualmente como el seguro de desempleo tienen requisitos de elegibilidad que descalifican a algunas familias de nuestra comunidad.  Reconocemos que este es un momento desafiante para todos. También reconocemos cuán fuerte y resistente es nuestra comunidad cuán importante es alcanzarnos y apoyarnos mutuamente. Si puede contribuir de alguna manera ¡Nuestras familias realmente lo agradecerían! Si puede compartir con sus redes ¡hágalo!  Gracias por su amable donación! ¡Manténgase saludable y seguro!  Heidi Avelina Smith Maestra Osvaldo Ortiz Enlace de Padres Erin Deis Sub-Directora

title: Our Ugandan friends need help during  Covid19
description: While we here in Australia battle it out over toilet paper hand sanitiser and panic stock the pantries and freezers.   Our good friends in Uganda who can barely access clean water to wash their hands or toilet paper at all are being struck hard by the Pandemic.   Corruption sees huge price hikes in daily essentials like “Posho” Casava Flour   Rice which means our friend Juliet is struggling to feed the 86 mouths that Rehoboth Home houses..   We want to raise $500 over their normal monthly food budget of $1500 to ensure they get through this time as best they can.   $2000 \ 86 = $23.25   $23.25 can feed one person for an entire month!   Please help us ensure they stay fed.   No amount is too little for our friends across the globe they live like none of us could imagine..

title: EMS hero with COVID-19
description: Robert Nemeth a veteran who currently works in EMS was recently diagnosed positive with COVID-19.  He has contracted an unusually  severe case for his age. Because of this hes  currently on a ventilator in the ICU at the VA.  Additionally both his fiancé and son tested positive while he was in the ICU thankfully they are doing well.   We need to come together to help a HERO and his family during his recovery.

title: Lord Stanley COVID-19 Relief Fund
description: Due to the mandated COVID-19 closures we sadly closed our doors on 3/16.  It was heart wrenching we have had to temporarily lay off our entire staff to go on unemployment.  We love our team we are family most staff members have been with us since the beginning.  Lord Stanley would not be what it is without them their hard work and their perseverance.  For all of you who have dined with us our regulars you know them by name and they know you.    We ask for support to help them out so that we can offer them the financial assistance they need to continue to pay the health insurance that they so deserve to have in times like this and to support those who are unable to receive any government assistance.  We also would not be able to function without our suppliers.  The farmers the winemakers distributors etc.  We do not want them to suffer as this crisis continues.  We are doing our best to reach out to the government for assistance and relief but we must consider other options and avenues of help.  We are asking you for your help now.  We need to ensure that we can reopen after this devastating period for all and return job stability to each and every one of our employees.  Funds would go towards:  -Staff assistance -Health Insurance -Purveyors  -Re-opening costs  No donation is too small every little bit helps.   With Love  Carrie Rupert and Hazel Lord Stanley

title: Old Chicago Southgate COVID 19 Relief Fund
description: We are raising money to help out the staff of Old Chicago of Southgate who have been laid off in these trying times of the COVID-19 Pandemic.  All the proceeds will go to helping out anyone who needs help making ends meet.  We are a family and together we can make it through these tough times!  Even if you can only give $5 anything is better than nothing.  Even through these trying times everyone I have talked to is staying positive!  I will try to share this as much as I can on my social media but please if everyone else can that would be much appreciated.  We love and miss hanging out and laughing with our regulars and cant wait until this is all over to have fun with you all again!    Thank you for everything!  Mike Amy Jeremy and the Old Chicago Southgate Staff

title: Do the doable - protect refugee camps from COVID19
description: Hey friends – we faced a minor dilemma the other day. The Henry family was down to our last roll of toilet paper. Facing #selfquarantine #toddlerpottytraining  and #toiletpaperapocalypse we were fresh out of luck. $25 to spend (yes we buy bulk at Costco) but nowhere to spend it.  Luckily for us our neighbors are saints and they gave us a pack free of charge.  So instead of paying them back (sorry Anne   Austin!) were donating it to help refugees around the world prepare for the COVID19 pandemic and SLOW THE SPREAD. For all the anxiety COVID19 brings us it also reminds us that we are all so connected and what happens on the other side of the world impacts us all.   We have to slow the spread everywhere and if we act now to protect people living in refugee camps and other areas with limited resources well all get through this together sooner. I truly believe that.   Donations will fund basic and effective things in camps like: -Soap   clean water -Handwashing facilities -Treatment spaces (i.e. tents or other basic shelters) -Public health campaigns to provide more information about how to keep healthy   what not to do    Donations will go to the global response fund at Alight (formerly American Refugee Committee). Alight serves more than 3.5 million people worldwide and is on the front lines providing health care water sanitation and protection services in refugee camps. Already setup to deliver these things teams on the ground just need the funds to do it at a scale that meets the demand of this pandemic. Your dollars will stretch farther than you think I promise!   Like many of you I am worrying about my familys health my friends   neighbors my mortgage and so many things in between. Im certain its a universal feeling these days. And yes and Ill have to buy toilet paper eventually; but it sure feels good to do something NOW when everything else can feel so paralyzing.    So – if youre also looking for a way to help will you join me in donating however much you pay for toilet paper?! $5 $10 $25 for you bulk buyers!?  Put your shopping dollars to good use you can always just borrow TP from a neighbor this week :)   Love Molly

title: Save Star Cat Books in the time of Covid-19
description: Dont let Covid-19 kill this bookstore!  Most Vermonters have already decided to shelter at home and even at mid-day roads are close to empty. Fixed costs continue. The owner of Star Cat Books has a compromised immune system but fears she must stay open for the few people who are looking for books for their kids or themselves. “Just closing” for two months which is the shortest period the experts project this to last guarantees the store will close forever. Even if two months is enough to end the risk business will not return to normal at once.  This request is for money to cover store costs such as rent utilities (which must be maintained for extenuating circumstances) a PO Box and minimal business activity for a period that is projected to last well beyond May. If sending money through Go Fund Me is uncomfortable for you PayPal can get money to the store through starcatbooks at gmail dot com. Or checks to the store can be mailed to PO Box 924 in Bradford VT 05033. How soon will contributions be needed? There are payments due by the end of March. Donations made after that time will be essential in April May and maybe much longer.  How else can you help? We can mail books to you. Book rate in the US is not very expensive. Online abebooks.com has listings for books we have posted that are of special interest to collectors. Otherwise contact us by email or phone to see if we can obtain other books and send them along. Even if we are home we will make special trips to keep these activities running. We love books and want to help those who also love them.  We grew up when a town always had at least one bookstore as well as a library. Please help us to keep this store going for this region on the New Hampshire/Vermont border where the closest other bookstore is twenty miles away and many people do not travel more than five miles from home.  Thank you. Stay well!

title: Danielle Elese COVID-19 Support
description: Due to COVID-19 we were notified our restaurant has been closed- eliminating all hours moving forward due to Californias regulations. Thus leaving me a three week time period without work. The unemployment websites are overloaded due to this economic crash. This directly affects me and my future. I do not know when I will receive income due to the unforeseen future and not knowing how this pandemic will unfold.   This is a crazy time to be alive and the stress levels seem to be unreal. Although the overwhelming reality that 1/5 are suffering the same future or even worse made me feel guilty asking for help.  On the other hand people dont know how to help unless you ask. So here I am my pride at my feet and with a humble spirit asking for a life line.  This would cover a month of frugal expenses thus limiting resources so that others may receive help they need as well.

title: COVID-19 Relief Fund for RTP Dancers
description: A global pandemic creates an economically challenging time for everyone but especially to those who are a part of an already disadvantaged demographic. Sex workers are especially devastated during this time as most enter the industry due to severe financial need.     North Carolina has officially closed all restaurants and bars for in person service as of  5pm Tuesday March 17.  This includes your local strip clubs which fall under the bar category. Emergency relief programs have been made available for employees affected by this mandate. Unfortunately dancers do not qualify for these programs as they are independent contractors not employees of the club.   Being unable to work for an extended period of time may result in catastrophic conditions for people who may already be in a vulnerable situation. This includes single moms women escaping domestic violence homelessness poverty and being taken advantage of because of their inability to carry on business as usual.   Our relief efforts are targeted at preventing these unsafe situations and providing the resources these women will need to get through an uncertain time that will be difficult for everyone.   We are reaching out to the community for donations and supplies in the hopes of forming a collective effort to provide essentials for some of the most vulnerable and underrepresented members of our community.   If you are in need of relief please contact  loveangelaorg@protonmail.com   If you would prefer to donate supplies rather than give financially please contact  loveangelaorg@protonmail.com   If you are not able to give supplies or donations at this time - you can still be an ally by sharing this fundraiser to show your support!    Love Angela is a newly formed nonprofit organization incorporated in the state of North Carolina as of March 6 2020. We are so thankful that we are able to begin our mission by responding quickly and efficiently to the community we serve in this time of crisis. We sincerely thank you in advance for your support.    Facebook page - please like and share. Website to be updated and linked soon.    Warmly   The Directors at Love Angela

title: Nashville Filmmakers COVID-19 Relief Fund
description: The Nashville filmmaking community is experiencing widespread economic shut-downs due to COVID-19. In response the  Nashville Filmmakers Guild   501(c)(3) is launching a fundraiser to find the hardest hit support crew and provide them direct financial relief during such pervasive job cancellations. Were asking for  tax deductible donations  to strengthen our community by sustaining individuals in dire need.   Meeting our $80000 goal means 100 - 200 workers receive emergency relief at two categories of one-time stipends of $400 or $800.  Lets be clear! Giving does not mean you are carefree and unaffected. We know thats not the case! But production companies studios executives producers agencies brands and colleagues should validate that many freelance support crew are disproportionately affected during a crisis this serious. These workers are foundational to our film community and our sets wouldnt function without them. So its time to show we have their backs like theyve proven themselves set after set shot by shot show after show.  GET ALL THE DETAILS    APPLY FOR RELIEF HERE!     Please give as much or as little as you can. Every donation matters.  100% of funds contributed will go directly to verified applicants. No overhead or administrative costs will be applied as NFG is an an all-volunteer 501(c)(3) donating our time and personnel to make this possible.  To remain entirely transparent we will provide records and receipts of distributed funds on request after the campaign has closed. Although all personal information will remain private.  MORE RESOURCES •  Tennessee Entertainment Coronavirus Impact Survey

title: Atelier/Bar Crenn Employee Relief Fund - COVID 19
description: We have been so grateful for every opportunity weve had to take care of you... now were relying on a little help from you to take care of us!  In this difficult time for the entire restaurant industry our work family needs all the support they can get.  Please donate what you feel to help those of our staff who are the most in need right now.  Merci!

title: COVID19 Denver Restaurant/Worker Relief
description: Denver after a decade of restaurant growth and prestige is at risk of severe setbacks due to the COVID19 Pandemic.    The local restaurant industry has been hit very hard and as part of that industry we have formed a coalition to proactively seek help.   The owners of Daughter Thai Kitchen   Bar in conjunction with food influencers Janet Dybek of Top_Denver_Restaurants and Christie Connelly of @denvernosh have set out to raise money to help the local Denver restaurant workers impacted by this COVID19 crisis.   Our goal is to provide support to those workers of independent / family owned restaurants that lack the means to provide the necessary benefits to their people.      We have all enjoyed the culinary explosion of the Denver restaurant industry  over the past decade.  It is now up to us to save it and the people that dedicate their lives to building it.  A committee has been formed to determine eligibility of those local restaurants / workers most in need and will distribute the funds immediately.       The local restaurant industry and the people need your support and greatly appreciates your generosity during this time of need.    A special thanks to the Denver Metro Chamber of Commerce for their help in supporting this cause.         For other resources available please check out www.denversbdc.org/disaster-relief

title: Fight COVID-19: Provide hot meals to those in need
description: As COVID-19 continues to affect our lives more and more each day countless people find it harder to find a job and put food on the table. At the same time restaurants are taking a huge loss in revenue especially the ones whose main business is sit-in dining. Luckily you can help with both issues at the same time! All the money you donate will go to VolunTeens a 501(c)3 nonprofit based right here in Howard County dedicated to serving those in need. VolunTeens will allocate all the money to buy hot meals from various local restaurants such as restaurants affected by the Ellicott City floods. We then donate these hot meals to local homeless shelters and support groups mainly Grassroots. We greatly appreciate all the funds we can get and we hope to start fundraising as soon as possible to help as many people as we can. To learn more about VolunTeens visit our  VolunTeens website . Thank you for your support!

title: Curse and the Cure- Live! on lockdown support/tips
description: Due to the current COVID19 / Coronavirus we are currently experiencing some great losses in the music industry. Our last date we were able to perform was Tuesday March 17th. We are musicians full time and rely on our performances as our source of income for our families.  Since the outbreak of the virus until the end of April alone - our festival local   private performance dates are a total loss of $6200 - 15 gigs total.  Were GOING LIVE for a LIVE CONCERT and this is an alternate way to “live tip” us during the performance - if you dont have paypal or Venmo. Corona took the venue   music from us - so were bringing it to YOU. This may be easier for those who dont use those sites. We know were not the only ones effected by this. There are many waitresses waiters bartenders venue owners cooks and other entertainers that are in the same shape we are. Continue keeping everyone in your prayers.*Please remember to shop local and dine out local when you can. Every 1$ helps! Sharing helps as well.    We appreciate your support during this time and hope to spread the love   not germs.    FRIDAY MARCH 20TH @ 8PM CENTRAL we will be doing a live concert. Please join us and share!  Alternate ways to help: Venmo: @Curseandthecure  PayPal: PayPal.com/curseandthecure

title: Gamers Heaven COVID-19
description: Hello Gamers Heaven Family.  As you all know us and many other local and small business have been hit very hard by the effects of COVID-19. With the 2 week shut down and potentially longer many business may end up closing due to this. Unfortunately we are not immune to this possibly either.  The negative effects of this were being felt before the shut down and may take months to return to normal even after the shut down period.  This reality unfortunately places us at a very difficult position. We are currently aggressively looking for solutions while working with our business partners landlords and suppliers to ensure that we keep the mission of Gamers Heaven pushing forward towards our ultimate goal.   I was very reserved about starting a Go Fund Me campaign but due to overwhelming support I have been receiving during this time and encouragement I have decided to put this campaign up.  This campaign is about the 5 years of family and community that choose Gamers Heaven to be their local game store their refuge and for some their home.  Gamers Heaven has always been about putting the needs of the community first. We have always pushed to make the best possible space for all gamers nerds and otaku alike.  This mission has never changed and has been the main motivation behind all our decisions and changes. These decisions may not always have worked out but we would not have grown to where we are today if it wasnt for all the trial and errors.  For those that want to see a glimpse of what went into Gamers Heaven in the beginning I kept video vlogs on  my old channel here.   If you are bored you can check them out as during the first few years I was able to record and edit videos. Lately between the workload at the store and taking care of my kids I have not been able to record or edit. I also encourage you to check out our old photos on our  facebook albums  .  Between the videos and photos you will truly be able to see what we are talking about.   This campaign will be a mixture of the Gift Card profits Donations and the additional contributions from Friends and Family. I will also be updating the total based on whether or not we were able to procure assistance from outside sources as well.  In terms of wages me and my team have decided to take as bare minimum as possible to help with costs. But below is breaking down what the proceeds from this campaign will be going towards so we are being as transparent as possible.     March Expenses:  March Rent - $7550.00 March Utilities - $2500.00 (Electric Gas Water Sewage Internet and Trash Removal) March Wages - $3600.00 (3 Managers Full Time at $7.50/hr) March Health Insurance -  $1500 (3 Managers and Families) March Business Insurance - $300.00 March Loan and Credit Obligations - $10000.00   April Expenses:  April Rent - $7550.00 April Utilities - $2500.00 (Electric Gas Water Sewage Internet and Trash Removal) April Wages - $3600.00 (3 Managers Full Time at $7.50/hr) April Health Insurance: $1500 (3 Managers and Families) April Business Insurance - $300.00 April Loan and Credit Obligations - $10000.00  If you would like to purchase Gift Cards to contribute you can purchase them here  .  As we dont know how long this recovery period will last we are hoping to at least get caught up and give us more time to find additional solutions.   To give you perspective on how Gamers Heaven was doing before COVID-19 we were growing enough to be completely debt free by the end of the Summer.  We were able to maintain a core staff and cover our payments and then was hoping to begin planning for Phase 3 after the summer as we wouldve been able to start funding our next steps to continue to grow and better take care of our ever growing GH Family.   No matter what happens my family my core staff and I will forever be grateful to all the people we have met along this journey and have become a part of our family and most importantly to all those in the community that believed in what Gamers Heaven was trying to be.  While we have sacrificed a lot and have gone through many hurdles you all have made this journey something that I will never regret making and hope that I can continue to show you guys even more.

title: The Comedy Bureau 3.0 Redesign & COVID-19 Relief
description: Comedy is my home. I never knew it was a home until I found it but when I found it I knew I was at the island of misfit toys where I finally belonged. I want to give/share/bring that feeling to anyone and everyone and thats why I Jake Kroeger created founded and single-handedly run (for nearly a decade) the highly respected go-to source for LA comedy The Comedy Bureau.  For The Comedy Bureau to survive in the the immediate future and cover the time and costs for our amazing exhaustive TCB 3.0 redesign I need your support here on GoFundMe (in addition to our  Patreon   for survival/sustainability in the long term). I love TCB being the glue that holds the LA comedy scene together and I very much want to keep it going growing and evolving. None of that can happen without your support.   Just a couple of weeks ago I totally revamped the site to the aforementioned TCB 3.0 thanks to the efforts of comedian/expert web designer Andrew Delman to make navigating through and knowing about the vast LA comedy scene even easier and more inclusive than it already it was (with a nice clean super crisp look to boot).   Now you can find comedy pretty much any way you can imagine on TCB. You can search for just free mics stand-up shows only in DTLA or see when and where Kristen Schaal is playing next by just searching her name AND see all of it on a corresponding map. Thats just skimming the surface of what you can do on TCB now. Youll get to see just how much more powerful TCB can be when live comedy comes back in full force.  Of course I had to enlist Delmans services out of my shallow pockets and we spent several months in development to make sure the whole new site runs smoothly (all while I had to maintain the old Tumblr-based site at the same time a full time job unto itself).  Also in this strange terrible time of the COVID-19 pandemic a time when live comedy has almost entirely dried up for the next several weeks (there are great live-streams happening everyday though- check our listings ) TCB has been rendered to a mere fraction of its utility. I have also had all of my other sources of income suspended for the next several weeks as well including writing about comedy at other outlets giving tours for the LA comedy scene via Airbnb experiences consulting/scouting etc.  On top of all of that we have been operating just above being (and sometimes very much) in the red for the entirety of our nearly decade-long run. That was only possible because it has just been only me Jake Kroeger running it and Ive been keeping costs incredibly low (essentially it has mostly just been my basic living expenses) the whole time. Ive only managed to stay afloat with other gigs (writing/scouting/consulting/giving tours) afforded to me via my reputation with TCB. I started TCBs  Patreon  a few years ago and that has indeed helped (and will hopefully help and sustain TCB in the long run). However it wont be enough at this given moment to cover the hefty costs I just took on or weather the disruption wrought by COVID-19.  I love supporting comedy Los Angeles and everyone that wants to be part of it and I only ask that you help TCB stay alive and be better than it has ever been.

title: OG COVID-19 Relief
description: Since 2012 weve shared a number of things within the community:  35 beers on tap 50 rotating bottles 18 Freshie Friday releases a week  and 13 different sausages...unfortunately weve lost track of Underbergs.  While we shelter-in-place all we need is one donation to help support our staff.   We hope to see you soon and in the meanwhile keep it OG!

title: Bright Side COVID-19 Relief Fund - Phoenix
description: This pandemic of 2020 called Novel Coronavirus or COVID-19 has forced the world to shut its doors. Right here in the valley of the sun small business owners and their workers have had to close up shop indefinitely praying for some kind of miracle to re-open before they are dead broke.   Even bigger businesses have shut down like arenas and concert halls leaving so many hourly workers out in the cold. I am a huge sports fan and have had great experiences meeting the concessionaires ushers and security folks at the pro arenas downtown including Talking Stick Resort Arena (Suns) Chase Field (DBacks) and more. These folks work the games they work the concerts year round... and now thats all gone. I want to help them stay afloat till the games come back.  These struggling folks dont even know how they will survive April let alone the months beyond.   This GoFundMe effort gives the more fortunate of us a chance to help the less fortunate.     Donate something anything. $5 $10 $100 or more.   Every little bit helps!  Follow along at  www.BrightSideoftheSun.com  and/or my twitter page at  @DaveKingNBA  to see how I am disbursing every dime you donate to help someone affected by this pandemic.  Its all going to them. Small business owners to stay afloat. Hourly workers who got laid off or put to zero hour schedules to pay their bills.  You can  nominate new recipients here  (hourly workers and locally-owned businesses in the Phoenix area). See  those already nominated here .  Help them! Donate something anything to the cause.

title: Help Arcade of Thrones during Covid-19
description: Due to Covid-19 and Social Distancing Smash Sans Frontieres has been cancelled for the near future. Unfortunately this leaves Arcade of Thrones and Jordan Silver the owner without revenue on Mondays. As a local business each day of lost revenue can have a huge impact. While it would be irresponsible for us to continue running SSF events in the current environment we decided to help Jordan out by running this fundraiser.  If you are a regular attendee of SSF or Tournament of Thrones events please consider donating the equivalent of a venue fee (5$) or two to help Jordan keep Arcade of Thrones up and running.  Jordan has been nothing but wonderful to our community and our players. From minor things to giving us a chair discount or even just being very open to suggestions and ideas hes shown that hes passionate about our events. I hope that NC Smash can do the same for him in this time of need.  Jordan expressed that I mention that you only donate if you are financially able to do so and he is very grateful for any support. Please only donate if you are able to!

title: Idaho COVID-19 Food Fund
description: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic many local restaurant businesses in Idaho are suffering. The pandemic is also causing harm to low-income families and individuals who may experience food insecurity. This is especially true for rural areas.   This fund will be used to try and provide business for restaurant owners and to help feed people facing food insecurity. The more money we raise the more communities we can help in Idaho. We will be purchasing gift cards from local businesses and distributing them to those throughout the community.   If you would like to volunteer your time and thoughts on this cause please contact me.   For more resources about COVID-19 click on these links:  CDC Website:    https://www.cdc.gov/     Idaho COVID-19 Resource Drive:    https://drive.google.com/drive/mobile/folders/1Wmx4wMZPJ_HqnZrF1E2TbxwZRORtoVtz?usp=drive_open

title: Sostieni la medicina B! Uniti contro il COVID19
description: Aiutiamo il reparto di medicina B di città di castello per lacquisto di materiale e dpi per erogare la migliore assistenza possibile ai pazienti ricoverati affetti da covid19! Una battaglia che insieme possiamo vincere!

title: Stop COVID-19  / MATAR-19 mobile app
description: Develop in 5 days  MATAR-19  a mobile app to stop COVID-19 propagation.  In this time of crisis we all want to protect our close ones.  If you get symptoms or if are unfortunately tested positive to COVID-19 will you be able to name every person that crossed your path over the last 10 days???  Not likely.  The mobile app in development will keep track on your cell phone only of your exact locations.  This is a GREAT advantage over our limited memory capacity to remember everything. We call them SMART Phone... they are in fact powerful but were not using them smartly.  When a new person will be tested positive to COVD-19 your phone will provide valuable information to the health agency in your province. This will enable them to identify likely virus propagation locations.  The health agency will then post these locations and the MATAR-19 mobile on your phone will cross-check your history on your phone.  MATAR-19 app on your phone will then notify you of your updated potential exposure to the virus.  If 2 days ago you were in close proximity of a person that has since been tested positive youll received a warning and will be invited to further reduce your social contacts to protect your loved ones (and the population in your region).  Join us in the fight against this  invisible enemy

title: Covid-19 has hit Kenya and we need your help!
description: Covid-19 has hit Kenya and we are  expecting cases to grow rapidly  . As Penda Health we are already working closely with our private and public sector partners to coordinate public education and response efforts.   But – Pendas medical centers are located in the highly populated low-income areas that will be  hardest hit  by this disease and least able to implement protective measures. As a highly trusted provider in our communities we can slow the spread and save lives.   Below is a list of actions we are already taking. We are constantly updating  this document   with what we know and how we are responding.   We need financial support and speed is of the essence. Your support will be critical in saving lives – and due to a generous donor your contribution will be matched up to 220000 USD!    Please forward this campaign on to all your friends and family! We need all the support we can get.      Purchasing Covid-specific personal protective equipment (PPE) – face masks eye protection gowns :   100000 USD for 6 weeks (but could run out far more quickly depending on consumption and prices are only increasing)   Increasing stock of essential medications such as fever reducers like paracetamol and antibiotics which are life-saving for our general primary care patients :  20000 USD depending on consumption   Training staff on triage case identification and reporting which would cause temporary disruptions to their current work : 500 USD per training     Hiring two medical centers full of necessary staff for response and as buffer in case other Penda providers become sick:  20000 USD/month   Paying for ambulance transfers for patients with presumptive Covid-19 (in partnership with Flare):  80 USD per transfer   Printing educational materials for patients which could also be distributed within our communities : 2000 USD   Deploying a SMS- or WhatsApp-based outreach program to educate patients or anyone who enrolls to receive these messages :  10000 USD   Setting up a full call center housed at Penda to track/forward calls to providers to give advice enter patient data within the EMR and conduct ongoing follow-ups:  15000 USD + 500 USD per day for patients to call toll free   Organizing triage tents for all medical centers and hiring extra staff to help with increased demand : 20000 USD + additional 20000 USD per month for operating costs   Creating self-quarantine kits for patients including basic medication and food/household supplies (if needed) : 10 USD per kit    Equipment reagents and kits to be able to conduct testing ourselves :  100000 USD

title: COVID-19 fundraiser: Food boxes - Beirut
description: Currently about 4000 families in Beirut (Lebanon) are suffering since they dont have any access to basic food needs with the current NATIONAL LOCKDOWN.  Lebanon has already been suffering from a major economic crisis.  The current virus lockdown made things much worse.  Currently I am in Australia. I created this GOFUNDME to raise funds for close friends working on the  ground in Lebanon to deliver food boxes to families in need.   ***First goal is to help 100 families in need in the upcoming days***   ***Box Cost Details***  -Each box helps One Family of 3 to 4 people for 1 month.  -Each box contains: A-Food Supply B-Hygiene Supply  A-Food:  .........................................................  COST= 50000 LBP Equivalent to $32.87SUD  Lentil: 900g Flour: 900g Borghol: 900g (Equivalent to Quinoa) Chikpeas: 900g Sugar: 900g Salt: 700g Pasta x4: 240g Tomato Sauce: 250g Oil: 1.6L Tuna: 185g Sardines: 125g Tea: 150g  Vermicili: 400g Halawa: 400g  Taghziya: 200g   B-Hygiene Supply: ......................................................... -Clorox or equivalent  -Dettol or equivalent -Dishwashing antibacterial liquid soap. -Hand sanitizer. -Wipes -Alcohol 70% -Toilet paper -Tissues  COST= 50000 LBP Equivalent to $32.87SUD

title: Sostieni la CRI di Gassino T.se contro il COVID-19
description: IN QUESTA EMERGENZA ..............NOI CON IL VOSTRO AIUTO NON CI FERMIAMO MAI!!!! Il Comitato di Gassino Torinese presente sul territorio da 36 anni con i suoi Volontari e Dipendenti non è solo unassociazione dinteresse pubblico  sono cittadine e cittadini  sono genitori  studenti e lavoratori che nonostante tutti i rischi che giornalmente comporta il nostro servizio hanno deciso di dedicare il proprio tempo libero in maniera Volontaria e gratuita persone addestrate per affrontare qualsiasi tipo di emergenza.  Essendo una realtà di Volontariato le risorse sono limitate e avremmo sempre di più bisogno di fondi per poter garantire un servizio urgente professionale per garantire sicurezza ai nostri cittadini sicuramente qualunque contributo seppur minimo per noi sarebbe di grande aiuto. Grazie di cuore a tutti.

title: COVID19: Supporting Lahore Pakistan
description: On 18 March amid a spike in COVID-19 cases in Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan called on his country not to panic but warned that the pandemic would be devastating for those already living in poverty: “ … if we shut down our cities [where] people are already suffering if we save them from Corona on the one side on the other side theyll die of hunger”.    We are a close group of friends who grew up in Lahore the beautiful capital of Pakistans Punjab province. We are heeding the Prime Ministers call not to panic but we are determined to help in whatever way we can. And the people of Lahore will indeed need our help.   Please donate whatever you can. Your donation will be distributed directly to families in Lahore impacted by COVID-19: those who in the days ahead will lose their jobs who can no longer feed their families who need medical care who will be literally living hand to mouth and day by day. Every last dollar donated will go directly to those who need it most.    Times of crisis often bring out the worst in human nature. Lets show the people of Lahore that it can also bring out our best!    We thank you for your generosity and we are sending our prayers to you your friends and families around the world during this difficult time.

title: Aiutiamo INMI Lazzaro Spallanzani per il Covid-19
description: La situazione è sotto gli occhi di tutti il Covid -19 è il nemico invisibile che cambierà almeno per un bel periodo le nostre abitudini.  E la più grande epidemia in Italia dopo la Spagnola negli anni 20. Il Covid-19 colpisce tutti soprattutto i nostri cari e particolarmente le persone anziane che sono le più fragili.  Attualmente linfezione generata dal Codiv-19 a Roma e in tutta la regione Lazio è gestita dallINMI Lazzaro Spallanzani centro di eccellenza e Istituto di riferimento non solo a livello regionale ma anche nazionale e internazionale.   NellIstituto Lazzaro Spallanzani tutto il personale medico infermieristico e tutti gli addetti a questa struttura stanno facendo un lavoro eccezionale che molto spesso va oltre lattività che viene loro richiesta. Dobbiamo essere orgogliosi di poter contare sulla presenza e il lavoro svolto quotidianamente da queste persone.  Nonostante questo gIi strumenti a supporto non sono mai abbastanza per questo i fondi che verranno raccolti saranno destinati non solo alla ricerca sperimentale per combattere il Codiv-19 ma anche allacquisto di quanto necessita in questo momento tutto il personale medico e paramedico per poter svolgere al meglio il proprio lavoro tra cui:   - Ventilatori - Dispositivi di ventilazione non invasiva - Monitoraggio emodinamico - Cuffie camici e occhiali monouso - Monitor  Questa iniziativa è partita da un gruppo di amici (Luca Stefano Alessandro Angelo Leonardo) della generazione anni 70...una generazione che finora si è considerata fortunata e privilegiata ha dovuto combattere per poco...    Ora è giunto il momento di metterci in campo per la nostra comunità.  Dona ciò che puoi per aiutarci a raggiungere il nostro obiettivo.  I fondi saranno raccolti direttamente su IBAN dellINMI Lazzaro Spallanzani  Restiamo a casa! #fermiamoloinsieme

title: ASSOSB - Emergenza Covid-19 - Ospedale di Bergamo
description: Tutti insieme per aiutare il nostro territorio colpito dallemergenza Coronavirus.  Questa iniziativa è promossa da tutta la comunità Senegalese che vuole esprimere concreta solidarietà alla popolazione Italiana e Bergamasca.   Un piccolo gesto sarà di grande aiuto.  Ringraziamo tutti coloro che con generosità vorranno sostenere questo progetto

title: C.R.I. UGGIATE TREVANO • EMERGENZA COVID-19
description: LA CROCE ROSSA ITALIANA COMITATO DI UGGIATE TREVANO HA BISOGNO DEL TUO AIUTO!    Questa campagna è organizzata dai Giovani della Croce Rossa Italiana del Comitato di Uggiate Trevano a sostegno di tutte le attività che il Comitato C.R.I. di Uggiate Trevano sta intraprendendo per garantire i servizi sul territorio in risposta allemergenza Covid-19 grazie al prezioso impegno costante e giornaliero di volontari e dipendenti.  Aiutaci a sostenere lacquisto dei dispositivi di protezione individuale (mascherine guanti e camici monouso sanificanti per mezzi e ambienti  gel disinfettanti) indispensabili per poter continuare lo svolgimento dei servizi sanitari e di emergenza-urgenza  e a sostenere inoltre il nuovo servizio di consegna spesa e farmaci a domicilio per anziani persone fragili ed immunodepressi .  La Croce Rossa Italiana - Comitato di Uggiate Trevano è da sempre impegnata al massimo per contribuire in ogni situazione.    Qualsiasi cifra vogliate donare sarà di prezioso aiuto   A I U T A C I  A D  A I U T A R E   siamo onde dello stesso mare foglie dello stesso albero fiori dello stesso giardino #iltempodellagentilezza #unitaliacheaiuta #tuttifratelli   info campagna  Tutti i fondi raccolti sono destinati ed automaticamente inviati alla Croce Rossa Italiana - Comitato di Uggiate Trevano unico beneficiario di questa iniziativa e saranno interamente destinati al sostegno delle attività che il Comitato sta svolgendo in questo periodo di emergenza.   chi sono  Mi chiamo Fava Riccardo ho 28 anni sono socio e volontario della Croce Rossa Italiana da più di dieci anni rappresento i Giovani in seno al Consiglio Direttivo della Croce Rossa Italiana del Comitato di Uggiate Trevano ricoprendone lincarico di Consigliere.   chi siamo  I Giovani Volontari della Croce Rossa Italiana prestano il loro contributo volontario nellambito della salute della pace del servizio alla comunità della cooperazione internazionale nella partecipazione e sviluppo dellassociazione realizzano interventi volti a sviluppare le capacità dei giovani affinché possano agire come agenti di cambiamento allinterno delle comunità promuovendo una cultura della cittadinanza attiva.   info donazione  Non è obbligatorio lasciare una percentuale della donazione alla piattaforma. Per farlo basta inserire nella casella che compare ALTRO ed indicare 0 come importo. Vedrete limporto totale pari al totale della donazione.  Tuttavia è anche grazie al lavoro di GoFundMe che si ha lopportunità di raccogliere fondi nel modo più facile e veloce possibile ed è giusto riconoscerlo.   per maggiori informazioni   SITO WEB CRI UGGIATE TREVANO    INSTAGRAM CRI UGGIATE TREVANO    FACEBOOK CRI UGGIATE TREVANO

title: LAPA per il Goretti di Latina-emergenza CoVid-19
description: Lemergenza Coronavirus ha repentinamente e profondamente cambiato la vita di noi tutti.  Le azioni di ognuno di noi e lattenzione che mettiamo oggi anche nei gesti più comuni sono fondamentali per contrastare lespansione di questa epidemia. Oltre però a restare a casa possiamo dare concretamente una mano a chi questa battaglia la sta combattendo in prima linea. Per questo motivo noi dellAPA   abbiamo deciso di  lanciare questa raccolta fondi in favore del nosocomio del capoluogo pontino.   Dopo aver contattato i responsabili del Goretti ci siamo resi conto di quanto sia grave lemergenza. Cè carenza infatti anche di semplici presidi di uso comune: disinfettanti camici tute monouso schermi facciali occhiali salviette mascherine...    Bisogna quindi agire subito non perdiamo tempo: aiutaci anche tu! (Tutto il ricavato sarà devoluto allOspedale S. M. Goretti di Latina)   Per questo motivo per raggiungere più persone possibili e ricambiare la vostra generosità organizziamo una maratona scientifica sul nostro canale YouTube aperta a tutti voi!  Tutti i giorni in diretta alle 18:30  per parlare di astronomia e scienza con esperti mondiali  in collegamento anche dagli Stati Uniti. Non perdere loccasione di farti rispondere direttamente da loro sulle tue più strane curiosità:   https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn0IRPVfilMpPe1kBNtxmfSMzTRqCe01R

title: Raccolta fondi Comitato Covid19 San Vito dei N.nni
description: Le forze politiche di San Vito dei Normanni in collaborazione con la Fratellanza Popolare e con la partecipazione delle Associazioni di volontariato sportive e culturali interpretando lo spirito di comunità e di impegno sociale che sempre ha caratterizzato la nostra Città PROMUOVONO UNA CAMPAGNA DI RACCOLTA FONDI per lacquisto di due o più DISPOSITIVI SANITARI DI SANIFICAZIONE PROFESSIONALE da donare allOspedale “A. PERRINO” di Brindisi. Aiutiamo e sosteniamo tutti insieme la nostra struttura sanitaria territoriale

title: COVID19 Community Relief
description: Im raising money to distribute to those who cannot afford the necessities for self-quarantine during the coronavirus period.   The money raised will go towards grocery drop-offs within the Meanjin/ Brisbane to those who are affected.   Reach out to me via twitter (sampi_martoo) or Instagram (_distressbian) if you need groceries or essentials delivered to you in the Brisbane area.  I acknowledge the Traditional Owners and that this is Yuggera and Turrubal Country. Any blackfullas in need please DM me as I will make you a priority ??

title: COVID-19 FABRIANO - AIUTIAMO LA CROCE ROSSA
description: In questi giorni segnati dalla  grave  emergenza sanitaria che stiamo vivendo ho riflettuto su cosa si possa fare in concreto per aiutare le persone che amiamo e la terra che ci ha cresciuti e a cui tutti noi siamo profondamente legati.  Mi ha colpito in particolare lo  straordinario  lavoro dei medici degli infermieri degli operatori sanitari e dei volontari che sono impegnati ogni giorno in prima linea nel prendersi cura delle persone che hanno contratto il virus.  È ora di  agire : insieme possiamo aiutare i nostri eroi in corsia a combattere questa sfida unendoci in un gesto di impegno responsabilità e generosità.  Per questa ragione ho fatto una donazione a favore dellAssociazione della Croce Rossa Italiana -  FABRIANO.   Per poter continuare a garantire lo svolgimento dei servizi e per poter permettere al personale di lavorare in sicurezza abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto.   Con i fondi ricavati potranno assicurare e garantire il servizio sanitario che ora più che mai noi tutti necessitiamo!  Invito tutti voi ad unirvi a me nel fare una donazione piccola o grande che sia per potenziare la Croce Rossa o semplicemente... condividete questa iniziativa insieme possiamo davvero fare la differenza!

title: Guanyarem al Covid19
description: El nou coronavirus està provocant un gran impacte en el sistema sanitari català. Els recursos escassegen i el personal sanitari està fent un gran esforç. Els que formem part de la societat civil podem ajudar-los de dues maneres molt clares. En primer lloc quedant-nos a casa; i segon lloc aportant el nostre granet de sorra en forma de recursos econòmics que ajudin a aconseguir els material de protecció adequats per seguir tractant els pacients.  Us demanem que doneu el que pugueu a aquesta causa per captar fons destinats íntegrament a lHospital Universitari Doctor Josep Trueta de Girona que gestionarà tots els recursos aconseguits de la millor manera. Amb aquesta aportació podran comprar mascaretes bates i daltre material de protecció o tractament.  Des del Girona FC volem oferir una sèrie de productes i serveis que sortejarem entre tots els donants per tal danimar-vos a col·laborar. Tanmateix si hi ha organitzacions clubs o empreses que volen oferir productes seus es poden posar en contacte amb nosaltres i els afegirem a aquesta llista de “recompenses” que hem preparat:  -              20 Samarretes oficials signades pel primer equip.  -              20 Entrades dobles per a partits del Girona FC.  -              Botes i material personal signat dels jugadors.  -              10 lots de marxandatge del Girona FC.  -              10 experiències Meet Greet amb els jugadors del Girona FC.  Tots aquests productes i experiències (i les que es puguin afegir posteriorment) es sortejaran entre els donants en favor daquesta causa per agrair-los la seva col·laboració.   Entre tots guanyarem al Covid19! Som-hi!     .....................................................................................................................................................     El nuevo coronavirus está provocando un gran impacto en el sistema sanitario catalán. Los recursos escasean y el personal sanitario está haciendo un gran esfuerzo. Los que formamos parte de la sociedad civil podemos ayudarles de dos maneras muy claras. En primer lugar quedándonos en casa; y segundo lugar aportando nuestro granito de arena en forma de recursos económicos que ayuden a conseguir material de protección adecuados para seguir tratando a los pacientes.  Os pedimos que donéis lo que podáis a esta causa para recaudar fondos destinados íntegramente al Hospital Universitari Doctor Josep Trueta de Girona que gestionará todos los recursos conseguidos de la mejor manera. Con esta aportación podrán comprar mascarillas batas y otro material de protección o tratamiento.  Desde el Girona FC queremos ofrecer una serie de productos y servicios que sortearemos entre todos los donantes con el fin de animar a colaborar. Sin embargo si hay organizaciones clubes o empresas que quieran ofrecer sus productos pueden ponerse en contacto con nosotros y les añadiremos a esta lista de recompensas que hemos preparado:  - 20 Camisetas oficiales firmadas por el primer equipo.  - 20 Entradas dobles para partidos del Girona FC.  - Botas y material personal firmado de los jugadores.  - 10 lotes de merchandising del Girona FC.  - 10 experiencias Meet   Greet con los jugadores del Girona FC.  Todos estos productos y experiencias (y los que se puedan añadir posteriormente) se sortearán entre los donantes en favor de esta causa para agradecerles su colaboración.   ¡Entre todos ganaremos al Covid19! ¡Vamos!

title: Jerome tegen Corona
description: **ENGLISH BELOW**  Beste klanten/ thuisblijvers/ bak-enthousiasten  Het zijn moeilijke tijden voor ons allemaal. Elke dag verandert de situatie om het uur en het is soms moeilijk te volgen wat wel en niet meer mag. Onze dagelijkse routines zijn verstoord en het voelt surrealistisch. Helaas zijn er mensen die deze periode alleen doorbrengen of mensen die niet weten wat morgen hen zal brengen. Veel plaatsen hebben steun en hulp nodig door de vele gesloten zaken en diensten. De verpleegkundigen en artsen werken de klok rond om deze bittere situatie beter te maken. Kinderopvang centra en creches zijn de juiste oplossingen aan het zoeken om de gesloten scholen en activiteiten goed te maken voor onze kleinsten en door de sluiting van alle cafes en vrijetijds plaatsen lijken de straten volledig leeg.  Hoewel Jerome open mag blijven mbt de maatregelen die sinds 18/03 gelden willen wij nog een groter bijdrage leveren aan het “terug gezond maken” van onze maatschappij!   Daarmee komen wij met de volgende voorstel:  Wij hebben een GoFundMe ogestart om SOS Kinderdorpen Belgie en de gezondheidszorgsector te steunen in deze tijden. Doordat er geen school stages of kampen doorgaan heeft SOS Kinderdorpen nood aan nieuwe meters en peters zodat de kinderen de komende weken in betere omstandigheden hun dagen doorbrengen. Verder is het geen geheim dat er een tekort aan materiaal is om onze geneeskundigen te beschermen in de ziekenhuizen.   Bij iedere gift dat jullie schenken wordt een authentiek recept privé naar jullie gestuurd van onze heerlijke pannenkoeken. Op deze manier kunnen jullie een stukje Jerome in huis brengen. Bak met jullie kinderen roep uw broer of zus erbij maak er vooral een familie-moment van. Al het geld dat ingezameld wordt zal 50 : 50 verdeeld worden tussen SOS Kinderdorpen en een ziekenhuis in Vlaanderen . Dus kruip achter het fornuis zamel in en help ons de virus tegen te gaan!  Nu meer dan ooit moeten wij doorbijten en samenspannen om zo snel mogelijk een vorm van controle te creëren.                                                                                                +++ BELANGRIJK +++  Stuur ons een screenshot van jullie gift via prive bericht op Instagram of Facebook en wij sturen jullie ons recepture door.   ********************************************************************* Dear customers/ stay-at-home-ers/ baking-enthusiast  These are strange times for everyone. Everyday there is a change in the situation with updates appearing by the hour and it can be quite difficult to follow what we can and cannot do anymore. Our daily routines have been interrupted and it feels surreal. Unfortunately there are people who go through this all alone or people who dont know what tomorrow will bring. A lot of places need support and aid now that a lot of services have been shut down. The nurses and doctors work around the clock to better this bitter situation. Daycare centres are searching for the right solutions to keep our little ones busy now that schools and after-school-activities have been shut down. And because of the closed bars and cafes the cities and streets seem completely empty.   Although we at Cremerie Jerome are fortunate to stay open and offer take-away (following the rules given on 18/3) we are still looking for ways to do more to make the community healthy and prosperous again.      That is why we are proposing the following:  With this GoFundMe we are looking to support SOS Kinderdorpen Belgium and the health sector in these trying times. Due to the schools internships and camps shutting down SOS Kinderdorpen is in need of godparents to financially aid the kids the coming weeks. Furthermore it is no secret that the shortage of medical masks and -materials in general prove to be an issue in the protection of our medicinal staff.  When a donation is given we will send our authentic pancake recipe to you in private. That way you can bring a part of Jerome into your homes. Bake with your children invite your brother and/or sister to join you above all make it a family gathering!   All of the collected money will be divided 50:50 between SOS Kinderdorpen and a hospital in Flanders. So what are you waiting for? Place yourself behind your stove donate and help us fight the virus!  Now more than ever is the time for us to work together and bite through!!                                                                                       +++ IMPORTANT +++   Send us a screenshot of your donation in private chat (on Instagram or Facebook) and we will send you our recipe.

title: Culinary Dropout COVID-19 Emergency Staff Fund
description: Many of us service industry folks never thought wed be in a situation like this. We are all in uncharted territory right now and as we navigate this new normal our staff at Culinary Dropout in Austin need our help. Not only are some of our servers paying their way through college or just to survive but many of our chefs are providing for their families (as many of you are.) In a time when we have lost control over every day things in our lives helping our staff is at least something we can do.  Our restaurant is slated to be closed until May 1. We love our loyal customers and our family at the Domain and we hope to see you all again very  soon happy and healthy.   “When I was a boy and I would see scary things in the news my mother would say to me ‘Look for the helpers. You will always find people who are helping.” - Fred Rogers  Thank you for all of your support from the time our doors first opened to now. With all the love and gratitude we posses  CDO Management

title: Help Sicily to fight against Covid-19
description: Sono lontana dal mio paese e a conoscenza della catastrofica situazione in Sicilia al momento. Negli ospedali non ci sono abbastanza letti macchine e dispositivi individuali di protezione per infermieri e dottori che si stanno prendendo cura dei pazienti affetti dal Coronavirus.  Ve ne sarei estremamente grata se ci potreste aiutare anche con un piccolo gesto. Qualsiasi donazione conta e tutti insieme possiamo fare una grande differenza. Tutti I soldi saranno donati all Ospedale A. Ajello di Mazara del Vallo  (TP) in Sicilia. Grazie di cuore a tutti quanti.  I am away from my home town and aware of the catastrophic situation in Sicily at the moment. There are not enough beds and machines at the hospitals in Sicily and not individual protections to keep safe our nurses and doctors while treating patients affected by COVID19. I would be extremely grateful if you could give even a little help to them. Any action counts and all together we can make a big difference. All the money will be given to the Hospital in Mazara del Vallo (TP) in Sicily A. Ajello di Mazara del Vallo. A big thank you to everyone from the bottom of my Heart.

title: Covid19 - Donación de gafas protectoras
description: Desde Flamingo queremos ayudar a proteger a nuestros sanitarios y cuerpos de seguridad. Por ello hemos arrancado esta iniciativa para entre todos fabricar el máximo posible de gafas protectoras.  Por nuestra parte vamos a aportar las primeras 2.000 unidades y a gestionar todo el proceso tanto de fabricación como de importación y entrega a Sanidad.   Os pedimos que os suméis a esta petición de crowdfunding para que podamos juntos fabricar y donar más unidades. Por ello queremos pedirte tu ayuda para que mínimo fabriquemos 30.000 unidades más o las que las donaciones nos permitan. El coste estimado (fabricación e importación) de cada gafa protectora es de 16€. Es una cantidad pequeña pero que aporta mucho más de lo que puedes imaginar.   Por nuestra parte ya hemos comunicado a Sanidad la donación de las 2.000 unidades y la campaña de recaudación.  Una vez tengamos entregado todo crearemos un documento que pondremos a disposición de todo el mundo en nuestra página web donde se reflejará la factura de la compra de gafas la documentación de la importación la factura del envío y el albarán de entrega.  Cuanto antes lleguemos a la cifra antes podremos enviarlo a los hospitales.  ¡Muchas gracias por vuestra ayuda!  #StayHome #StayStrong

title: Alunni Pizzigotti per Ausl Imola Emergenza Covid19
description: I nostri ospedali sono allo stremo e abbiamo pensato che i ragazzi della scuola media Pizzigotti possano essere utili e contemporaneamente trarre un grande insegnamento da questa situazione rendendosi attivi nella raccolta fondi per il nostro ospedale territoriale lospedale di Imola.  I fondi raccolti saranno utilizzati per aiutare ad affrontare lepidemia di COVID19

title: DELTA |v| Covid-19 Relief Fund
description: DELTA |v| Forensic Engineering Inc. is committed to supporting our local community particularly in times of need.  During the the unprecedented events surrounding COVID-19 it is important for us to stay true to our three pillars:   Contribute to Growth  Collaborate with Colleagues  Commit to Accountability  Needless to say these are applicable even outside of our firm. And each can be applied to the communities in which we live.  We are asking each of our employees to contribute--as you are willing or able--to help provide relief to those overwhelmingly affected by the current crisis. No amount is too small and in fact $5 or $10 alone can make a substantial difference.  Our goal is modest: $2000. There will be a contribution from DELTA |v| as an organization and a dollar-for-dollar match up to $1000 provided by our CEO Brian Anders.  All funds will be donated directly to a vetted and reputable Charlotte-based organization dedicated to providing direct relief to Meck County residents.  Thank you in advance for rallying together in a time of need.

title: Support for Seniors at Bruyere During COVID19
description: As some of you may know most hospitals and seniors homes in Canada are under lock down because of COVID-19. This means no visitors and no contact with the outside world for many patients and seniors.  This is extremely hard on our most vulnerable population who may have already been feeling anxiety related to COVID-19.    We want to help put a smile on the faces of some of our local senior citizens!  To do so  weve partnered with the  Bruyère Foundation   to purchase some items for their hospital patients and residents here in Ottawa ON.  To further this initiative we are collecting funds to purchase yarn books classical music DVDs art supplies and regular hygiene products.  These are the items requested by Bruyère staff. The goal is for these items to help residents pass the time and bring a little joy into a tough situation.  All items will be purchased via  Amazon.ca   (using Prime to avoid delivery charges) and delivered directly to the home/hospital. This fundraiser is not on behalf of Bruyère - we are simply working in collaboration with them to provide additional support for their residents.  If you prefer to purchase and send your own products please contact us for information on where to have items delivered. Likewise if you are more comfortable sending an e-transfer just let us know. We will be gathering donations until March 31st 2020.  I am only one but still I am one. I cannot do everything but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything I will not refuse to do something that I can do. -Helen Keller  Thanks in advance for your generosity and loving our senior community!  Katie   Bruno Ochin

title: Racolta fondi per lOspedale di Mirandola Covid19
description: La nostra sanità in questo momento ha quanto mai bisogno del buon cuore e del sostegno di tutti. Sono necessarie mascherine tute protettive attrezzature e materiale per garantire la sicurezza dei medici degli operatori sanitari e di chi è in prima linea per contrastare il CoronaVirus. Sarà possibile fare versamenti anche tramite bonifico allIban IT47V0306966858100000003399 intestato a La Nostra Mirandola ODV causale Erogazione Liberale - Coronavirus Mirandola - Nome Cognome e recapiti per linvio della ricevuta.  Sono sicura che la solidarietà dei cittadini verso la nostra sanità e per il bene comune sarà grande anche questa volta.  Nicoletta Vecchi Arbizzi - Presidente de La Nostra Mirandola ODV

title: Help Space Bacon recoup their 2020 tour funds
description: Everybody is going through some tough times right now so please take care of yourselves first.  But if you do love Space Bacon and the music they bring to all of us and want to help them recover from the thousands of dollars lost in cancelled dates and flights so they can tour in the Fall... then please feel free to donate here. While its gut wrenching that this all happened right when they started their first national tour we know this is affecting EVERYONE so please only help if you can.   If you prefer you can also purchase any of the 100+ high quality  soundboards of their live concerts at any price you want here   https://spacebacon.bandcamp.com    As well as the following other options for donations.  PayPal:  Spacebaconmusic@gmail.com    Cash App: $SpaceBacon      Thank you and stay safe out there  3

title: Old Vinings Inn Team Covid-19 Emergency Fund
description: In light of recommendations by the CDC and Trump administration we suspended dining room service during all shifts as of Tuesday March 17th.  This is a hard but necessary decision.  The Old Vinings Inn family must do our part in flattening the curve and helping prevent further illnesses and deaths.     The impact to our staff is dramatic - the restaurant is their livelihood!  We hope we have brought warm memories and comfort to your family over the last 25 years and today we are asking for your help to do the same for our team!   Please donate today to ensure our staff can pay rents put food on their families tables and stay safe during this unprecedented crisis.

title: Help Trinity survive the Covid-19 crisis
description: We are absolutely gutted to have to write this update to you.  In light of recent announcements by the Government on the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic we regret to say that all gigs club nights   events are postponed for the immediate future. We limp along being open albeit with limited hours. This allows us to take a little bit of money so as to provide a limited amount of work to our staff who are clearly facing an uncertain few months. But as you can imagine our daily trade is devastated and even this will inevitably come to an end shortly.  In nearly 28 years weve never faced a fight to stay in business quite like this.  The recent announcements of help to the hospitality industry by the Government while helpful to some extent we largely dont qualify for. Our ridiculously inflated rateable value is now above the limit set by Government in order to qualify for emergency relief grants so unfortunately that is not available to us. We do get some Business rate relief going forward which is great but right now we still need to pay our other bills and help support the core staff for which we need around £2500 a week.  This is why we a crowdfunding for a scenario where we may be closed for 2 months. Who knows? It could be even longer.  Like so many other small independently run businesses we now face an unpredictable   potentially grave future and we really need your help to survive.  We absolutely understand that so many others are facing similarly uncertain times but we are encouraging anyone who is able to and wants to play a role in safe guarding the future of Trinity Harrows longest running and only dedicated live music venue to donate.  We really dont want to wake up in a world two or three months from now in a cultural wasteland where all that is left are Wetherspoons   McDonalds.
