The latter has been so helpful and people from all around the country have reached out. Mask kits have started to go out this morning. Please continue spreading the word! We have a new fundraising goal which will help us buy precious elastic and also fund more sewers time. We now have 20+ sewers ready to help but we cannot proceed until we have more elastic. Thank you again!

title: Hues Salon COVID19 Community Project
description: Hello my fellow humans!   Desperate times call for creative ingenuity in order to survive and take care of others.   We are here to make that happen.   With this tool we will be able to donate Haircuts Massage Foot Relieving and Hand Relieving and Skincare treatments to many of our Essential Workforce who are busting a move to make sure we have a safe healthy semi functioning society for us to continue to use.   As a family with family in the medical industry our hearts especially go to those AMAZING people facing the brunt of this epidemic IN their faces many without proper masks to keep themselves protected.   At Hues Salon + Skincare we will be Taking $25 donations that in turn provide much needed self care for these workers that are under more stress than we could ever imagine. For every $25= a wellness service for an Essential worker.   Think: ??? Nurses doctors Grocery  workers bankers  gas station workers delivery people  mail carriers  and take out cooks ?   You may nominate someone you love for first dibs on appointments by texting NOMINATE to 2512002131 and including their name and contact information so we may reach out to them. Tell us a little bit about why you want them to get some extra love.   These special pampering services will comence as soon as this social distancing requirement is lifted and we can reopen.   As a collective group our team will be donating 50 hours a week to accomodate these special people along side our regular Guests who will need our attention as soon as we are once again open for business.   At the $12000.00 goal we would be able to take care of all 480 Essential Workers. The more we raise the more we will contribute back to society.   Along with Taking care of the employees of our small business and our local vendors that keep us alive all year your donations will also be buying supplies to continue to make face masks for our hospitals since many are completely out.   Your help effects the lives of my mother Vicki Hughes our Skin and Wax specialist and ultimately my father John Hughes along with my husband Adam who is our Muscular Therapist. Laurel Haws is one of our amazing stylists and a talented Lash Artist who has 3 amazing and active children under 13 years. Lastly we have Rachel Brockman as part of our immediate Salon Family and this young womans career is just starting to really take off in the right direction. My family and Salon Family cant tell you what this kind of support means to us as we celebrate the first week of our 3rd year in business!     Our personal vendor trickle down includes our:  -Jam Group owned by Jordan Davis whos fiance also works there with two amazing employees Hannah and Emily. Jordan and Eric have kids one at home and seeing as their whole business is small business owners we want to do what we can to keep them on our payroll as well. -The Neill family that distribute our AVEDA products out of Hammond LA. They have already had a devestating year and -My amazing UPS delivery man that wears a knee brace and smiles every delivery even though hes in pain -To the Rescue book keeping where Jessica Allard has been instrumental in helping us navigate how to make rent with limited income for everyone on our property in Daphne -Direct Signs owned by Justen Metch who has been making us Work Shirts this year and is donating Daymakers on Duty shirts for our future community projects   An employee of one of our local hospitals reached out today and told us that Your group making masks cares more about us than our employers as it pertains to keeping these hospital employees safe with masks. While that may not necessarily be the truth of the matter we know red tape can slow down what is Right and Fair for these medical professionals putting it all out on the line for all of us   Those critical unmet needs can leave them feeling unimportant. So WE as their community get to remind them how much we appreciate them.   We are proud to be able to be sewing crews on the ground with the ability to create washable masks as a barrier for our precious Front Line workers.   As a self care measure if you have not joined the facebook group Life Doesnt Have to be Perfect to be Thankful I highly recommend it for your mental well being.   We love you inside and out even those of you weve never met face to face. We are a family as a country and we have to remember that were all doing our best and we are all scared.   Thank you for your help wherever you may be able to give it including sharing this along.   I am so proud of the love our immediate community members have been sharing and I hope to see more and more of that love spread accross our country.   Please steal this idea for your other community small businesses that may be drowning in overwhelm on how to put food on the table and keep their doors open in the future.   Youre amazing. Youre tougher than you think. You have the power to change the world one dollar at time. You can make a difference from your computer. YOU are invaluable.   So once again thank you for being here being present and being in our world.   Chelsey Hughes Founder of Daymaker Inc Hues Salon + Skincare 2512002131   Chelsey Hughes-Saridemir

title: PPE to Iowas healthcare workers fighting COVID-19
description: For ios devices please open with Safari. For desktops please go to gofundme and search PPE Iowa.    Protect our healthcare workers today!   Over the past few weeks the rapidly developing outbreak of COVID-19 caused by novel Coronavirus has upended our lives in an unprecedented way. The number of confirmed cases in Iowa has been growing rapidly. Johnson County and eastern Iowa are especially hit hard by this pandemic. While many of us can take precautionary measures by working from home healthcare workers first responders and urgent child care givers are at the frontline grappling with this pandemic. As they continue to work around the clock the dire shortage of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE such as masks and face shield) is putting their lives at risk. As reported in Patch 10 of the first 44 COVID-19 cases in Philadelphia are healthcare workers.  We are members of Chinese Church of Iowa City and a group of Chinese American volunteers who live and work in Iowa. To protect our colleagues and friends working in frontline fighting COVID-19 we are asking your generous support for purchasing essential PPE for our doctors nurses and many other first responders before these PPE run out soon. We have secured a few reliable medical suppliers in China. We have purchased the first batch of PPE including 6000 surgical masks 2000 KN95 masks and 300 face shields which will be donated to the University of Iowa Hospitals and Clinics and other healthcare providers in Iowa.   Our target is to raise $30000. All of them will be used to purchase PPE for Iowas healthcare workers fighting COVID-19. Now it is time for us to come together to safeguard the safety and well-being of the community at large.    We are all in this and we will get through this together. When we defeat this pandemic kids will run freely in the parks again friends will visit hug and laugh with one another and families will explore nature and cities. Lets act NOW and make an impact!  With gratitude  Eastern Iowa “PPE for Healthcare Workers” Chinese American Volunteers Chinese Church of Iowa City  Notes: You can also donate PPE directly to UIHC:   https://uihc.org/kind-donations     ??????????????! title: La Costanera Corona Gutscheine Münster
description: Liebe (Stamm-)Gäste und Freunde  das  Costanera-Team auf der Bergstraße vermisst euch schon!   Unser peruanisches Restaurant hat sich in Münster mit seiner vielfältigen Küche etabliert. Doch vor genau einer Woche habe ich mich schweren Herzens entschieden „La Costanera an der Aa“ aufgrund der Maßnahmen zur Eindämmung der Corona-Epidemie zum Wohl meiner Gäste und meines Personals vorübergehend zu schließen.   Diese Situation stellt mich wie viele andere Gastronomen vor große finanzielle und existentielle Herausforderungen. Die Last der Fixkosten für mein Personal Miete Nebenkosten etc. werde ich in diesem und weiteren Monaten mit Verdienstausfall nicht tragen können.  Aus diesem Grund habe ich mich entschlossen hier teilzunehmen.  Wenn du also einen Beitrag dazu leisten möchtest dass in Münster die Möglichkeit erhalten bleibt peruanische und andere lateinamerikanische Gerichte zu speisen unterstütze uns mit einer Spende. Wir werden  für alle Spenden einen Gutschein über die gleiche Summe des Spendenbetrages  ausgeben.   D.h. Deine Spende ist ein Gutschein :)    Für die  namentlich gekennzeichneten Spenden bereiten wir Gutscheine in Höhe des Spendenbetrags zur Verrechnung  vor. Du kannst die Gutscheine gerne abholen oder beim nächsten Besuch deine Spendenquittung von Gofundme mitbringen dann verrechnen wir den Betrag.   Anonyme Spenden lassen sich leider nicht zuordnen und können somit auch nicht als Gutschein erstattet werden.   In der Hoffnung dass wir alle diese Krise schnell und unbeschadet überstehen freue ich mich auf ein baldiges gesundes Wiedersehen.  Muchas gracias Dein Felix

title: Feed the Children for Covid-19
description: The coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing concern around the world as well as right here in the Midwest. Like so many Yankton businesses Rivers Edge is trying to do their part. Our great city is filled with hard-working folks many who cant afford to take time off or will be laid off due to current circumstances. Lets all pitch in and help our neighbors.   As Im sure youre aware Yankton and surrounding areas have closed schools temporarily in an attempt to control COVID-19. Rivers Edge has already provided hundreds of sack lunches but there is limited amount of funds to provide these meals. To ensure that the children in our community arent going without a proper meal and to hopefully help alleviate a little stress for families during this trying time Rivers Edge would like to continue to offer ToGo meals to all children ages 18   under free of charge - no judgment no questions asked. We understand this this can cause stress and concern to many families in the our community and they are trying to alleviate a little bit of stress by providing healthy and nutritious meals for all kiddos 18   under as well as their families if possible.   Through this GoFundMe Feed The Children for Covid-19 we can continues to help families in Yankton and the surrounding communities by preparing sack lunches and family meals to those in need. Were looking for monetary donations. Anything anyone can contribute in this time is greatly appreciated. We need your help!  How this will work: 1. Donate to our campaign. 2. Well get the food and prepare sack lunches* for each distribution center (church community center). 3. Volunteers will pick-up the food from Rivers Edge and deliver to distribution centers around the Southeast South Dakota area. 4. A family member will go pick up sack lunches for their family at the distribution center or at Rivers Edge. 5. Families in need will get a meal.  We anticipate a growing list of churches and community centers that will be distribution centers in the greater Yankton area.  $3 feeds 1 person. $12 feeds 4 people. $36 feeds 1 dozen people. $150 feeds 50 people at 1 distribution center per day. $300 feeds 100 people at 1 distribution center per day. $1050 feeds 50 people at 1 distribution center per week. $2100 feeds 100 people at 1 distribution center per week.  All money raised will go right into the community to get these sacks out. Any left over monies will be forwarded to the Yankton Sack Program  Please donate what you can. Well try to prepare as many meals as possible and bring in other restaurants to help. Rivers Edge is not the only ones with time on their hands these days.   Rivers Edge is a licensed food establishment. At all times rigorously following state and city health codes with even higher standards for a time like this.  Thank you for your donations! Please share and pass this on!  *Sack lunches will likely include sandwich fruit granola bars and ready-to-eat-staples.

title: LIC Early Childhood Educators Impacted by COVID19
description: When we closed on March 16 2020 under the direction of NYC Department of Education our first concern was our employees: figuring out how to keep as many of our staff working from home as actively employed as possible and how to help those whom we had to place on hiatus receive paid time off unemployment benefits or a combination of those. Unfortunately Rainbow currently does not have the financial resources to provide a more meaningful safety net to those employees who will have no work hours or reduced work hours during this crisis.   What we are hoping to do with this is to ask parents to fund our remote learning initiative for our preschool and toddler classrooms so we can give more work hours to our teachers. We desperately need additional resources to fund additional content. We would love to do more with Google classroom as well as Zoom meetings with our little friends including live morning meetings and activities.   If you are able to do so please contribute what you can. Any amount would be greatly appreciated. Our suggested donation is $300 per family. If you are a friend  or extended families of Rainbow parents donation of any size is greatly appreciated. Please feel free to send this to your friends families or whoever may be able to help us! All 100% of the proceeds will go to our teachers.   Sincerely  Rainbow Management Team

title: Proyecto Respiradores - Fighting Covid 19
description: (English below)  Un porcentaje significativo de pacientes de coronavirus necesita un respirador para sobrevivir. Además los respiradores son esenciales en muchas otras operaciones.  En palabras de uno de los médicos con los que colaboramos gracias a los respiradores podemos evitar  no llegar a la situación de tener que escoger quién se intuba y quién muere .  Juntos podemos dar un poco de oxígeno y esperanza a muchas personas.  Fruto de la búsqueda de los primeros 11 respiradores enviados al  Hospital Gregorio Marañón  y que logramos traer a España desde Bruselas hemos seguido recibiendo ofertas de equipamiento sanitario principalmente de segunda mano desde diferentes puntos de Europa.  Agotado nuestro primer presupuesto decidimos ampliar la dotación económica pero aún así es insuficiente (los precios oscilan entre  5000  y  15000 Euros/Ud  + trasporte) por ello y para poder hacer frente a nuevas oportunidades de importar más equipos hemos abierto éste canal de financiación para que todo aquel que quiera unirse a nosotros lo haga al nivel que le sea posible.   Las compras van a ir destinadas a aquellos Hospitales de toda España que nos los soliciten.  Gracias por ayudarnos a ayudar!  --  A high percentage of coronavirus patients need a respirator to survive. Additionally respirators are essential in many other operations.  In the words of a doctor with whom we collaborate thanks to respirators we can avoid  not reaching the situation of having to choose who is intubated and who dies .  Together we can give a little oxygen and hope to many people.  As a result of the search for the first 11 respirators sent to the  Gregorio Marañón Hospital  and which we managed to bring to Spain from Brussels we have continued to receive offers of health equipment mainly second-hand from different parts of Europe.  With our first budget exhausted we decided to expand the financial envelope but it is still insufficient (prices range between  5000 and 15000 Euros / unit  + transportation) for this reason and in order to face new opportunities to import more equipment we have opened this financing channel so that anyone who wants to join us can do so at the level possible for them.   The purchases will go to Hospitals throughout Spain that have requested them from us.  Thank you for helping us save lives!

title: Help Autumn - Covid-19 Front Line Registered Nurse
description: We are all becoming affected by Covid-19. This is a story of a Registered Nurse Autumn who is working tirelessly on the front line during this human tragedy. Autumn is working the Emergency Department in an area hospital located in Baltimore City Maryland. She is being cross trained to help Covid-19 patients.   Autumn has been a single mother to her son since I met her 11 years ago when we were baristas at Starbucks. I have watched her make it through school excel in her career and become a passionate and skilled Registered Nurse. She has always wanted to help people; it is her calling.  Shes working long shifts and is being exposed every day. The hospital is low on protective gear. Autumns family is terrified that she will be exposed to Covid-19. She has said This is what I am doing it all for this is exactly what Ive signed up for.  Autumn has always been front and center for anyone who has needed her. Even when I was sick and had two surgeries she took the time to bring me a care package and spend some time with me. This only scratches the surface of what a completely selfless being she is.   Autumn is conflicted because she does not want to expose her son and mother who live with her to Covid-19. She is considering finding a place at the hospital to hunker down and stay away from home. She stated she may be able to find a cot chair etc. Many of her coworkers are arranging to be separated from family to reduce the risk of infecting others. I am asking for anyone that can help to please consider donating funds so Autumn can stay in a nearby hotel to limit the chance of spreading Covid-19 to her family. Additionally a Nurse working the front line truly deserves to be comfortable without risking her loved ones health.  As I stated before she is a single mother raising her son. There is no other parent in the picture to help her. She pays her bills and doesnt take handouts. Funds are limited for her and she simply cannot afford a hotel to separate herself from her household. Autumn is on the frontline with some of the Bravest people trying to help others in this unprecedented health emergency for the modern world.  These funds would go directly to Autumn and if the full amount is raised it should afford her 13 to 15 days in a decent hotel in our area. Please help if you can.

title: Have a JEGantic Heart (COVID-19)
description: One Magic Moment Presents    Have a Jegantic Heart  During this Pandemic The Jegantic Group owners of Bordelle The Farsides and other businesses have decided to collect and redistribute food and neccesities for the elderly and families in need. In week 1 weve distributed food to benefit over 500 people through churches and food banks such as Share The Warmth Reach and West Island Mission to name a few. Our goal is to help as many as we can and we are asking for you to contribute whatever you can to help us help others during these trying times!   John Gumbley  - The Jegantic Group  ***French to follow after the video ***     One Magic Moment Présente    Have a Jegantic Heart  Au cours de cette pandémie Le Groupe Jegantic les propriétaires du Bordelle Farsides et dautres entreprises ont décidé de  récupérer des dons de nourriture et des produits essentiels afin de redistribuer aux personnes âgées ainsi quaux familles dans le besoin. Au cours de la première semaine nous avons distribué de la nourriture pour plus de 500 personnes avec laide déglises et de banques alimentaires telles que Share The Warmth Reach et West Island Mission pour en nommer  quelques-unes. Notre objectif est daider le plus grand nombre de personnes possible et nous vous demandons de contribuer tout ce que vous pouvez pour nous aider en cette période de préoccupation accrue due à la COVID-19.  John Gumbley  - Le Groupe Jegantic

title: Ayuda Hospitales de Madrid - COVID 19
description: CAMPAÑA SOLIDARIA DEL FÚTBOL ESPAÑOL CONTRA EL COVID19.    La pandemia del Coronavirus se extiende sin freno por España causando muertes día tras día. La Comunidad Autónoma más afectada con diferencia es Madrid y sus Hospitales han llegado al colapso y en ocasiones al desabastecimiento de material sanitario. Próximamente una de las posibles medidas será el triaje ¿Nos ayudas a salvar vidas?  El fútbol español colaborará con un sorteo solidario de material deportivo que será donado íntegramente a los Hospitales de la Comunidad de Madrid.  Colaborarán clubes y jugadores desde Primera División hasta Fútbol Amateur de forma conjunta para conseguir el objetivo final:  SALVAR VIDAS .  Para participar simplemente hay que realizar un donativo y poner su nombre completo en los comentarios a través de esta plataforma. Los clubes y los jugadores realizarán el envío del material deportivo una vez vuelva todo a la normalidad.  La industria del fútbol es una de las que más dinero mueve en el mundo unámonos todos para aportar nuestro granito de arena.   #YoJuegoEstePartido ¿Y TÚ?  Difunde dona cualquier ayuda es bien recibida para paliar el daño que este virus está haciendo a miles de personas y familias que sufren día tras día los efectos de esta pandemia.

title: COVID-19 CRISIS - SAVE AWESOME & BEYOND
description: **PLEASE NOTE** anyone who does make a donation (that is not anonymous) will receive a gift card from my  shop for the equivalent amount of the donation - once this crisis is over.   **EDITED TO ADD: GIFT CARDS can now also be purchased on our website via E-Transfer Credit or PayPal:    CLICK HERE TO PURCHASE FROM OUR SITE     Due to the COVID-19 CRISIS our print shop is closed until further notice.  We are working hard on a new online shop. We have also moved our operations to work from home but that is also super challenging.   This crisis has severely impacted our family owned business and we are going to need some help to survive.  There is no financial relief for us at this time. Even when there is it wont even cover living expenses let alone all of our overhead costs.  Its difficult for us to ask for help at a time like this. We are normally the givers. We love to help our community as much as possible and we hope to get back to that as soon as possible when all of this is said and done!    We also realize that this crisis has impacted and devastated many.  So obviously there is no obligation whatsoever! =)   Anything that is donated over and above what we need will be put back into our community... some way some how.   Thanks for stopping by! Please take good care of you and yours. Stay safe and healthy.   P.S. If you can think of any way our business can help you during this difficult time please message us. =)

title: 100 miles to support NYC COVID-19
description: Hello World  My name is  David Kilgore  and I am an athlete and employee at On.  As a NYC local Im on a mission to give back to the city during this tough time and also challenge myself.   On Friday 3/27 I will be running 100 miles back in my hometown of Palm Bay Florida. After facing the tough fact that most of my races were canceled due to COVID-19 I wanted a new way to push my limits. I am running to raise awareness and donations for the communities needing it most. Your donations will contribute to Gift Cards that I will be purchasing from struggling NYC run specialty stores. Stores that I typically work with on a daily basis. Those Gift Cards will then be donated to ( NYC Health + Hospitals  ) to provide front line medical workers supportive footwear while they are working long days keeping my city healthy.    I encourage everyone to donate and run virtually with me through your Instagram Stories and on Instagram live. Be sure to tag me ( @davidkilgore  )  @on_running   and #AthletesAdapt . If you are able to run be sure to do so responsibly and keep your distance from others. If you are not able to get outside and run at this time do what you can to stay active and healthy. The run will start at 4 AM EST.   Thanks all and see you out there!   -David

title: Kidney Transplant
description: Gabriel has been on dialysis for some years now and his health  is declining.  He is in much need of a kidney. This transplant is his last opportunity for a change in his health for the better. However with this medical procedure come costs that we are unable to cover on our own. We are now asking for your help our friends and family to help save Gabriels life with your donations. Anything no matter how minimal the amount may be would be of great help to us. If you are able please consider donating to give Gabriel the kidney he desperately needs to see his grandchildren grow. ------- Gabriel ha estado en diálisis durante algunos años y su salud está disminuyendo. Tiene mucha necesidad de un riñón. Este trasplante es su última oportunidad para un cambio mejor en su salud. Sin embargo con este procedimiento médico vienen costos que no podemos cubrir por nuestra cuenta. Ahora estamos pidiendo su ayuda a nuestros amigos y familiares para ayudar a salvar la vida de Gabriel con sus donaciones. Cualquier cosa por mínima que sea la cantidad sería de gran ayuda para nosotros. Si puede considere donar para darle a Gabriel el riñón que necesita desesperadamente para ver crecer a sus nietos.

title: Legionnaire Saloon relief fund due to COVID-19
description: Ouch!  One day were pouring cocktails and singing karaoke the next were bottled up in our homes wondering WTF just happened!  We cant wait to get back to hanging out with all you guys at the Legionnaire just as soon as this craziness ends. But right now our friendly neighborhood bar needs YOUR help!    We the staff of Legionnaire Saloon are currently out of work as a result of COVID-19 with no end date in sight.  To make sure we will be there when this is over we ask you to support us now with whatever you can spare. 100% of donations will go directly to every employee keeping us fed in our homes with the lights on.    Legionnaire has been around since 2013 and we intend to be here for many more years to come.  We want to thank you for helping us keep this Oakland institution going through this unbelievable moment of crisis.  Legionnaires rely on their fellows to get through the worst of times so we can enjoy the best of times together in the future.   Our farewell tour is unlike any Cher or Celion Dion farewell tour!  We will always come back to rock-out with you! Cheers!!

title: HELP SUPPORT COVID-19 MASK PRODUCTION
description: A friend and co-worker of mine was trying to figure out what she could do in a world where we feel pretty helpless in the fight to slow the spread of COVID-19. Feeling restless in our newly furloughed state of employment like so many others she heard on the news that there was a shortage of masks to protect against the spread of the virus.  So she put her knowledge and skill to work and started making a pattern for the masks she that she then started producing in her own home to disperse to those in need.   She started a Facebook Page to share how to execute this task and to enlist anyone ready and willing to help with the cause. She was hit with a whirlwind of support and community outreach - people willing to sew people willing to pick up and deliver the masks and people to help organize and execute the operation. This was also followed by an incredible amount of requests for masks for the doctors offices hospitals animal hospitals and other places with high volume traffic.   This team of amazing people is working to fill an impossible demand and will continue to do so because it is what they have to give. They are also covering all the costs for the materials needed. There is also a lot of traveling that incurs cost for fuel or shipping costs.   This page is to try to give back to them so that they can continue providing this incredible service. They are helping to protect the people that are battling the fight against this virus the people that work in businesses that remain open so that we can go to the doctor  buy food  get automotive repairs done fill prescriptions and the list goes on and on.    If you can help the funding of this group of volunteers there is no amount too small. If you have the ability please consider starting the production of masks in your area. The need for Personal Protective Equipment is real and will only get more daunting if we dont give it everything we have.    Thank you and be safe.

title: Conquering COVID-19
description: The novel coronavirus (COVID-19) has been devastating the world for months and has already claimed thousands of lives. In addition to health impacts there are also several knock-on effects such as loss of income with people being forced to stay home and potential neglect of societys most vulnerable amidst this isolation.   With the situation becoming more serious governments and health professionals are exhausting their resources while trying to keep the general public as safe as possible. We at UQISC believe that it is our responsibility to step up and help when society needs it the most. The Conquering COVID-19 campaign was started to make sure that each and every one of us can donate whatever we can to help put an end to this pandemic. We believe in holistic support and so it is important to address both the direct solution of this issue and the negative effects it has created.  Accordingly the amount raised in this campaign will be split into two halves of which one half goes to RBWH Foundation Coronavirus Action Fund and another goes to the Foodbank. Your money to the RBWH Foundation will go to the direct solution including expansion of hospital drug trials provision of vital medical and intensive equipment in hospitals as well as support for our amazing medical staff through wellbeing initiatives. Your money to Foodbank will go to funding food purchases for charities which are at the frontline for providing a basic human necessity to societys most vulnerable. This is especially crucial at a time when food relief supply is greatly outstripping supply fuelled by shortages due to panic buying.  At this crucial stage of the pandemic every dollar counts. Each dollar you donate you are helping yourself as well as the wider community. You have the opportunity today to do your part in slowing down this deadly pandemic. We trust that you will. Lets join hands and Conquer COVID-19 together.

title: Donate Medical Supplies to Covid-19 Doctors!
description: Many hospitals in New York are critically short of masks and other protective equipment due to the Covid-19. Medical workers are most vulnerable to the disease due to constant exposure to sick people and have high mortality rate if not protected.  China has excess protective gear manufacturing capacity since they ramp up production to meet the crisis. Now that the outbreak is winding down there we can buy the excess capacity and donate to needed hospitals. Weve been able to identify sources of Makrite and Dasheng masks (N95 masks certified by NIOSH and FDA) in China who can sell us up to 10000 N95 masks but what we need now are funding to bring those to United States.  Our goal is to give out 10000 masks and you can join us in helping our awesome hospital staff!   Top Hospitals Targeted for Donation:  New York Presbyterian - Cornell Elmhurst Hospital     ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________  The idea for this fundraising effort took root when I heard that a close friend who works as a doctor in LA was forbidden by the hospital she works at to wear face masks due to fear of a shortage. Despite the fact that she was showing flu-like symptoms and around sick people all the time she had to continue working at the hospital. I heard from some friends that when the coronavirus initially broke out in China many factories were converted to manufacture medical supplies. This made me realize that as the situation gets better there should be excess capacity to be exported to medical workers in USA who desperately need these protective equipment.   I felt compelled to take charge of this effort because even though I was born and raised in USA I am also fluent in Mandarin and understand Chinese culture. Hence I am in a perfect position to coordinate with the USA hospitals to understand their needs while using network in China to directly get in contact with the manufacturers. Please join this effort to protect our medical workers who are at the front line fighting against this terrible disease by donating to this effort.  -Jeremy Weng Renewal Team Member

title: COVID19 Ration drive in Pakistan
description: Salam EveryoneThis post is targeted to all my friends and fellows in US. Due to recent increase of COVID19 cases in Pakistan and lockdowns a lot of daily wage earners and labourers have been affected and situation is going to get worse overtime.To provide Ration to these people a lot of people are working on voluntarily basis. A few of them i know personally and could vouch for their integrity and trustworthiness.I have attached links to their food drives as well in the end.This is the time we need to step up as a community and help others.Being abroad i thinks we should donate generously and pray for humanity.May we get rid of this virus soon and may everything get back to normal soon (Inshallah)These are the people and charities who will use these funds to distribute rations. If you want you may write a particular charity else I will try to equally distribute among the below mentioned charities.1: Bilal Hussain https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=3314503955232525 id=100000188587670 2: Shafaq Bilal and Ahmed Faraz khan https://gogetfunding.com/coronaaidpakistan/ 3: Chiraagh foundation https://www.facebook.com/chiraaghPakistan/ 4: Hamid Raza Malka  https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=10215366955062972 id=1109203653 5: Rizq Foundation https://www.facebook.com/Rizq.Sharefood/ I would prefer to donate to broader range of organization so our donations could reach to a wider range of deserving people.All the funds raise will be distributed among above mentioned resources. Post will be updated for all the updates.

title: Seattle Producers / Engineers Affected by Covid-19
description: Help our Music Recording Community During the Covid-19 Pandemic!    Hello we are Rachel Field and Ed Brooks of Resonant Mastering in Seattle WA.   The Seattle recording scene is blessed with a talented lively diverse and creative bunch of engineers and producers who have made the choice to embrace a profession of passion. We work with and for musicians to create quality recordings that capture their talents.  Engineers and producers play an important role in the making of recorded music. Engineers are responsible for the tones and fidelity of a recording which often contribute to the way a song feels to the listener. Producers work with the artists to develop their songs and create an overall aesthetic for the recording. Both work to keep the session on track to meet deadlines and budgets. We are the behind-the-scenes people using technical and creative skills to make records ready for release.  We are gig-based workers; the majority of us are freelancers or sole proprietorships with no social safety net programs to draw from in times of need.  The last couple of decades have seen the advent of free music for consumers and a sharp decline in music purchases.This brought the music industry to a place where big record labels are not funding recording and production of albums as much as they used to. As a result artists have less support from labels and they have to rely solely on income from live performances or an additional “day job”.   It has been so hard watching our musician friends and clients suffer from an instant loss of income.  Subsequently it has been tough to hear of fellow engineers and studio owners losing booking after booking- and now looking at the imminent reality of not being able to pay rent utilities and grocery bills. All this while trying to figure out what it means for us and for our studio Resonant Mastering. While the immediate effect of this outbreak has caused cancellations now and in the coming months the long term effects of an economic slowdown will have a continued impact on recording studios and the people who work in them. This will be a long hard journey for our recording engineers.  It is so hard to ask for help. Our hope is that by creating a communal fundraiser we can bear that difficulty together and keep as many in the community afloat as possible.  If you can give we appreciate you! If you cant we understand! Please share in case someone you know might be able to throw a few coins in the jar.  We cant wait to get back into the studios and keep doing what we love- making rad records.   Please help by donating and/or sharing this fundraiser! Thank you so much!    How Funds Will Be Distributed:   Grants will be awarded to applicants working as engineers in the Greater Seattle Area who are financially impacted by the Covid-19 pandemic. Amounts will be based on what is raised and number of applicants. Wed love to put $1000 in the hands of out-of-work engineers. We expect about 40-50 folks to apply. The more the better! Funds will be divided evenly among qualifying applicants. If there is interest and funding for additional rounds of disbursements well keep it going.    If you are a Seattle area Producer or Audio Engineer and would like to apply for this grant please follow this link and answer all the questions as completely as you can:    https://forms.gle/8BMu555rA27aAyyR9

title: RACCOLTA FONDI CRI INCISA EMERGENZA COVID19
description: Aiutateci ad acquistare le protezioni necessarie per i Volontari. Anche noi abbiamo paura ma se ci date una mano riusciremo ad avere protezioni migliori per affrontare tutti i servizi che in questo brutto periodo ci stanno chiedendo.

title: Material para Hospital Clínico San Carlos
description: Debido a la situación actual en nuestros hospitales y la escasez de test para detectar el COVID-19 no solo son necesarias las aportaciones de las grandes riquezas de este país en esta lucha tenemos que estar juntos. Esta donación se ha creado para que todos los ciudadanos podamos aportar nuestro grano de arena y juntos volver a sonreír. En Madrid es donde se reúnen la mayoría de casos y los hospitales sufren la falta de materiales necesarios para poder protegerse. Si no protegemos a nuestros sanitarios no tendremos quien proteja a nuestros enfermos. Por esta razón quiero aportar mi grano de arena creando este Crowdfunding solidario cuyos fondos irán al Hospital Clínico San Carlos (Madrid) se que todos los hospitales necesitan materiales pero elegí el Clínico por tener amigos trabajando en el. Es prioritaria la adquisición de medios materiales. * EPIS: Guantes batas mascarillas gafas de protección. * Geles desinfectantes (Entre otras muchas cosas)Actualmente solo tengo contacto con amigos que trabajan en dicho Hospital en el momento de retirar los fondos serán directamente retirados para el hospital. #juntospodemos

title: Sosteniamo la Croce Rossa di Borgonovo - COVID-19
description: Lemergenza sanitaria legata al COVID-19 sta mettendo a dura prova il Sistema Sanitario italiano: migliaia di operatori sono impegnati ogni giorno in prima linea.  Pro Loco di Borgonovo Val Tidone USD Borgonovese Gruppo Podistico Borgonovese VeloSport Borgonovese TuttInAcqua Gruppo Alpini Ex Allievi Don Orione Gruppo Musicale Orione e Movimento Laicale Orionino hanno deciso di dare il loro piccolo contributo idea condivisa con lAmministrazione Comunale. Abbiamo già collaborato insieme in occasione della Borgo Run through Colors evento grazie a cui abbiamo donato fondi alla sezione locale della Croce Rossa. E vogliamo aiutarli ancora soprattutto in questa situazione di emergenza.  Abbiamo quindi deciso di promuovere una raccolta fondi per sostenere la Croce Rossa di Borgonovo Val Tidone.   Ci dai una mano? #insiemesipuò  AGGIORNAMENTO 26.03.2020: grazie grazie grazie! A tutti quelli che stanno continuando a donare! Il nuovo obiettivo è raggiungere una donazione di 6000€.  AGGIORNAMENTO 25.03.2020: grazie alla vostra generosità possiamo puntare a un nuovo obiettivo: 3000€ per la Croce Rossa di Borgonovo Val Tidone!  AGGIORNAMENTO 25.03.2020: abbiamo già raggiunto il primo obiettivo ora arriviamo ai 2000€ sosteniamo la Croce Rossa di Borgonovo Val Tidone!  Il nostro primo obiettivo è raccogliere 1000€.

title: COVID-19 Barber Bailout - Mens Room Barber Shop
description: During the time our barber shop has been shut-down weve had numerous calls   emails from our wonderful clients asking how they can help out their favorite barber during this overwhelming crisis were ALL living through. Our barbers work for commission + tips. If they dont work they dont earn a living. If youre able give them a hand during this tough time for the entire service industry. All funds will be evenly disbursed among our barber staff with 10% going to the support staff. Thanks for your support stay well   well see you all when its safe to reopen.  The Mens Room Barber Shop - Shorewood WI

title: Köhlerliesel ~  Corona Gutschein
description: Liebe Gäste   Stammgäste  auch wir müssen den Tatsachen in dieser schweren Zeit ins Auge blicken und euch um Hilfe bitten!!!  Durch den Corona Virus sind wir als Bar/Kneipe seit Mitte März von den behördlichen Schliessungen direkt betroffen und haben seitdem bedauerlicherweise sehr starke Umsatzeinbußen. Da leider zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt noch kein Ende der Krise in Sicht ist und wir unseren Mitarbeitern-innen weiterhin eine Perspektive geben wollen haben wir uns entschieden euch auf diesem Weg um Hilfe    Unterstützung zu bitten!   Wie könnt ihr uns helfen?   Kauft unser Köhlerliesel Quarantäne Paket mit euren Lieblingschnäpsen für zuhause :)  Bestellen könnt ihr über die bekannten Social Media Kanäle oder per Mail an: info@zumkoehlerliesel.de                oder  Mit einer namentlich gekennzeichnet Spende auf dieser Seite erhaltet ihr einen Gutschein in Höhe des Spendenbetrags den wir euch gerne per Post zu schicken oder ihr zeigt beim nächsten Besuch Eure Spendenquittung von GOFUNDME und wir verrechnen den Betrag.   Eure Spende ist ein Gutschein!!!   Anonyme Spenden lassen sich leider nicht zuordnen und können somit auch nicht als Gutschein erstattet werden.  Wir hoffen  das wir mit eurer Unterstützung diese schwere Zeit überstehen und bald wieder mit unserem gesamten Team und euch zusammen die Nacht zum Tag machen können!!!  Euer Team Köhlerliesel

title: Covid-19 Sosteniamo insieme la Croce Bianca
description: Noi dipendenti di Hilti Italia le nostre famiglie i nostri clienti tutti insieme vorremmo essere daiuto in questa situazione demergenza. Insieme possiamo fare la differenza anche a distanza insieme possiamo aiutare concretamente chi è in prima linea tutti i giorni per curare lItalia.   Hilti Italia vuole supportare le proprie persone e i propri clienti nel sentirsi uniti e utili aprendo una raccolta fondi in favore della  Croce Bianca di Milano sezione di Ciserano (BG) .  Lobiettivo è rispondere al bisogno della Croce Bianca aiutando lassociazione nell acquistare unambulanza attrezzata  per fronteggiare lemergenza Covid-19.   Insieme e uniti possiamo raccogliere i fondi necessari perché questo accada.   #Insiemesempre per un presente migliore!   -----------------------------------------------------  We Hilti Italia employees our families our clients all together would like to help in this emergency. Together  we can make the difference and we can encourage  those who are fighting every day on the field  to heal Italy.  Hilti Italia wants to support  its community to be part of a fundraiser in favor of  Croce Bianca di Milano section of Ciserano (BG) .   The goal is to help Croce Bianca in the  acquisition of a new fully equipped ambulance  to fight Covid-19 emergency.  Together as a team we can collect the required amount of funds to transform this goal into reality.    #togetheralways for a better present!

title: Support Irish Student Nurses commute - Covid-19
description: My name is Stephanie and I work for Trinity College in the School of Nursing and Midwifery as a building Attendant. Each day at work I meet the most fantastic and interesting student nurses. The range of students differ from young adults straight out of school to people in their mid 50s with grown up children.  Despite personal financial issues and high levels of stress that all students face they have always shown a great level of professionalism and kindness to myself Pat Brian and the late Michael Kinsella as they would share cakes treats and their personal stories with us .   As Ireland faces a national health emergency many student nurses have been on the front line saving lives whilst putting their own lives at risk.   They are depending on their parents to support them as they struggle to pay for bus fares to and from work. Some are mature students with families of their own and households to run with little or no support.   The aim of this is to provide the student nurses with the finances to commute to work each day and help with any financial difficulties they may face in their personal life.   I dont have much money to donate myself but with support we could assist if not just 1 student nurse that is struggling financially get to work each day and save many many lives.   Thank you.

title: Lieve Oma Opgelicht Tijdens Corona-Drama
description: Wij zijn de dochter zoon schoondochter en schoonzoon van Els. Een lieve moeder (en oma van vijf kleinkinderen) van 63 jaar. Els heeft altijd een bewogen leven gehad. Ze is jarenlang leerkracht geweest op het basisonderwijs en daarvoor heeft ze altijd gewerkt met minder-validen en gehandicapten. Een vrouw die zich compleet inzette voor onze maatschappij en de minder-bedeelden.  Los daarvan is ze voor ons de allerliefste moeder en oma die we ons kunnen wensen. Juist daarom willen we eenmalig jullie hulp vragen.    Els zit al een aantal jaar in de ziektewet. Ze heeft bijna elk mogelijke operatie gehad en overwonnen en heeft tevens een vorm van kanker doorstaan. Momenteel staat ze wederom op een wachtlijst voor een buikoperatie omdat de vorige niet naar behoren is uitgevoerd. Door al deze lichamelijke klachten en bijkomende complicaties was het niet meer haalbaar om als leerkracht door te gaan. Echter bleef ze altijd positief en had een klein beetje gespaard om nog te voorzien in haar levensbehoefte en om leuke dingen te kunnen doen met haar (klein)kinderen. De moeder van Els (onze oma van 94) zit sinds twee jaar in een verzorgingstehuis. Na een val waarbij ze haar heup brak ging het snel achteruit met haar gezondheid. Sindsdien gaat Els elke dag op bezoek bij onze oma. Ongeacht hoe het met haar zelf gaat. Daar kwam deze week verandering in. Onze oma was erg aan het hoesten en zoals het protocol luid werd ze dus voor de zekerheid in quarantaine gezet. Om vervolgens te kunnen testen op het Corona (COVID19) virus. Helaas is oma een beetje aan het dementeren. Ze zit nu in het verzorgingstehuis opgesloten in haar (kleine) kamer en wordt verzorgd en behandeld door de artsen in van die grote speciale medische pakken. Logisch en begrijpelijk maar erg heftig en ingrijpend voor oma en dus ook voor onze moeder. Oma kan geen bezoek meer ontvangen en voor ons allemaal is dat opzich al een hele verdrietige situatie gezien de gezondheid van onze oma. Els is er heel erg emotioneel onder.  Afgelopen maandag kreeg Els de situatie van haar moeder te horen. De artsen vertelde ook over de gezondheid van haar moeder die enorm achteruit ging door de isolatie. Mogelijk zal oma dit niet overwinnen door alle onduidelijkheid en spanningen die erbij komen kijken. Ongeacht of ze wel of niet positief getest wordt op het virus. Maar nu komt eigenlijk pas het aller trieste van dit verhaal waarbij we een beroep willen doen op jullie hulp omdat we simpelweg met onze handen in het haar zitten.  Els kreeg een WhatsAppje met dit is mijn nieuwe nummer mam. Gevuld met alle emoties nam ze het aan voor de waarheid. De persoon vroeg hoe het ging en of hij/zij langs kon komen. Een bezoek van dochter/zoon wordt natuurlijk altijd gewaardeerd dus ging ze er goed goedgelovig in mee. Vervolgens werd er gevraagd of Els een paar betalingen kon doen dan kreeg ze het geld contant terug. Els gaf aan dat ze dat geld eigenlijk niet had maar wellicht tijdelijk haar spaargeld kon schuiven als ze het toch dezelfde avond nog terug kreeg. De oplichter speelde hier gretig op in. Binnen een uur maakte ze bijna 5500- euro over om vervolgens geen reactie meer te krijgen van het nummer. Pas na een uur ging er een lampje branden. Helaas. Ontzettend onhandig natuurlijk maar de samenloop van omstandigheden maken dit zo zielig.  Els heeft haar complete spaargeld overgemaakt omdat ze zon lieve en goedgelovige vrouw is . Daar is op een hele smerige manier misbruik van gemaakt. Het feit dat ze bereid was om dit voor haar kind te doen laat al zien over wat voor mens dit verhaal gaat. De bank en politie willen (lees: kunnen) haar niet helpen omdat ze vrijwillig het geld heeft overgemaakt. Bovendien gaan zulke oplichtingspraktijken schuil achter tal van anonimiteiten. Een enorme laffe daad van deze oplichter(s).  Mijn moeder gaf in het gesprek namelijk al aan dat het haar laatste geld was en dat het niet goed ging. Dit maakt de pijn/schade misschien nog wel erger . Daarom willen we een beroep op jullie doen.   Onze moeder verdient het niet om zich momenteel zorgen te maken over haar spaargeld en leefomstandigheden. Ze moet alleen bezig zijn met haar eigen moeder haar eigen gezondheid en de toekomst. Hoe onzeker die ook is. Ze kan niet gaan werken om het geld terug te verdienen waarvoor ze al die jaren al gewerkt heeft. Het enige wat wij wensen is dat onze moeder (en oma) zich nu kan concentreren op wat echt belangrijk is en niet op haar oude dag incl. alle omstandigheden zich zorgen moet gaan maken over geld omdat iemand anders daar op slinkse wijze misbruik van heeft weten te maken.   Dus al kunt u maar een euro missen. Wij waarderen elke donatie en hopen snel het geld bij elkaar te hebben om onze moeder in ieder geval van deze extra stress te verlossen. Bedankt voor het lezen en uw eventuele donatie. Delen wordt enorm gewaardeerd.

title: Acquisto DPI ed attrezzature per emergenza COVID19
description: Salve! Attraverso questa raccolta fondi lassociazione di volontariato Croce Blu di Gaiba (ANPAS)  ha necessità di effettuare vari acquisti utili a noi volontari e non solo indispensabili per garantire la sicurezza dei propri operatori sopratutto delle persone che usufruiscono dei nostri servizi! Precisamente intendiamo acquistare dispositivi di protezione individuale (guanti mascherine ad alta protezione FFP3 camici di protezione monouso  pulsossimetri e un ventilatore polmonare da donare allospedale pubblico!)

title: CAMPAÑA COVID-19 EMERGENCIA SANITARIA CANARIAS
description: Debido a las innumerables noticias que están llegando tanto a través de las redes sociales como de otros medios oficiales de información sobre la escasez en los diferentes centros sanitarios y sociosanitarios del material necesario para hacer frente al coronavirus COVID-19  los estudiantes de primero de Trabajo Social de la Universidad de La Laguna  nos hemos unido en esta iniciativa solidaria para ayudarles a conseguirlos.   Somos un grupo de estudiantes de la Universidad La Laguna que estamos cursando el primer curso de Trabajo Social  y nos resulta imposible quedarnos en casa sentados sin intentar ayudar de alguna manera ante la situación en la que nos hemos visto todos envueltos. No dejamos de ver y recibir noticias que dejan constancia de la realidad que están sufriendo nuestros profesionales en hospitales y centros sanitarios. Para empezar se ayudará a los hospitales de Tenerife dado que son los hospitales con más casos de Canarias. aunque nuestra intención es ayudar posteriormente al resto de hospitales o centros socio sanitarios que lo requieran.   Como grupo ya hemos llevado a cabo otras iniciativas como por ejemplo la recogida de residuos de las costas de Tenerife:    https://diariodeavisos.elespanol.com/2020/03/alumnos-de-trabajo-social-limpian-la-playa-de-valleseco-recogimos-ropa-interior-manchada-papeleras-de-metal-y-productos-toxicos/    A día de hoy las existencias de material a nivel mundial se están agotando y no podemos garantizar que lo consigamos pero nuestro equipo se compromete a establecer todas las vías de acción posible para tener el material en Canarias a la mayor brevedad. En el caso de que a lo largo de esta campaña se haya cubierto la necesidad actual de material sanitario por parte de otras acciones tanto públicas como privadas todo el dinero recaudado se pondrá a disposición de las autoridades competentes para destinarlo a aquellas necesidades que vayan surgiendo derivadas de la crisis del Covid-19.   El objetivo principal es dotar en primer lugar al Hospital Universitario de Canarias y al Hospital Nuestra Señora de La Candelaria de material de protección para todos los sanitarios/as:   ·         Mascarillas (ffp2-ffp3).    ·         Gafas de protección.    ·         Batas impermeables quirúrgicas.    ·         Pulsioximetros de dedo.    ·         Otros materiales que se consideren necesarios para la atención de coronavirus COVID-19.    TODOS los fondos recaudados irán destinados íntegramente a intentar cubrir las necesidades de los servicios de salud que lo requieran no obteniéndose ningún tipo de contraprestación económica a cambio. REPETIMOS ES UN ACTO SIN ÁNIMO DE LUCRO.    Gracias a la colaboración de la ONG Balanced World y su soporte  hemos conseguido contactar con distribuidores españoles a nivel mundial que podrían hacer llegar el material a España. Si en el momento de la llegada del material las autoridades competentes determinan que debe ser entregado a otros centros diferentes a los planteados por esta campaña de igual modo nos daremos por satisfechos ya que nuestra contribución y esfuerzo será aprovechado por personas que lo necesitan en nuestro país apelando a la solidaridad de todas las personas que han contribuido a recaudar los fondos.  Los y las profesionales que están en los hospitales trabajando se levantan cada mañana para proteger nuestra salud todos y cada uno de ellos y estamos ante una situación idónea para demostrarnos que juntos somos más fuertes. Nuestros sanitarios y sanitarias se han convertido en nuestro verdadero escudo en nuestro amparo y hemos tenido que llegar a este extremo para entender que nosotros debemos protegerlos a ellos.  TODOS FORMAMOS PARTE DE ESTE PROBLEMA. ¡COLABOREMOS CON ELLOS!

title: Help Armenië tegen COVID-19
description: Help Armenië in de strijd tegen Corona!   Het coronavirus laat ook Armenië niet ongespaard. Ondanks de grote medische expertise is er een nijpend tekort aan medische instrumenten en capaciteit.  De tijd om actie te ondernemen is dan ook nu!   Als Armenie Fonds Nederland steunen wij de grote inzamelingsactie van het All Armenia Fund ( https://www.himnadram.org/en/global-mobilization-of-armenian-resources-against-the-covig-19-pandemic ) Het geld van de inzameling wordt volledig besteed aan de gezondheidssector de aankoop van maskers ventilatoren en andere medische benodigdheden.  Deze week zamelen wij geld in voor de bestrijding van COVID-19 in Armenië. Na de inzameling zullen wij het bedrag aanvullen tot 11000 euro; dit garandeert de aankoop van minimaal 1 ventilator welke hard nodig zijn.    Website organisatie Nederland:  www.armeniefonds.nl   Website organisatie in Armenie:  www.himnadram.org   Informatie/contact   info@armeniefonds.nl   Bedankt voor jullie steun!

title: Vic Falls Ventilator and Covid-19 Supplies
description: We the Victoria Falls local community are in desperate need of medical equipment to help see us through the Covid-19 pandemic.  One ventilator costs $30000.  That is only one ventilator for a town with a population of around 35000 - those statistics are terrifying.   We hope that we can raise enough money for one ventilator and if we are lucky - for two or three.  We are also in need of emergency medical supplies for our local hospital and doctors surgeries.    Anything you can donate to help save lives would be immeasurably appreciated.

title: Supplies for Sewing Covid19 Medical Masks
description: Sewists around the Atlanta area have quickly been mobilizing to sew fabric face masks for local (State of Georgia) healthcare workers. We would like to raise money to help cover supplies for our customers who are ready to sew their hearts out for this great need. Please contribute anything you feel you can and get in touch if you would like to cut fabric or sew masks. We have put a low number for our goal with the hopes of getting there but of course hope to raise much more to help with making masks.

title: COVID-19 - Donacije Domu zdravlja i bolnici Konjic
description: Apel za pomoc i donacije Domu zdravlja   Bolnici Konjic u borbi protiv Pandemije virusa COVID-19   S obzirom na novonastalu situaciju u vezi sa pandemijom koronavirusa (COVID-19) i cinjenicom da bi Konjic mogao postati novi epicentar u Bosni i Hercegovini te s obzirom na to da u bolnici nema još uvijek osposobljen odjel za smještaj ovakvih pacijenata kao ni adekvatnu opremu i sredstva pokrecemo ovu akciju za donaciju novcanih sredstava za nabavku opreme i/ili dr. potrebnih materijala u cilju što efikasnije borbe protiv koronavirusa. Takoder Dom zdravlja Konjic koji je trenutno “prva linija odbrane” se nalazi u veoma teškoj finansijskoj situaciji te ce prikupljena sredstva biti rasporedena prema potrebama Doma zdravlja i Opce bolnice Konjic.  Upravo danas u Konjicu je potvrden prvi smrtni slucaj kao posljedica koronavirus. Prikupljanjem sredstava na ovaj nacin svi možemo dati svoj dio i pružiti prijeko potrebnu podršku i pomoc.    Appeal for help and donations for the Health Center   Hospital in Konjic in the fight against the COVID-19 virus pandemic   In consideration of the evolving situation regarding the coronavirus pandemic (COVID-19) and the fact that the City of Konjic could become the new epicenter for COVID-19 in Bosnia and Herzegovina and given the fact that the hospital does not yet have a ward to accommodate such patients nor adequate equipment or funds we have initiated this action to donate funds to purchase equipment and/or other materials needed to combat the corona virus as efficiently as possible.  Also the Konjic Health Center which is currently the “first line of defense” is in a very difficult financial situation and the funds raised will be allocated between the needs of the Konjic Health Center and the Hospital.  Just today the first coronavirus death has been confirmed in Konjic. By raising funds this way we can all give our part and provide much needed support and assistance to those in need.    http://ba.n1info.com/English/NEWS/a418967/COVID-19-UPDATES-Bosnia-has-recorded-150-cases-two-casualties.html       http://bolnicakonjic.com/

title: Yo Me Pongo Tu Corona
description: El Hospital San Pedro de Logroño necesita material para poder seguir tratando a los enfermos de Covid-19. Entre otros materiales necesitan guantes batas impermeables gafas de protección kits pcr de diagnostico rápido solución hidroalcoholica... Entre todos podemos hacer que reciban este material lo antes posible.

title: Sassari contro COVID-19|Raccolta fondi AGT
description: In questo difficile momento storico per cercare di arginare il  COVID-19  è importante che le nostre strutture ricevano un aiuto dalla popolazione tutta un aiuto che deve essere prima di tutto comportamentale che si può avvalorare con un piccolo contributo economico in questo momento di estremo bisogno.   L  Associazione Goliardica Turritana  lancia questa raccolta fondi per donare il totale alla  Sanità Sassarese  (AOU reparti in maggiore difficoltà delle strutture sassaresi Farmacia Ospedaliera laboratori di Microbiologia e Virologia) con il quale si potranno acquistare dispositivi di protezione individuale(DPI) tamponi reagenti e qualsiasi altro tipo di strumentazione indispensabile e purtroppo carente in questo momento.  Un piccolo aiuto da parte di tutti può diventare il più grande ed importante.   Uniti ce la faremo!

title: Help for healthcare workers in Spain - Covid19
description: There is a big shortage of health protection equipment in many hospitals in Spain due to the fact that health staff keep getting infected - the personnel is being asked to reuse face masks of previous days. We are placing an order as soon as possible from China in order to supply with face masks and repellent isolation gowns. We will send them to the main Hospitals in Madrid and any others where donations are accepted.   The material is going to be shipped by plane and we need to place the order as soon as possible. We are going to extend the deadline so more people can collaborate. Please help us with any contribution and spreading the message.  Every hour counts!   - Material will be send to Hospital Gregorio Marañon y Clínico San Carlos in Madrid and Hospital Provincial de Castellón y Clínico Universitario de Valencia.  - We are buying face masks with certification ffp3 and individual protection equipment homologated by the EU.  *You can add a tip to support Gofundme platform but it is optional.  ---  En el Hospital Provincial de Castellón están atendiendo a los pacientes infectados por Covid-19 y necesitan EPIs y mascarillas. En concreto necesitan mascarillas fp3  y EPIs o batas alta proyección impermeable porque no tiene y no saben cuando llegarán. ¡Hemos extendido la colaboración a otros hospitales de Madrid por petición de algunos donantes!   Con tu ayuda podemos hacer un pedido mañana  lo antes posible  a un proveedor en China que lo mandará en avión y tardará pocos días en llegar. ¡Es la solución más rápida hasta que lleguen las provisiones que ha prometido la administración!   ¡Hay que hacerlo ya  cada hora son nuevos infectados ! Por favor ayúdanos con lo que puedas cada céntimo cuenta :)  *Se puede añadir una propina destinada al mantenimiento de la plataforma Gofundme pero es opcional.  De acuerdo con las condiciones de uso de esta plataforma:  - Esta campaña esta organizada por Marta Jiménez Solano (Valencia España) - Todo el dinero recaudado se destinará a comprar material sanitario y será donado a título personal a las autoridades sanitarias a través de resoluciones de donación a los hospitales arriba indicados. - Autoriza a Berta Martin a gestionar los fondos recaudados junto con los de su campaña para realizar conjuntamente la compra del material.

title: Tifosi GialloBlu uniti contro il Covid19
description: Insieme abbiamo passato mille avversità e mai come ora Torino deve dimostrare il suo valore come abbiamo già fatto in passato per i bambini affetti da autismo per Andrea e nel ricordo di Max. Invitiamo tutti i tifosi gialloblu i nostri amici o chiunque voglia supportare con un piccolo contributo questa nostra raccolta che doneremo alla sanità della nostra Città! Insieme ce la faremo perché la gente come noi non molla mai! 1989 - Curva Dido Guerrieri *IMPORTANTE: la piattaforma GoFundMe applica delle tariffe sulle donazioni che consistono in una trattenuta sulla somma donata. In Italia la tariffa applicata è del 29% + 025 € per ogni donazione (per dettagli:  https://support.gofundme.com/hc/it/articles/203604424-Tariffe-di-GoFundMe ). Per questo motivo quando pubblicheremo i documenti della donazione la somma totale risulterà inferiore a quella  visualizzata.

title: Wigan nurses stranded in Cambodia due to Covid-19
description: https://www.wigantoday.net/news/uk-news/covid-19-wigan-nurses-left-stranded-cambodia-after-uk-flights-cancelled-2513822    please help these lovely people who are now stuck in Cambodia because they cannot get a flight home  they are very worried and they will not be able to fund themselves for much longer   please donate anything you can   this will help ensure they have beds to sleep in and food to eat   thank you

title: The National Venue COVID-19 Staff Relief Fund
description: The National Staff needs our help!   Along with the majority of fellow live music venues across the country The National has suspended all events until further notice.  The National has been at the heart of Richmonds music scene since 2008. Our friends at The National include bartenders production crew box office staff hospitality security and janitorial services. Many of them have been the backbone of this amazing venue for over 12 years.    ALL PROCEEDS WILL GO TO THE STAFF!     They all work at The National not only for their love of music but also for their commitment to our music experience. Our donations will directly assist all of The National staff in need.   Lets show our support and loyalty like they have given us by helping them through these hard times.   We are all looking forward to the day we can come together again and help everyone sing dance and listen to the music that fills our souls!   W. Shelton Hargette

title: COVID-19
description: Whilst theres a worldwide pandemic  and were all in quarantine why dont we try make a difference for those who are suffering from the deadly virus. The NHS are lacking in equipment such as ventilators (of which are vital to keep a patient alive) so Ive created a fundraiser to hopefully help! Its already becoming a trend for boys to shave there heads during the isolation period - because they cant get haircuts! - so Im asking for a donation big or small  from everyone who does this   lets make it a trend! Donations from non participants are also welcome  everyone can do there part to help

title: Sikh donation for Italy covid-19 emergency
description: Fundrasing for COVID-19 emergency in Italy    Waheguru Ji ka Khalsa Waheguru Ji ki Fateh        My name is Jaspinder and I grew up and lived in Italy    and my  heart breaks down when I see  Italy going through this pandemic.    Like me I think many other second generation Sikhs would like to do something for the country that they love I organised this campaign.  Since the outbreak 6077 people have died and the number of infections is rising day by day. My call is all the Sikhs brothers and sisters living in Italy or abroad to come together and donate now to  help the Italian Health Care System.  People are dying alone and away from their dears please lets contribute to grant better care for everyone.  If you cant donate please share this campaign.   Sikh are known to be in front line to fight for humanity please  if you consider Italy like your home come forward!   ??? ????? ?? ??? ?? ??? ?????? ?? ??????? ??? ??? ?? ?????? ???? ?????? ?? ???? ?????? ??? ??? ?????? ???. ?? ????? ??? ???? ?? ???? ??? ????? ???? ?? ?????? ??? ????? ???.  The donations will be evolved to Protezione Civile   Banca Intesa Sanpaolo Spa Filiale di Via del Corso 226 - Roma  Intestato a Pres. Cons. Min. Dip. Prot. Civ.  IBAN: IT84 Z030 6905 0201 0000 0066 387  BIC: BCITITMM

title: Support R4Rs COVID 19 Emergency Response
description: As Europe responds to the COVID-19 crisis refugee camps on the Aegean Islands have been neglected and left unprepared for an outbreak that would devastate the camp communities. Our teams on the ground are doing their best to provide emergency relief and we need your support now more than ever.   At this moment almost 20000 refugees reside in Moria camp and just under 8000 in Vathi Samos. Living conditions in the congested camps are horrendous with shortages of toilets showers running water and hygiene items making it virtually impossible to maintain a basic level of hygiene. The spread of COVID-19 amongst these already-vulnerable communities would likely be disastrous.    As the first cases have been identified on Lesvos Refugee 4 Refugees is preparing for an outbreak of the virus on Lesvos and Samos and we need your support to continue our emergency response operations. In the Olive Grove on Lesvos we are transforming the Mandala childrens space into an emergency medical shelter. Construction has started and upon completion will provide 20 rooms with a total of 80 beds to be used as a quarantine space in the event of an outbreak.     On Samos our team is focusing on preparing the warehouse and creating hygiene packs to be distributed to families in Vathi camp. We are collaborating with other actors to find a way to ensure essential items can continue to be provided to residents of Vathi and are currently seeking permission to reopen the Free Shop in the coming weeks.    By donating to our COVID-19 Emergency Response campaign you are supporting the purchase of:   - Wood and other materials to construct emergency medical shelter - Construction tools to be used by our teams and the camp community - Bedding to be provided to individuals who are quarantined  - Wiring to ensure electricity is provided to each room  - Essential hygiene items to be distributed on Lesvos   Samos  Through your generosity we can continue preparing for an outbreak in the camps and ensure we continue providing emergency relief for the most vulnerable populations.    Thank you for your support    Sophie   The R4R Team

title: Lets fight together to defeat the Corona Virus
description: As you probably already know the COVID-19 pandemic has spread swiftly across the globe; as a result many hospitals and clinics are running out of  Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) . Doctors nurses and health care workers are risking their lives every day to take care of patients.   My daughter works at TotalAccess Urgent Care at St. Louis MO which  has around 25 branches in St. Louis area. Each branch sees 40 to 60 patients per day 7 days per week. They use the COVID-19 testing kit in their clinic and my daughter has worked with several patients who tested positive for COVID-19 herself.   This alone is worrying but additionally  she and her coworkers do not have the appropriate PPE to protect themselves and ensure that they themselves dont contract the virus. What they have been using are just normal surgical masks and limit to one mask per person per day. Surgical masks are not recommended to protect people from COVID-19 by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) because they are loose fitting and do not filter out smaller particles but these are the only protection they have.  Even the surgical masks are in short supply.  I need your help to get these healthcare workers the protection they need: If you have extra PPE  please let me know by clicking the contact button please include the type of PPE and the amount you can donate. I will try to go and pick up the PPE and ship over to the hospital; Or you can donate here:   https://www.gofundme.com/create/story/lets-fight-together-to-defeat-the-corona-virus    With the help of many friends we have already bought 4000 surgical masks and some KN95 masks and facial shields.  And we are in the process of placing an order to buy 1600 KN95 DTC3X masks. With your help we can provide them with much more. We will donate any leftover money to the hospital.   Please help us to help those front-line healthcare workers. Together we stand together we fight and we will defeat the Corona Virus.

title: DPC Sitters Covid-19 Supplemental Income Fund
description: DalyPetCare   will be on hiatus until the state of Maryland  allows non-essential businesses to open again.  We hope to be back in business just as soon as the ban is lifted.   I am so thankful for our dedicated  DPC team and want to support them so they can weather this unprecedented event and feel confident that returning to this line of work is not risky business.   Because DPC sitters are employees  vs. contractors they are eligible for unemployment benefits. But as you may know this is a slow process that may eventually cover only up to half their income.   Many kind clients have asked how they can help - so I am setting up this fund as a kind of VIRTUAL TIP JAR to supplement their incomes while on hiatus.    Please know if you have chosen to continue to pay for regularly scheduled services during this closure you have  already done more than your part THANK YOU for your generosity!  This essential income will help me cover the March payroll.    Any funds will be distributed on a percentage basis based on each sitters average income relative to the whole payroll  (excluding me.) So if a sitter typically receives 10% of the payroll they would receive 10% of the funds.   The funds goal is intended to approximate 50% of the sitters income for 2 weeks which Im sure is a wishful and overly optimistic  guesstimate of how long this ban might last.   Lastly please know that continuing to book visits and spread the word about our services is the most valuable way you can support us all.  Pet sitting is really the business of  care giving and I can honestly say that you and your pet(s) occupy their own unique place in each of your sitters hearts.

title: Meals TO Heal - Bringing the fight to COVID-19
description: COVID-19  is having a profound impact on all of our lives - from small business owners to hospital staff to patients to those practicing physical distancing. As the virus continues to spread in our city and country we can work together to be part of the solution and to support those who are most impacted.    MEALS TO HEAL  is an initiative that uses community donations to deliver nourishing meals snacks and coffee from local restaurants to hospital staff on the front lines of the fight against COVID-19.    HERE IS HOW IT WORKS:   1.  Donations:  We will be raising donations through our local Toronto community using this gofundme page.  2.  Meals:  All donations that are raised will be used to purchase nourishing meals and snacks from local restaurants and coffee shops effectively giving back to our community of small businesses who are suffering financially during this difficult time.  3.  Hospitals:  All meals that are purchased will be provided to hospital staff on the front lines who are courageously working to assist those in need of medical care. These meals and snacks will offer hospital staff with a much needed opportunity to reflect and refuel as they provide ongoing treatment for those impacted by the pandemic.   All donations that are raised will be used to purchase meals from local restaurants. The initiative will be free for any hospitals that participate.    THE END RESULT:    Meals TO Heal  will both brighten the days of hospital staff on the front lines while also benefiting small businesses that are being impacted by the economic fallout of the virus.   OUR PROGRESS TO-DATE:   Meals TO Heal has partnered with several Toronto-based hospitals including Mount Sinai Toronto Western Toronto General and Princess Margaret. We have also partnered with iQ Food Co. who will serve as our first pilot restaurant.   THE PILOT   OUR NEXT STEPS:   Over the next week we will be collecting donations using this gofundme page to validate the concept. All donations that are raised will be used to purchase meals from iQ Food Co. All meals that are purchased will be provided to hospital staff at Mount Sinai Toronto Western Princess Margaret and Toronto General Hospitals. After the pilot we will look to iron out logistics and will aim to scale the initiative to more local restaurants and hospitals in order to increase our impact.    If this is something youre passionate about make a donation. If you are looking for a positive outlet to vent your COVID-19 frustrations make a donation. Or if you simply want to be show your support for our local businesses and hospital staff... well make a donation!  Thanks to all and stay safe!

title: Support The Whoa Doggy! Team during COVID-19
description: COVID-19 has hit our community very hard. Many small businesses like ours are struggling to stay open while also trying to be safe. Its difficult to say the least!I am reaching out to our Whoa Doggy! family for help. The Team is Out of Work. This is temporary of course and everyone will be back as soon as our loyal clients begin going back to their offices and begin making travel plans. In the meantime we have an empty calendar.The majority of the Whoa Doggy! Team relies on their visits with your pets as their only source of income. With our schedule nearly completely cancelled that means that the teams income has gone down to zero. If you have any room in your budget to make a contribution to Andrea Maddy McKenna Tyler and Leisa so they can make ends meet wed really appreciate it. Thanks for allowing us to do the work we love. We are so lucky and we cant wait to get back to it!

title: Please Help TopBike and its Guides Survive Covid19
description: To our many dear customers in the past 13 years our beloved friends    we start by saying  Thank You  because many of you have already helped us by entrusting us with shaping a small part of your experiences and memories of Rome. Maybe you remember it still - recently or many years ago – on a bicycle in the fresh morning air or in the golden light of the afternoon cruising the back alleys of Trastevere or riding along the monumental arches of the Roman aqueducts. Perhaps you still remember your guides name - and just maybe they brought magic to this experience making it one of your best-loved memories of Rome.   On behalf of all our staff and guides we thank you as it has been an honor to have you tour with us and thus support us in what we love doing best!   And we never thought wed ever need to ask for anything more... until last month.  In the first week of March the rapid and devastating spread of the Covid-19 epidemic in Italy hit us hard and fast  wrecking the hitherto successful activity of our shop.    We went from business-as-usual to closing the front door in under 3 weeks.  In what is normally the lead up to the busiest period of the year our shop has been shut and our staff has stopped working. A couple of us still continue to work a few hours from home – mainly on the cancellations and refunds that have cleaned dry all income prospects for many months to come.   To say the truth this caught us unprepared.  Weve ran our business in the past 13 years with very low margins of profit (in order to ensure the best quality at the lowest price) and we dont have any funds to fall back to in an emergency such as this one.  And even with that this wouldnt be as bad if it didnt come after 5 difficult winter months during which weve accrued debts - which now keep growing daily and by all accounts will continue to do so for many months to come  threatening our survival . It is true in this crisis we have some help: the Italian government pledged (limited and short-term) assistance measures; but having done the math with it we hardly stand a chance if the crisis lasts longer than a few months.  And this is still not the last of our worries.  We also think of our freelance guides who not being entitled to any government aid are set to remain financially wholly unsupported for most or all of the season ahead.  We just hate seeing this and feeling unable to do anything to help them.  It is these unprecedented circumstances that drive us to appeal to you our old customers and friends for any help you may be willing and able to spare.
